class AnimNotify_MeleeStrike extends AnimNotify_Scripted;

var() enum ENotifyDesc
{
	Melee_Lunge,
	Melee_Strike,
} StrikeType;

event Notify( Actor Owner )
{
	local gbxPawn WGPawn;

	WGPawn = gbxPawn( Owner );
	if ( WGPawn != None ) //&& !WGPawn.IsHumanControlled()
	{
		if ( StrikeType == Melee_Lunge )
		{
			WGPawn.DoMeleeLunge();
		}
		else
		{
			WGPawn.CheckMeleeSuccess();
		}
	}
}
class AnimNotify_MortarFire extends AnimNotify_Scripted;

event Notify( Actor Owner )
{
	local gbxPawn WGPawn;

	WGPawn = gbxPawn( Owner );
	if ( WGPawn != None )
	{
		WGPawn.MortarFire();
	}
}
class CookGrenadeCallback extends PawnAnimHandSwitchCallback;



static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterupt )
{
	// Don't switch back hands!
	return true;
}
class CornerFireDismountCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn );
/*
{
	//gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = true;
	//gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fStartDispositionChange = true;
	return true;
}
*/

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	local WargamePawn WGPawn;

	if (aPawn.IsA( 'WargamePawn' ) )
	{
		WGPawn = WargamePawn( aPawn );
		WGPawn.m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = false;
		WGPawn.StopTransitioning();

		WGPawn.SetLocation( WargamePawn( aPawn ).LastCornerPosition );

		WGPawn.bNoTurnBody = false;
		WGPawn.Shadow.UpdateShadow();
		WGPawn.TeamLogoShadow.UpdateShadow();

		WGPawn.PlayWaiting( true );

		return true;
	}

	return false;
}
class CornerFireMountCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn )
{
	local WargamePawn WGPawn;

	// Pop the pawn's location out to the new corner-firing position before playing the animation.
	if ( aPawn.IsA( 'WargamePawn' ) )
	{
		aPawn.SetLocation( WargamePawn( aPawn ).OutCornerPosition );
		WGPawn = WargamePawn( aPawn );
		WGPawn.Shadow.UpdateShadow();
		WGPawn.TeamLogoShadow.UpdateShadow();
	}

	return true;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	local WargamePawn WGPawn;

	if (aPawn.IsA( 'WargamePawn' ) )
	{
		WGPawn = WargamePawn( aPawn );
		//WGPawn.bNoTurnBody = true;
		WGPawn.m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = false;
		WGPawn.StopTransitioning();

		WGPawn.PlayWaiting( true );

		return true;
	}

	return false;
}

// DEPRECATE THIS CLASS

class DisableFacialAnimCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;


static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn )
{
	local InfantryUSA	aFriendly;
	
	if ( aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).StartFlinching();

		if ( aPawn.IsA( 'InfantryUSA' ) )
		{
			aFriendly = InfantryUSA(aPawn);			
			aFriendly.DisableFacialExpression( 20.0f );
		}
	}
	return false;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	local InfantryUSA	aFriendly;
	
	if ( aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).StopFlinching();

		if (!fNoStart)
		{
			if ( aPawn.IsA( 'InfantryUSA' ) )
			{
				aFriendly = InfantryUSA(aPawn);				
				aFriendly.FacialExpressionBlendingState = aFriendly.EFacialBlendingState.E_None;
				aFriendly.FacialExpressionCheckDistanceTime = aFriendly.Level.TimeSeconds;
			}
		}
	}
	
	return false;
}
class DiveForCoverCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn );

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterupt )
{
	local Vector DiveOffsetStanding;
	local Vector DiveOffsetCrouched;
	local Vector DiveOffset;
	local Rotator DiveRotationStanding;
	local Rotator DiveRotationCrouched;
	local Rotator DiveRotation;

	DiveOffsetStanding=Vect(297.049,-1.905,0.0);
	DiveOffsetCrouched=Vect(243.662,-0.368,0.0);
	DiveRotationStanding=Rot(0,16929,0);
	DiveRotationCrouched=Rot(0,17293,0);

	aPawn.log("****SJP: Pawn dived, updating rotation and location.", 'SJP' );

	if( WargamePawn( aPawn ) != None )
	{
		DiveOffset = aPawn.GetBoneCoords('Bip01').Origin - aPawn.Location;
		DiveRotation = aPawn.Rotation;

		if( aPawn.bIsCrouched )
		{
			DiveRotation.Yaw += DiveRotationCrouched.Yaw & 65535;
			aPawn.SetLocation( aPawn.Location + DiveOffset );
		}
		else
		{
			DiveRotation.Yaw += DiveRotationStanding.Yaw & 65535;
			aPawn.SetLocation( aPawn.Location + DiveOffset );
		}

		aPawn.SetRotation( DiveRotation );

		WargamePawn( aPawn ).PlayWaiting();

		return true;
	}

	return false;
}
//=============================================================================
// DumbPawn:  These pawns are not really characters, but are instead possibly combat related scenary
//=============================================================================

class DumbPawn extends gbxPawn;

#exec OBJ LOAD FILE=..\texture\t_interface_mb.utx

defaultproperties
{
}
//=============================================================================
// gbxInspectorInfantryGermany
//=============================================================================
class gbxInspectorInfantryGermany extends gbxInspectorPawn;


static function DrawGBXHud( canvas Canvas, object drawObject, gbxInspectorMan mgr, float offsetX, float offsetY, int nPass, float alpha, float timeSinceShow )
{
	local Unit drawUnit;
	//local float maxWeaponHeight, weaponScale;
	local int i, count, textOffset, imageWidth, imageX;
	local float overlappingPercentage, portraitPercentage;
	local int movingX, halfPanel, smallPortraitSize;

	overlappingPercentage = 0.5;
	portraitPercentage = 0.9;
	smallPortraitSize = 64 * portraitPercentage;
	halfPanel = default.myWidth / 2;

	drawUnit = Unit(drawObject);

	count = Min(drawUnit.NumMembers,3);

	movingX = offsetX - (Canvas.ClipX - default.myWidth);

	if (nPass == 0)
	{
		DrawStylizedBackground(Canvas, mgr.myHud, offsetX, offsetY, alpha);

		Canvas.SetDrawColor(255,255,255,255*alpha);

		// Portraits are scaled and drawn in a different order depending on the number of Germans in the Unit.
		// 1 German: 100% scale and centered, 		// 2 Germans: 1st is 100% scale on left drawn last, 2nd is 90% scaled on right.
		// 3 Germans: 1st guy is scaled 90% and on the left, 2nd guy is scaled 90% and on the right, 3rd guy is 100% scale and in center drawn last.
		switch ( count )
		{
			case 2:
				imageWidth = 32 + (smallPortraitSize * overlappingPercentage) + smallPortraitSize;
				//Log( "imageWidth: " $imageWidth, 'PSV');

				for ( i=0; i<count; i++ )
				{		
					if ( drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait != None )
					{
						if ( i == 0 )
						{
							imageX = (Canvas.ClipX - (halfPanel + (imageWidth/2))) + 32 + (smallPortraitSize/2) + movingX;
							Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25+(64-smallPortraitSize))*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
							Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait, 64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleX,
											64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
						}
						else
						{
							imageX = Canvas.ClipX - (halfPanel + (imageWidth/2)) + movingX;
							Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25)*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
							Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
						}
						//Log( "mgr.myHud.ScaleX: " $mgr.myHud.ScaleX$ " ["$i$"] imageX: " $imageX, 'PSV');
					}
				}
				break;
			case 3:
				imageWidth = smallPortraitSize * 2 + (32);
				//Log( "imageWidth: " $imageWidth, 'PSV');

				for ( i=0; i<count; i++ )
				{		
					if ( drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait != None )
					{
						if ( i == 0 )
						{
							imageX = Canvas.ClipX - halfPanel + movingX;
							Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25+(64-smallPortraitSize))*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
							Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait, 64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleX,
											64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
						}
						else if ( i == 1 )
						{
							imageX = Canvas.ClipX - (halfPanel + smallPortraitSize) + movingX;
							Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25+(64-smallPortraitSize))*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
							Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait, 64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleX,
											64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
						}
						else
						{
							imageX = Canvas.ClipX - (halfPanel + (32)) + movingX;
							Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25)*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
							Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
						}
						//Log( "mgr.myHud.ScaleX: " $mgr.myHud.ScaleX$ " ["$i$"] imageX: " $imageX, 'PSV');
					}
				}
				break;
			case 1:
			default:
				imageWidth = 64 + ((count-1) * 64 * overlappingPercentage);
				imageX = Canvas.ClipX - ((default.myWidth / 2) + (imageWidth/2)) + movingX;
				
				Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25)*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
				if ( drawUnit.Members[0].Portrait != None )
				{
					Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[0].Portrait, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
				}
		}

		// weapon graphic
		/*Canvas.SetDrawColor(255,255,255,255*alpha);
		maxWeaponHeight = class'gbxInspectorPawn'.default.MyHeight * 1.2;
		weaponScale = maxWeaponHeight / drawPawn.Weapon.nIconH;

		Canvas.SetPos((offsetX+100)*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY+class'gbxInspectorPawn'.default.MyHeight-4-(drawPawn.Weapon.nIconH*weaponScale))*
						mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
		Canvas.DrawTile(drawPawn.Weapon.Icon, drawPawn.Weapon.nIconW*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, drawPawn.Weapon.nIconH*weaponScale*mgr.myHud.ScaleY,
						drawPawn.Weapon.nIconX, drawPawn.Weapon.nIconY, drawPawn.Weapon.nIconW, drawPawn.Weapon.nIconH);*/
	}
	else if (nPass == 1)
	{
		Canvas.DrawColor = mgr.myHud.WhiteColor;
		Canvas.DrawColor.A = 255 * alpha;

		textOffset = Canvas.ClipX - (offsetX+30+32);
		DrawGenericText(Canvas, mgr.myHud, drawUnit.Members[i].CharacterName,
						Canvas.ClipX - (default.myWidth/2) + movingX, offsetY+Default.myHeight-24, Default.myNameScale, TJ_CENTER, TJ_LEFT_TOP);
	}
}

defaultproperties
{
}
//=============================================================================
// gbxInspectorInfantryUSA
//=============================================================================
class gbxInspectorInfantryUSA extends gbxInspectorPawn;

var float DeathSymbolAppearDuration;
var float DeathSymbolScaleMax;
var float DeathSymbolScaleMin;

simulated static function DrawGBXHud( canvas Canvas, object drawObject, gbxInspectorMan mgr, float offsetX, float offsetY, int nPass, float alpha, float timeSinceShow )
{
	local gbxPawn drawPawn;
	local Unit drawUnit;
	local float maxWeaponHeight, weaponScale, deathSymbolScale, deathSymbolAlpha, appearTimeProportion;
	local int i, count, textOffset, imageWidth, imageX;
	local float overlappingPercentage, portraitPercentage;
	local int movingX, halfPanel, smallPortraitSize;

	drawUnit = Unit(drawObject);

	// check if drawObject is a Unit or a gbxPawn...
	if (drawUnit != None)  // are we drawing a Unit full of Pawns?...
	{
		overlappingPercentage = 0.5;
		portraitPercentage = 0.9;
		smallPortraitSize = 64 * portraitPercentage;
		halfPanel = default.myWidth / 2;

		drawUnit = Unit(drawObject);

		count = Min(drawUnit.NumMembers,3);

		movingX = offsetX - (Canvas.ClipX - default.myWidth);

		if (nPass == 0)
		{
			DrawStylizedBackground(Canvas, mgr.myHud, offsetX, offsetY, alpha);

			Canvas.SetDrawColor(255,255,255,255*alpha);

			// Portraits are scaled and drawn in a different order depending on the number of Pawns in the Unit.
			// 1 Pawn: 100% scale and centered,
			// 2 Pawns: 1st is 100% scale on left drawn last, 2nd is 90% scaled on right.
			// 3 Pawns: 1st guy is scaled 90% and on the left, 2nd guy is scaled 90% and on the right, 3rd guy is 100% scale and in center drawn last.
			switch ( count )
			{
				case 2:
					imageWidth = 32 + (smallPortraitSize * overlappingPercentage) + smallPortraitSize;
					//Log( "imageWidth: " $imageWidth, 'PSV');

					for ( i=0; i<count; i++ )
					{
						if ( drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait != None )
						{
							if ( i == 0 )
							{
								imageX = (Canvas.ClipX - (halfPanel + (imageWidth/2))) + 32 + (smallPortraitSize/2) + movingX;
								Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25+(64-smallPortraitSize))*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
								Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait, 64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleX,
												64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
							}
							else
							{
								imageX = Canvas.ClipX - (halfPanel + (imageWidth/2)) + movingX;
								Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25)*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
								Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
							}
							//Log( "mgr.myHud.ScaleX: " $mgr.myHud.ScaleX$ " ["$i$"] imageX: " $imageX, 'PSV');
						}
					}
					break;
				case 3:
					imageWidth = smallPortraitSize * 2 + (32);
					//Log( "imageWidth: " $imageWidth, 'PSV');

					for ( i=0; i<count; i++ )
					{
						if ( drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait != None )
						{
							if ( i == 0 )
							{
								imageX = Canvas.ClipX - halfPanel + movingX;
								Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25+(64-smallPortraitSize))*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
								Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait, 64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleX,
												64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
							}
							else if ( i == 1 )
							{
								imageX = Canvas.ClipX - (halfPanel + smallPortraitSize) + movingX;
								Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25+(64-smallPortraitSize))*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
								Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait, 64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleX,
												64*portraitPercentage*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
							}
							else
							{
								imageX = Canvas.ClipX - (halfPanel + (32)) + movingX;
								Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25)*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
								Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[i].Portrait, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
							}
							//Log( "mgr.myHud.ScaleX: " $mgr.myHud.ScaleX$ " ["$i$"] imageX: " $imageX, 'PSV');
						}
					}
					break;
				case 1:
				default:
					imageWidth = 64 + ((count-1) * 64 * overlappingPercentage);
					imageX = Canvas.ClipX - ((default.myWidth / 2) + (imageWidth/2)) + movingX;

					Canvas.SetPos( imageX*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25)*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
					if ( drawUnit.Members[0].Portrait != None )
					{
						Canvas.DrawTile(drawUnit.Members[0].Portrait, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
					}
			}

			// weapon graphic
			/*
			Canvas.SetDrawColor(255,255,255,255*alpha);
			maxWeaponHeight = class'gbxInspectorPawn'.default.MyHeight * 1.2;
			weaponScale = maxWeaponHeight / drawPawn.Weapon.nIconH;

			Canvas.SetPos((offsetX+100)*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY+class'gbxInspectorPawn'.default.MyHeight-4-(drawPawn.Weapon.nIconH*weaponScale))*
							mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
			Canvas.DrawTile(drawPawn.Weapon.Icon, drawPawn.Weapon.nIconW*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, drawPawn.Weapon.nIconH*weaponScale*mgr.myHud.ScaleY,
							drawPawn.Weapon.nIconX, drawPawn.Weapon.nIconY, drawPawn.Weapon.nIconW, drawPawn.Weapon.nIconH);
			*/
		}
		else if (nPass == 1)
		{
			Canvas.DrawColor = mgr.myHud.WhiteColor;
			Canvas.DrawColor.A = 255 * alpha;

			textOffset = Canvas.ClipX - (offsetX+30+32);
			DrawGenericText(Canvas, mgr.myHud, drawUnit.Members[i].CharacterName,
							Canvas.ClipX - (default.myWidth/2) + movingX, offsetY+Default.myHeight-24, Default.myNameScale, TJ_CENTER, TJ_LEFT_TOP);
		}
	}
	else  // if not drawing a Unit, assume drawing a Pawn...
	{
		drawPawn = gbxPawn(drawObject);

		// Don't draw this panel if there is no portrait
		if( drawPawn == None || drawPawn.Portrait == None )
		{
			return;
		}

		if (nPass == 0)
		{
			DrawStylizedBackground(Canvas, mgr.myHud, offsetX, offsetY, alpha);

			DrawPawnHealthBar( Canvas, drawPawn, mgr.myHud, offsetX + 4, offsetY + 2, alpha, 62, 20, true );

			// portrait
			Canvas.SetDrawColor(255,255,255,255 * alpha);

			if( mgr.myHud.Level.NetMode == NM_Standalone )
			{
				Canvas.SetPos((offsetX+30)*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-25)*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
			}
			else
			{
				Canvas.SetPos((offsetX+30)*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY-4)*mgr.myHud.ScaleY);
			}

			if( !mgr.myHud.bIsSplitScreen )
			{
				Canvas.DrawTile(drawPawn.Portrait, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, 64*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, 0, 0, 64, 64);
			}
			else
			{
				Canvas.DrawTile(drawPawn.Portrait, 48*mgr.myHud.flSplitScreenScale, 48*mgr.myHud.flSplitScreenScale, 0, 0, 64, 64);
			}

			// portrait damage overlay

			if( mgr.myHud.Level.NetMode == NM_Standalone )
			{
				DrawPortraitDamageOverlay( Canvas, drawPawn, mgr.myHud, offsetX+30, offsetY-25, alpha );
			}
			else
			{
				DrawPortraitDamageOverlay( Canvas, drawPawn, mgr.myHud, offsetX+30, offsetY-4, alpha );			
			}

			if( drawPawn.Health <= 0 )
			{
				// Animated offset/scale/alpha death symbol

				if( timeSinceShow > 0 )
				{
					appearTimeProportion = FClamp( timeSinceShow / default.DeathSymbolAppearDuration, 0.0, 1.0 );
					deathSymbolScale = default.DeathSymbolScaleMax - appearTimeProportion * ( default.DeathSymbolScaleMax - default.DeathSymbolScaleMin );
					deathSymbolAlpha = appearTimeProportion;

					if( deathSymbolAlpha * alpha > 1.0 / 255.0 )
					{
						if( mgr.myHud.Level.NetMode == NM_Standalone )
						{
							DrawDeathSymbol( Canvas, drawPawn, mgr.myHud, offsetX+30, offsetY-25, deathSymbolScale, deathSymbolAlpha * alpha );
						}
						else
						{
							DrawDeathSymbol( Canvas, drawPawn, mgr.myHud, offsetX+30, offsetY-4, deathSymbolScale, deathSymbolAlpha * alpha );
						}
					}
				}
			}

			// weapon graphic
			if( drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass != None )
			{
				Canvas.SetDrawColor(255,255,255,255 * alpha);
				maxWeaponHeight = class'gbxInspectorPawn'.default.MyHeight * 1.2;
				weaponScale = maxWeaponHeight / drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconH;

				if( !mgr.myHud.bIsSplitScreen )
				{
					Canvas.SetPos((offsetX+100)*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY + class'gbxInspectorPawn'.default.MyHeight - 4 - FMin( drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconH, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconH*weaponScale ) ) * mgr.myHud.ScaleY);

					Canvas.DrawTile(drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.Icon, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconW*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, FMin( drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconH*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconH*weaponScale*mgr.myHud.ScaleY ),
									drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconX, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconY, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconW, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconH);
				}
				else
				{
					Canvas.SetPos((offsetX+76)*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, (offsetY + class'gbxInspectorPawn'.default.MyHeight - 4 - FMin( drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconH, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconH*weaponScale ) ) * mgr.myHud.ScaleY);

					Canvas.DrawTile(drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.Icon, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconW*mgr.myHud.flSplitScreenScale*mgr.myHud.ScaleX, FMin( drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconH*mgr.myHud.ScaleY, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconH*weaponScale*mgr.myHud.ScaleY ),
									drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconX, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconY, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconW, drawPawn.CurrentPawnWeaponClass.default.nIconH);
				}
			}
		}
		else if (nPass == 1 && mgr.myHud.Level.NetMode == NM_Standalone )
		{
			Canvas.DrawColor = mgr.myHud.WhiteColor;
			Canvas.DrawColor.A = 255 * alpha;

			DrawGenericText(Canvas, mgr.myHud, drawPawn.CharacterName,
							offsetX+30+32, offsetY+Default.myHeight-24, Default.myNameScale, TJ_CENTER, TJ_LEFT_TOP);
		}
	}
}

defaultproperties
{
	DeathSymbolAppearDuration=0.75
	DeathSymbolScaleMax=1.5
	DeathSymbolScaleMin=1.0
}//=============================================================================
//	Horse - animated horse that reacts to bullets and dies
//	Created by: Ryan Conlon
//=============================================================================
class Horse extends gbxAnimal
	placeable;

var(Horse) edfindable gbxAnimal AttachedPawn;

var int CurrentIdleAnim;
var int CurrentDeathIdleAnim;

var bool bPlayingDeathIdle;
var bool bPlayingHit;
var bool bPlayingFlinch;

var BulletListener MyBulletListener;

simulated function PreBeginPlay()
{
	Mesh = Mesh( DynamicLoadObject( "k_prop.horsewagon_horse", class'Mesh' ) );

	SetCollision( true, true, true );

	// Load sounds
	//if( IdleSound != "" )
	//	IdleSoundCue = LoadSound( IdleSound );

	//if( FlinchSound != "" )
	//	FlinchSoundCue = LoadSound( FlinchSound );

	//if( HitSound != "" )
	//	HitSoundCue = LoadSound( HitSound );

	//if( DeathSound != "" )
	//	DeathSoundCue = LoadSound( DeathSound );
	
	Super.PreBeginPlay();
}

simulated function PostLoadGame()
{
	PlayIdleAnim();

	Super.PostLoadGame();
}

simulated function PostNetBeginPlay()
{
	if ( Role == ROLE_Authority )
	{
		CreateBulletListener(); // Only the server needs bullet listeners now, since the client hears about whizzes from the server	
	}
}

simulated function Destroyed()
{
	NotSimulatedDestroyed();

	Super.Destroyed();
}

function NotSimulatedDestroyed()
{
	if (MyBulletListener != None)
	{
		MyBulletListener.Destroy();
		MyBulletListener = None;
	}
}

simulated function CreateBulletListener()
{
	if (MyBulletListener == None)
	{	
		MyBulletListener = Spawn( class'BulletListener' );
		MyBulletListener.SetLocation(Location);
		MyBulletListener.SetBase(self);
		MyBulletListener.SetRelativeLocation(vect(0,0,0));
		MyBulletListener.NotifyPawn = self;
	}
}

simulated event bool TargetFriendly( Vector aHitLoc, Pawn SourcePawn, bool bfiring )
{
	// anyone can shoot me
	return false;
}

function PlayIdleAnim( optional int idx )
{
	local int value;

	if( IdleAnimList.Length <= 0 )
		return;
	
	value = Rand( IdleAnimList.Length );

	//log( "Horse::PlayIdleAnim() - queueing " $ IdleAnimList[value], 'RSC' );
	FlushAnimQueueChannel( 0 );
	AddAnimToQueue( IdleAnimList[value], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, true, false, 1.0, 0.15 );
	
	if( AttachedPawn != None )
		AttachedPawn.PlayIdleAnim( value );
}

function PlayIdleSound()
{
	if( IdleSoundCue != None )
		PlaySoundCue( IdleSoundCue, SLOT_None );
}

function PlayFlinchAnim( optional int idx )
{
	local int value;

	if( FlinchAnimlist.Length <= 0 || bPlayingFlinch || bPlayingHit )
		return;
	
	value = Rand( FlinchAnimlist.Length );

	//log( "Horse::PlayFlinchAnim() - queueing " $ FlinchAnimList[value], 'RSC' );
	AddAnimToQueue( FlinchAnimList[value], QUEUE_FLINCH_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15 );
	bPlayingFlinch=true;
	
	if( AttachedPawn != None )
		AttachedPawn.PlayFlinchAnim( value );

	//PlayFlinchSound();
}

function PlayFlinchSound()
{
	if( FlinchSoundCue != None )
		PlaySoundCue( FlinchSoundCue, SLOT_None );
}

function PlayHitAnim( optional int idx )
{
	local int value;

	if( HitAnimlist.Length <= 0 || bPlayingHit )
		return;
	
	value = Rand( HitAnimlist.Length );

	//log( "Horse::PlayHitAnim() - queueing " $ HitAnimList[value], 'RSC' );
	AddAnimToQueue( HitAnimList[value], QUEUE_HIT_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15 );
	bPlayingHit=true;
	
	if( AttachedPawn != None )
		AttachedPawn.PlayHitAnim( value );
	
	//PlayHitSound();
}

function PlayHitSound()
{
	if( HitSoundCue != None )
		PlaySoundCue( HitSoundCue, SLOT_None );
}

function PlayDeathAnim( optional int idx )
{
	local int value;

	if( DeathAnimlist.Length <= 0 )
		return;
		
	value = Rand( DeathAnimlist.Length );

	//log( "Horse::PlayDeathAnim() - queueing " $ DeathAnimList[value], 'RSC' );
	AddAnimToQueue( DeathAnimList[value], QUEUE_DEATH_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15 );
	
	if( AttachedPawn != None )
		AttachedPawn.PlayDeathAnim( value );

	CurrentDeathIdleAnim = value;
	
	//PlayDeathSound();
}

function PlayDeathIdleAnim( optional int idx )
{
	if( DeathIdleAnimList.Length <= 0 )
		return;

	//log( "Horse::PlayDeathIdleAnim() - queueing " $ DeathIdleAnimList[CurrentDeathIdleAnim], 'RSC' );
	FlushAnimQueueChannel( 0 );
	AddAnimToQueue( DeathIdleAnimList[CurrentDeathIdleAnim], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, true, true, false, 1.0, 0.15 );
	
	if( AttachedPawn != None )
		AttachedPawn.PlayDeathIdleAnim( CurrentDeathIdleAnim );

	bPlayingDeathIdle=true;
}

function PlayDeathSound()
{	
	if( DeathSoundCue != None )
		PlaySoundCue( DeathSoundCue, SLOT_None );
}

simulated function NotifyNearbyTrace( Actor Other, vector TouchLocation, vector TouchNormal, vector End, vector Start, vector Extent, int TraceFlags )
{
	if( isDead() || 
		Other == None || 
		!Other.IsA( 'InstantFire' ) && 
		!Other.IsA( 'gbxGrenade' ) && 
		!(Other.IsA( 'InstantFireWeaponAttachment' ) && 
		Other.Role < ROLE_Authority) )
	{
		return;
	}

	PlayFlinchAnim();
}

function TakeDamage( int Damage, Pawn instigatedBy, Vector hitlocation, Vector momentum, class<DamageType> damageType, optional name HitBoxName )
{
	local Vector ZeroMomentum;

	if( isDead() )
		return;

	//log( "Horse::TakeDamage() - Horse Took " $ Damage $ " Damage From " $ instigatedBy $ " Using " $ damageType, 'RSC' );
	Super.TakeDamage( Damage, instigatedBy, hitlocation, ZeroMomentum, damageType, HitBoxName );

	if( Health > 0 )
	{
	    PlayHitAnim();
	}
	log( "Horse::TakeDamage() - Horse Now Has " $ Health $ " Health", 'RSC' );
}

simulated event PlayDying( class<DamageType> DamageType, vector HitLoc )
{
	FlushAnimQueueChannel( 0 );
	PlayDeathAnim();
	
	SetCollision( false, false, false );

	log( "Horse::PlayDying() - Horse Killed By " $ DamageType $ " at Location( " $ HitLoc $ " )", 'RSC' );
}

simulated event AnimEnd( int Channel )
{
	Super.AnimEnd( Channel );

	if( Health <= 0 )
	{
		//log( "Horse::PlayDying() - We Are Dead - Stop Animating!", 'RSC' );
		//StopAnimating();
		if( !bPlayingDeathIdle )
			PlayDeathIdleAnim();
	}
	else
	{
		CurrentIdleAnim++;
		PlayIdleAnim();
	}

	if( Channel == 0 )
	{
		bPlayingHit = false;
		bPlayingFlinch = false;
	}
}

function Tick( float Delta )
{
	Super.Tick( Delta );
}

defaultproperties
{
	DrawType=DT_Mesh
	EditorMeshName="k_prop.horsewagon_horse"
	Physics=PHYS_Walking

	MenuName="Horse"
	
	Health=250
	CollisionHeight=100.0
	CollisionRadius=135.0

	PawnTeam=Team_Animal

	CurrentIdleAnim=0
	bPlayingDeathIdle=false
	bPlayingHit=false
	bPlayingFlinch=false

	IdleAnimList(0)=horse_idle_1
	IdleAnimList(1)=horse_idle_2
	IdleAnimList(2)=horse_idle_3
	IdleAnimList(3)=horse_nervous_1
	IdleAnimList(4)=horse_nervous_2

	FlinchAnimList(0)=horse_startle_1
	FlinchAnimList(1)=horse_startle_2
	FlinchAnimList(2)=horse_startle_3

	//FlinchSound="D00_0230_SOUNDS.HORSE_WHINNY"

	HitAnimList(0)=horse_hit_1
	HitAnimList(1)=horse_hit_2
	HitAnimList(2)=horse_hit_3

	//HitSound="D00_0230_SOUNDS.HORSE_WHINNY"

	DeathAnimList(0)=horse_death_a
	DeathAnimList(1)=horse_death_b
	DeathAnimList(2)=horse_death_c

	//DeathSound="D00_0230_SOUNDS.HORSE_DEATH"

	DeathIdleAnimList(0)=horse_death_a_idle
	DeathIdleAnimList(1)=horse_death_b_idle
	DeathIdleAnimList(2)=horse_death_c_idle
}//=============================================================================
//	HorseCarriage - animated carriage that attaches to the horse
//	Created by: Ryan Conlon
//
//	this class assumes all animations correspond to the attached horse
//	and in will play the animations accordingly
//=============================================================================
class HorseCarriage extends gbxAnimal
	placeable;

var bool bIsDead;

simulated function PreBeginPlay()
{
	Mesh = Mesh( DynamicLoadObject( "k_prop.horsewagon_wagon", class'Mesh' ) );

	SetCollision( true, true, true );
	
	Super.PreBeginPlay();
}

simulated function PostLoadGame()
{
	PlayIdleAnim();

	Super.PostLoadGame();
}

simulated function Destroyed()
{
	Super.Destroyed();
}

simulated event bool TargetFriendly( Vector aHitLoc, Pawn SourcePawn, bool bfiring )
{
	// anyone can shoot me
	return false;
}

simulated function PostNetBeginPlay()
{
	Super.PostNetBeginPlay();
}

function PlayIdleAnim( optional int idx )
{
	if( IdleAnimList.Length <= 0 || idx > IdleAnimList.Length-1 )
		return;

	//log( "HorseCarriage::PlayIdleAnim() - queueing " $ IdleAnimList[idx], 'RSC' );
	bIsAnimating = AddAnimToQueue( IdleAnimList[idx], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, true, false, 1.0, 0.15 );
}

function PlayFlinchAnim( optional int idx)
{
	if( FlinchAnimlist.Length <= 0 || idx > FlinchAnimlist.Length-1 )
		return;

	//log( "HorseCarriage::PlayFlinchAnim() - queueing " $ FlinchAnimList[idx], 'RSC' );
	bIsAnimating = AddAnimToQueue( FlinchAnimList[idx], QUEUE_FLINCH_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15 );
}

function PlayHitAnim( optional int idx)
{
	if( HitAnimlist.Length <= 0 || idx > HitAnimlist.Length-1 )
		return;

	//log( "HorseCarriage::PlayHitAnim() - queueing " $ HitAnimList[idx], 'RSC' );
	bIsAnimating = AddAnimToQueue( HitAnimList[idx], QUEUE_HIT_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15 );
}

function PlayDeathAnim( optional int idx )
{
	if( DeathAnimlist.Length <= 0 || idx > DeathAnimlist.Length-1 )
		return;

	//log( "HorseCarriage::PlayDeathAnim() - queueing " $ DeathAnimList[idx], 'RSC' );
	bIsAnimating = AddAnimToQueue( DeathAnimList[idx], QUEUE_DEATH_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15 );
	bIsDead=true;
}

function PlayDeathIdleAnim( optional int idx )
{
	if( DeathIdleAnimList.Length <= 0 || idx > DeathIdleAnimList.Length-1 )
		return;

	//log( "Horse::PlayDeathIdleAnim() - queueing " $ DeathIdleAnimList[idx], 'RSC' );
	FlushAnimQueueChannel( 0 );
	AddAnimToQueue( DeathIdleAnimList[idx], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, true, true, false, 1.0, 0.15 );

	bIsAnimating=true;
}

function TakeDamage( int Damage, Pawn instigatedBy, Vector hitlocation, Vector momentum, class<DamageType> damageType, optional name HitBoxName )
{
	// do nothing
}

simulated event AnimEnd( int Channel )
{
	Super.AnimEnd( Channel );
	bIsAnimating = false;

	if( bIsDead )
		StopAnimating();
}

function Tick( float Delta )
{
	Super.Tick( Delta );
}

defaultproperties
{
	DrawType=DT_Mesh
	EditorMeshName="k_prop.horsewagon_wagon"
	Physics=PHYS_Walking

	MenuName="Horse Carriage"
	
	Health=0
	bIsDead=false
	CollisionHeight=0.0
	CollisionRadius=0.0

	PawnTeam=Team_None

	IdleAnimList(0)=horse_idle_1
	IdleAnimList(1)=horse_idle_2
	IdleAnimList(2)=horse_idle_3
	IdleAnimList(3)=horse_nervous_1
	IdleAnimList(4)=horse_nervous_2

	FlinchAnimList(0)=horse_startle_1
	FlinchAnimList(1)=horse_startle_2
	FlinchAnimList(2)=horse_startle_3

	HitAnimList(0)=horse_hit_1
	HitAnimList(1)=horse_hit_2
	HitAnimList(2)=horse_hit_3

	DeathAnimList(0)=horse_death_a
	DeathAnimList(1)=horse_death_b
	DeathAnimList(2)=horse_death_c

	DeathIdleAnimList(0)=horse_death_a_idle
	DeathIdleAnimList(1)=horse_death_b_idle
	DeathIdleAnimList(2)=horse_death_c_idle
}class Infantry extends WargamePawn
	native;


var vector                     DeathVelocity;

var	() array<sound>		PawnDamageSounds;

//var(Sounds) sound	DyingSounds[10];

//-----------------------------------------------------------------
// Nine-Point Blending Variables
//-----------------------------------------------------------------
// Channels used in nine-point blending.
//const NINEPOINT_CHANNEL0 = 16;
const NINEPOINT_CHANNEL0 = 0;
const NINEPOINT_CHANNEL1 = 17;
const NINEPOINT_CHANNEL2 = 18;
const NINEPOINT_BLENDBONE = 'Bip01 Spine1';

// Animation names used in nine-point blending.
var Mesh	OriginalMesh;			// Stores the normal mesh for safekeeping.
var Name	CurNinePointAnim1, CurNinePointAnim2;
var Name	ForwardDownAnim, ForwardLevelAnim, ForwardUpAnim,
			LeftDownAnim, LeftLevelAnim, LeftUpAnim,
			RightDownAnim, RightLevelAnim, RightUpAnim;
enum VerticalFacing		{VF_Up, VF_Center, VF_Down};
enum HorizontalFacing	{HF_Left, HF_Center, HF_Right};
var Name	NinePointBlendBone;

var float RagDeathFriction;

var bool bHasDefaultInventory;
var bool bRotateToFace;
var bool	m_bApplyDeferredImpulse;
var bool bShouldCheckForFriends;

var float TimeDied;
var float MinSecsBeforeDisappear;
var float MaxKarmaSeconds;

var int	RotationFatigueThresholdSP, RotationFatigueThresholdMP;

var() string			  MyInWorldIconClass;
var() InWorldSoldierIcon  MyInWorldIcon;

var	int		m_nLastYaw;

var Vector	m_vDeferredImpulse;
var float	m_flDeferredImpulseTime;
var int		NumChecksForFriend;

/*
function PlayDeathSound()
{
	local int nIndex;

	nIndex = Rand(10);

	PlaySound(DyingSounds[nIndex], SLOT_Pain, 12.0, false, 250.0, 1.0);
}
*/

simulated function PostNetBeginPlay()
{
	Super.PostNetBeginPlay();
//	Uncomment this to turn off bone calculation on the face by default.
//	SetSkeletalBranchExclusion( 'Blender' );
	m_bCurBoneCalcFrameOffset=Rand(m_bBoneCalcFrameOffset);
}

function CreateMyInWorldIcon()
{
	local class<InWorldSoldierIcon>	InWorldIconClass;

	if( MyInWorldIcon != None && MyInWorldIcon.bDeleteMe )
		MyInWorldIcon = None;

	if( MyInWorldIcon == None )
	{
		InWorldIconClass = class<InWorldSoldierIcon>( DynamicLoadObject( MyInWorldIconClass, class'Class' ));
		MyInWorldIcon = Spawn( InWorldIconClass );
		MyInWorldIcon.SetBase( self );
	}
}

simulated event Destroyed()
{
	Super.Destroyed();

	SecondaryWeapon = None;
	if (MyInWorldIcon != None)
	{
		MyInWorldIcon.Destroy();
		MyInWorldIcon = None;
	}
}

/* TimingOut - where gibbed pawns go to die (delay so they can get replicated)
*/
State TimingOut
{
	ignores BaseChange, Landed, AnimEnd, Trigger, Bump, HitWall, HeadVolumeChange, PhysicsVolumeChange, Falling, BreathTimer;

	function TakeDamage( int Damage, Pawn instigatedBy, Vector hitlocation,
							Vector momentum, class<DamageType> damageType, optional name HitBoxName)
	{
	}

	function BeginState()
	{
	}
}

simulated function ApplyRagdollVelocity(bool bApplyToStart, class<DamageType> DamageType, KarmaParamsSkel skelParams, vector HitLoc, vector aMomentum)
{
	// if bApplyToStart is set, then we want to apply the Karma velocity directly to the skelParams (for the initial creation of the ragdoll),
	// otherwise, we want to add an impluse velocity to the existing ragdoll skeleton...

	local vector shotDir, hitLocRel, deathAngVel, shotStrength;
	local float maxDim;
	local Vector PushLinVel, PushAngVel;

	if ((HitDamageType != None) && HitDamageType.default.bKUseOwnDeathVel)
	{
		RagDeathVel = HitDamageType.default.KDeathVel;
		RagDeathUpKick = HitDamageType.default.KDeathUpKick;
	}

	// Set the dude moving in direction he was shot in general
	shotDir = Normal(aMomentum);
	shotStrength = RagDeathVel * shotDir;

	hitLocRel = HitLoc - Location;

	// We scale the hit location out sideways a bit, to get more spin around Z.
	hitLocRel.X *= RagSpinScale;
	hitLocRel.Y *= RagSpinScale;
		
	// If the tear off momentum was very small for some reason, make up some angular velocity for the pawn
	if( VSize(aMomentum) < 0.01 )
	{
		deathAngVel = VRand() * 18000.0;
	}
	else
	{
		deathAngVel = RagInvInertia * (hitLocRel Cross (shotStrength));
	}

	skelParams.KFriction = RagDeathFriction;

	PushLinVel.X = FClamp( 0.6 * Velocity.X, -500.0f, 500.0f );
	PushLinVel.Y = FClamp( 0.6 * Velocity.Y, -500.0f, 500.0f );
	PushLinVel.Z = FClamp( 1.0 * Velocity.Z, -500.0f, 500.0f );

	PushLinVel += shotStrength;

	if (bApplyToStart)
	{
		skelParams.KStartLinVel = PushLinVel;
	}

	PushAngVel = deathAngVel;

	if (bApplyToStart)
	{
	   	skelParams.KStartAngVel = PushAngVel;
	}

	if (bApplyToStart)
	{
	   	// Set up deferred shot-bone impulse
		maxDim = Max(CollisionRadius, CollisionHeight);

	   	skelParams.KShotStart = HitLoc - (1 * shotDir);
   		skelParams.KShotEnd = HitLoc + (2*maxDim*shotDir);
	   	skelParams.KShotStrength = RagShootStrength;
	}

	// Special tweeks for explosions.
	if (DamageType.Default.m_bExplosiveDamage)
	{
		// If not moving downwards - give extra upward kick
		if( Velocity.Z > -10 )
			PushLinVel.Z += RagDeathUpKick;

		// Don't dampen effects so much
		skelParams.KLinearDamping = 0.0;
		skelParams.KAngularDamping = 1.0;

		if (bApplyToStart)
		{
			skelParams.KStartLinVel.Z = PushLinVel.Z;
		}
		else
		{
			PushLinVel.Z *= 2.0;
		}

		// Always make the angular velocity appear as if the dude was hit in the face
		PushAngVel = RagInvInertia * (hitLocRel Cross ( Normal(shotDir * vect(1,1,0)) * VSize(shotStrength) ));

		// Clamp these so excessively large Momentum's don't cause joint errors
		PushAngVel.X = FClamp( PushAngVel.X, -36767, 36767 );
		PushAngVel.Y = FClamp( PushAngVel.Y, -36767, 36767 );

		// Add some random twist to the body
		PushAngVel.Z = RandRange(-36767,36767);

		if (bApplyToStart)
		{
			skelParams.KStartAngVel = PushAngVel;
		}
	}
	else if ( DamageType.Name == 'DamageRunOver' )  // run over by vehicles and/or squished by something
	{
		shotDir = Normal(aMomentum);
		PushLinVel = (RagDeathVel * shotDir);
		PushAngVel = Normal(shotDir Cross vect(0, 0, 1)) * -18000;

		if (bApplyToStart)
		{
			skelParams.KStartAngVel = PushLinVel;
		}
	}

	if (!bApplyToStart)
	{
		KSetSkelVel( PushLinVel, PushAngVel );
		KAddImpulse( PushLinVel, Location );
	}
}


simulated event PlayDying(class<DamageType> DamageType, vector HitLoc)
{
	local KarmaParamsSkel skelParams;
	local int x;
	local IGbxPawnList PawnList;
	local bool PlayersRagdoll;

	// GBX:BB - Make sure ripples stop spawning
	if( WaterRippleEmitter != None )
		WaterRippleEmitter.Kill();

	// GBX:PAD: I need to put more logic here to properly clean up this stuff, but for now this will be good
	for (x = 0; x < MAX_SECONDARY_BUCKETS; x++)
	{
		SecondaryInventory[x] = None;
	}

	// GBX:naj - Copied from IAmDying().
	if (MyClaimedNavPoint != None)
		UnClaimNavPoint();

	// This guy is dead, so go ahead and get rid of his bullet listener since he really doesn't care about bullets any more.
	if (MyBulletListener != None)
	{
		MyBulletListener.Destroy();
		MyBulletListener = None;
	}
	
	// GBX:naj - Dead guys can't crew turrets.
	if ( bIsManningTurret )
	{
		Turret.NotifyCrewMemberDied( Self );
	}

	if( PlayerController(Controller) != None && PlayerController(Controller).ViewTarget == self )
		PlayersRagdoll = true;
			
	AmbientSound = None;
    bCanTeleport = false;
    bReplicateMovement = false;
    bTearOff = true;
    bPlayedDeath = true;

	HitDamageType = DamageType; // these are replicated to other clients
	TakeHitLocation = HitLoc;

	LifeSpan = RagdollLifeSpan;

	if (!bTriggerOnDeathFired)
	{
		bTriggerOnDeathFired = true;  // prevent from being called twice
		TriggerEvent(TriggerOnDeath, Controller, Self);
	}

	ResetRootRotation();
	//PlayDeathSound();

	if ( (Level != None) && (Level.NetMode != NM_DedicatedServer) )
	{
		// In low physics detail, if we were not just controlling this pawn,
		// and it has not been rendered in 3 seconds, just destroy it.
		if(Level.PhysicsDetailLevel == PDL_Low && (Level.TimeSeconds - LastRenderTime > 3) )
		{
			if (Level.bPoolPawns && (Level.NetMode == NM_StandAlone))
			{
				bHidden = true;
				SetCollision( false, false, false );
				SetPhysics( PHYS_None );
			}
			else
			{
				Destroy();
			}
			return;
		}
	}

	// non-ragdoll death fallback
	Velocity += TearOffMomentum;

    BaseEyeHeight = Default.BaseEyeHeight;

    //PlayDirectionalDeath(HitLoc);
    DeathVelocity = Velocity;

	// Possibly throw off helmet
	CheckHelmetHit(DamageType,100);

	m_fAutoSetFrameOffset=false;
	m_bBoneCalcFrameOffset=0;
	m_bCurBoneCalcFrameOffset=0;

	// If we managed to find a name, try and make a rag-doll slot available.
	if( !bUseCustomDeathAnim && (RagdollOverride != "") )
	{
		KMakeRagdollAvailable();
	}

	if( !bUseCustomDeathAnim && KIsRagdollAvailable() && (RagdollOverride != "") )
	{
		skelParams = KarmaParamsSkel(KParams);
		skelParams.KSkeleton = RagdollOverride;

		StopAnimating( true );

		// apply the velocity to the Karma ragdoll...
		ApplyRagdollVelocity(true, DamageType, skelParams, HitLoc, TearOffMomentum);

    	// Turn on Karma collision for ragdoll.
		KSetBlockKarma(true);
		
		// Set physics mode to ragdoll.
		// This doesn't actaully start it straight away, it's deferred to the first tick.
		SetPhysics(PHYS_KarmaRagdoll);

		// If viewing this ragdoll, set the flag to indicate that it is 'important'
		if( PlayersRagdoll )
			skelParams.bKImportantRagdoll = true;

		skelParams.KActorGravScale = 1.0;
	}
	else
	{
		if (!bUseCustomDeathAnim)
			log(self$".PlayDying( "$DamageType$", "$HitLoc$" ) - Couldn't start Karma death.", 'pad');

		bBlockZeroExtentTraces = false;
		bBlockNonZeroExtentTraces = false;
		bDontFrustumCull = true;  // set this because the death animation causes the mesh to wind up outside the collision cylinder

		// fallback code taken from base class. It never runs there, but we want it to run here.
		StopAnimating(true);
		m_fRunningTorsoAnim = false;
		PlayDyingAnim(DamageType,HitLoc);
	}
	
	// This code used to be in the if{} block above but that caused Bug 2946, so now we always do these things. 2004-11-08 JWS
	// GBX:naj - last thing: unregister ourself with the pawnlist.
	//class'WargamePawn'.default.PawnList.UnRegisterGbxPawn( Self );
	if (!Level.bPoolPawns || (Level.NetMode != NM_StandAlone))
	{
		// GBX:naj - last thing: unregister ourself with the pawnlist.
		//class'WargamePawn'.default.PawnList.UnRegisterGbxPawn( Self );
		PawnList = Level.GetPawnList();
		gbxPawnList( PawnList ).UnRegisterGbxPawn( Self );

		if (MyInWorldIcon != None)
		{
			MyInWorldIcon.Destroy();
			MyInWorldIcon = None;
		}
	}
	bInvulnerableBody = true;
	GotoState('Dying');
}

/* This involves a lot more work, so lets save it for BIA2 or the add on. */
/*
simulated function bool CheckForFriend()
{
	local int index;
	local float flDist, flMinDist;
	local gbxPawn FriendlyPawn, ClosestPawn;

	ClosestPawn = None;
	flMinDist = 0.0f;

	index = GetNextTeammateByTeam( PawnTeam, 0, FriendlyPawn );

	while (index != -1)
	{
		if ((FriendlyPawn != self) && !FriendlyPawn.IsDead())
		{
			if (FriendlyPawn.Controller.Enemy != None)  // if this Pawn is busy right now, skip to next pawn...
			{
				index = GetNextTeammateByTeam( PawnTeam, index, FriendlyPawn );
				continue;
			}

			flDist = VSize(Location - FriendlyPawn.Location);

			if ((ClosestPawn == None) || (flDist < flMinDist))
			{
				ClosestPawn = FriendlyPawn;
				flMinDist = flDist;
			}
		}

		index = GetNextTeammateByTeam( PawnTeam, index, FriendlyPawn );
	}

	if ((ClosestPawn != None) && ClosestPawn.Controller.IsA('gbxAIController'))
	{
		return gbxAIController(ClosestPawn.Controller).GoToDeadGuy( self );
	}

	return false;
}
*/

State Dying
{
	ignores Trigger, BreathTimer;
	
	event ChangeAnimation() {}
	event StopPlayFiring() {}
	function PlayFiring(float Rate, int FiringMode) {}
	function PlayWeaponSwitch(Weapon NewWeapon) {}
	//function PlayTakeHit(vector HitLoc, int Damage, class<DamageType> damageType) {}
	simulated function PlayNextAnimation() {}

	function Tick( float DeltaTime )
	{
		local PhysicsVolume V;
		local Vector HitLoc, HitNormal;

		Super.Tick(DeltaTime);

		// BB - An infantry pawn got shot and is dying.  As he falls, check to see
		//		if he falls into some water.  If he does, splash and then make sure he doesn't
		//		splash again.

		if(!bInWater)
		{
			ForEach TouchingActors(class'PhysicsVolume',V)
			{
				if ( V.bWaterVolume )
				{
					//Create water ring at the top of the water volume
					if(!V.TraceThisActor(HitLoc, HitNormal,Location, Location+500*vect(0,0,1.0)))
					{
						if( WaterImpactCue == None )
							WaterImpactCue = LoadSound( WaterImpactCueName );

						if( WaterImpactCue != None )
							PlaySoundCue( WaterImpactCue, SLOT_None );

						Spawn(class'gbxEffects.WaterSplashLarge',,,HitLoc,rot(16384,0,0));
						bInWater=true;
					}
				}
			
			}
		}

	}

	function Died(Controller Killer, class<DamageType> damageType, vector HitLocation)
	{
	}

	event FellOutOfWorld(eKillZType KillType)
	{
		if(KillType == KILLZ_Lava || KillType == KILLZ_Suicide )
			return;

		Destroy();
	}

	function Timer()
	{
		local float delta, desiredTimerCall;
		local int i;
		local bool playerSeeMeTest;
		local PlayerController PC;

		desiredTimerCall = 0;

		// Turn off karma if it has been too long.
		if( MaxKarmaSeconds >= 0 )
		{
			delta = Level.TimeSeconds - TimeDied;
			if( delta >= MaxKarmaSeconds )
			{
				KFreezeRagdoll();
				karma_need_to_wakeup = true;
				SetPhysics( PHYS_None );
//				SetCollision( true, true, true );
//				m_fNoCalcBones = true;
//				SetPhysics( PHYS_None );
				if (IsAPlayerPawn())
				{
					Level.Game.SetGameSpeed(1.0);
				}
			}
			else
			{
				// Try again later.
				desiredTimerCall = delta;
			}
		}

		if (!Level.bPoolPawns || (Level.NetMode != NM_StandAlone))
		{
			if (Shadow != None)
				Shadow.Destroy();
		}

		if( !bNoDelete && MinSecsBeforeDisappear >= 0 )
		{
			// Destroy the pawn if it has been a goodly time and the player isn't looking.
			delta = Level.TimeSeconds - TimeDied;

			if (Level.NetMode == NM_StandAlone)
			{
				playerSeeMeTest = PlayerCanSeeMe();
			}
			else
			{
				playerSeeMeTest = false;

				for( PC = Level.PlayerControllerList; PC != None; PC = PC.nextPlayerController) 
				{
					if ( (PC.Pawn == self) || (PC.ViewTarget == self) )
					{
						playerSeeMeTest = true;
						break;
					}
				}
			}

			if( delta >= MinSecsBeforeDisappear && !playerSeeMeTest )
			{
				for( i = 0; i < ExtendedAttachments.Length; i++ )
				{
					if (ExtendedAttachments[i] != None)
					{
						if (ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart != None)
						{
							log(self$".Destroyed() - "$ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart);
							ExtendedDetachment( ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart );
							ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart.Destroy();
							ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart = None;
//							ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart.bHidden = true;
						}
					}
				}
				if (!Level.bPoolPawns || (Level.NetMode != NM_StandAlone))
				{
					Destroy();
				}
				else
				{
					bHidden = true;
					SetCollision( false, false, false );
					SetPhysics( PHYS_None );
					GotoState('');
				}
				return;
			}
			else
			{
				// Try again later.
				desiredTimerCall = 5;
			}
		}

		if( desiredTimerCall > 0 )
		{
			SetTimer( desiredTimerCall, false );
		}
	}

/*
	function Landed(vector HitNormal)
	{
		local rotator finalRot;

		LandBob = FMin(50, 0.055 * Velocity.Z);
//		if( Velocity.Z < -500 )
//			TakeDamage( (1-Velocity.Z/30),Instigator,Location,vect(0,0,0) , class'Crushed');

		finalRot = Rotation;
		finalRot.Roll = 0;
		finalRot.Pitch = 0;
		setRotation(finalRot);
//		SetPhysics(PHYS_None);
//		SetCollision(true, false, false);

		if ( !IsAnimating(0) )
			LieStill();
	}
*/
	/* ReduceCylinder() made obsolete by ragdoll deaths */
	function ReduceCylinder()
	{
//		SetCollision(false, false, false);
	}

	function LandThump()
	{
		// animation notify - play sound if actually landed, and animation also shows it
		if ( Physics == PHYS_None)
			bThumped = true;
	}

/*
	function LieStill()
	{
		if ( !bThumped )
			LandThump();
//		SetCollision(false, false, false);
	}
*/
	singular function BaseChange()
	{
//		if( base == None )
//			SetPhysics(PHYS_Falling);
//		else if ( Pawn(base) != None ) // don't let corpse ride around on someone's head
//      	ChunkUp( Rotation, class'Fell' );
	}

	function TakeDamage( int Damage, Pawn instigatedBy, Vector HitLocation,
							Vector Momentum, class<DamageType> damageType, optional name HitBoxName)
	{
		local vector ApplyImpulse;
		local vector HitNormal;
		local KarmaParamsSkel skelParams;

		if (bInvulnerableBody || Level.NetMode != NM_Standalone)
		{
			return;
		}

//		if ((Level.TimeSeconds - TimeDied) < 3.0f)
//		{
//			// GBX:PAD: Until this guy has had a chance to come to rest, do not take damage since it could
//			// interfere with his death animation.
//			return;
//		}

		if (karma_need_to_wakeup)
		{
			if (!damageType.Default.m_bExplosiveDamage && (damageType.Name != 'DamageRunOver'))
			{
				return;
			}

			// If we managed to find a name, try and make a rag-doll slot available.
			if( RagdollOverride != "" )
			{
				KMakeRagdollAvailable();
			}
			
			if( KIsRagdollAvailable() && (RagdollOverride != "") )
			{
				karma_need_to_wakeup = false;

				skelParams = KarmaParamsSkel(KParams);
				skelParams.KSkeleton = RagdollOverride;

				StopAnimating( true );
				
    			// Turn on Karma collision for ragdoll.
				KSetBlockKarma(true);

				// Set physics mode to ragdoll.
				// This doesn't actaully start it straight away, it's deferred to the first tick.
				SetPhysics(PHYS_KarmaRagdoll);

				skelParams.KActorGravScale = 1.0;
			}
		}
		
		if (bPlayedDeath && Physics == PHYS_KarmaRagdoll)
		{
			skelParams = KarmaParamsSkel(KParams);
			
			HitNormal = Normal(hitlocation - Location);
			spawn(class'gbxBloodEffectLittle',,, hitlocation+HitNormal, Rotator(HitNormal));

			// only apply a velocity to dead Karma ragdolls if the damage was explosive or runover...
			if (damageType.Default.m_bExplosiveDamage || (damageType.Name == 'DamageRunOver'))
			{
				if (LastKAddImpulseTime + 3.0f < Level.TimeSeconds)
				{
					LastKAddImpulseTime = Level.TimeSeconds;
					ApplyRagdollVelocity(false, DamageType, skelParams, HitLocation, Momentum);
				}
			}

			if ( bTearOff && (Level.NetMode == NM_DedicatedServer) )
				LifeSpan = 1.0;
			else
			{
				if( MaxKarmaSeconds >= 0 )
				{
					if( MinSecsBeforeDisappear < 0 )
					{
						SetTimer( FMax( 2.0, MaxKarmaSeconds ), false);
					}
					else
					{
						SetTimer( FMin( MaxKarmaSeconds, MinSecsBeforeDisappear ), false);
					}
				}
				else if( MinSecsBeforeDisappear >= 0 )
				{
					SetTimer( FMax( 2.0, MinSecsBeforeDisappear ), false);
				}
			}
			
			return;
		}

		//Log("TakeDamage: "$self);

		if(damageType.default.KDamageImpulse > 0)
		{
			if(VSize(momentum) < 0.001)
			{
				// DEBUG
				//Log("Zero momentum to KActor.TakeDamage");
				// END DEBUG
				return;
			}

			if (damageType.default.bInstantHit == False)
			{
				if (LastKAddImpulseTime + 3.0f < Level.TimeSeconds)
				{
					LastKAddImpulseTime = Level.TimeSeconds;
					ApplyImpulse = Normal(momentum) * damageType.default.KDamageImpulse * 2.000000;
					if (ApplyImpulse.Z < 0.000000)
					ApplyImpulse.Z = ApplyImpulse.Z - (ApplyImpulse.Z * 2.000000);
					ApplyImpulse.Z *= 10.000000;
					KAddImpulse(ApplyImpulse, hitlocation, 'Bip01 Spine1');
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (LastKAddImpulseTime + 3.0f < Level.TimeSeconds)
				{
					LastKAddImpulseTime = Level.TimeSeconds;
					ApplyImpulse = Normal(momentum) * damageType.default.KDamageImpulse;
					KAddImpulse(ApplyImpulse, hitlocation);
				}
			}
		}

		bPlayedDeath = True;
	}

	function BeginState()
	{
		// BB - Check to see if the infantry pawn is already in water when shot
		if(PhysicsVolume.bWaterVolume)
			bInWater=true;		
		
		if ( (LastStartSpot != None) && (LastStartTime - Level.TimeSeconds < 6) )
			LastStartSpot.LastSpawnCampTime = Level.TimeSeconds;
		SetCollision(true,false,false);
//        SetPhysics(PHYS_Falling);

		TimeDied = Level.TimeSeconds;

        if (!bNoDelete)
        {
			if ( bTearOff && (Level.NetMode == NM_DedicatedServer) )
				LifeSpan = 1.0;
			else
			{
				if( MaxKarmaSeconds >= 0 )
				{
					if( MinSecsBeforeDisappear < 0 )
					{
						SetTimer( FMax( 2.0, MaxKarmaSeconds ), false);
					}
					else
					{
						SetTimer( FMin( MaxKarmaSeconds, MinSecsBeforeDisappear ), false);
					}
				}
				else if( MinSecsBeforeDisappear >= 0 )
				{
					SetTimer( FMax( 2.0, MinSecsBeforeDisappear ), false);
				}
			}
		}
		if ( Controller != None )
		{
			if ( Controller.bIsPlayer )
				Controller.PawnDied(self);
			else
				Controller.Destroy();
		}
	}

Begin:
	Sleep(0.15);
	bInvulnerableBody = false;
	PlayDyingSound();

// This doesn't work right now, and it will take a bit to fix it, so lets save it for BIA2 or the add on.
/*
	NumChecksForFriend = 0;
CheckFriend:
	if (Level.NetMode == NM_Standalone) // In multiplayer it is really annoying for your AI guys to take off running looking for your dead body.
	{
		if ( bShouldCheckForFriends )
		{
			Sleep(1.0);
			NumChecksForFriend++;
			if ((NumChecksForFriend < 10) && !CheckForFriend())
			{
				Goto('CheckFriend');
			}
		}
	}
*/
}

/* DisplayDebug()
list important actor variable on canvas.  Also show the pawn's controller and weapon info
*/
simulated function DisplayDebug(Canvas Canvas, out float YL, out float YPos)
{
	Super.DisplayDebug(Canvas, YL, YPos);

	if ( SecondaryWeapon == None )
	{
		Canvas.SetDrawColor(0,255,0);
		Canvas.DrawText("NO SECONDARY WEAPON");
		YPos += YL;
		Canvas.SetPos(4,YPos);
	}
	else
		SecondaryWeapon.DisplayDebug(Canvas,YL,YPos);
}

function SetFearCost()
{
	local int FearCostIndex;

	FearCostIndex = 0;

	if (PawnTeam == TEAM_US)
		FearCostIndex = 1;
	else if (PawnTeam == TEAM_German)
		FearCostIndex = 2;

	//SDJ 07/14/2004: Should never use the navigation point list on the client.
	if ((Level.NetMode == NM_Client) || (FearCostIndex == 0))
	{
		return;
	}

	FearCostIndex--;  // make zero relative

	if ( MyUnit != None )
	{
		MyUnit.SetFearCost( Self, FearCostIndex );
	}	
}

function Died(Controller Killer, class<DamageType> damageType, vector HitLocation)
{
    local Vector TossVel;
    local int m;

	// GBX:naj - this code must come before Super.Died(), cuz Weapon will == None after it.
	if ( Weapon.IsA( 'TurretWeapon' ) )
	{
		TurretWeapon(Weapon).GunnerDied( Self );
	}

	//Stop any looping firing sounds that might have been playing when the pawn died
	for ( m = 0; m < Weapon.NUM_FIRE_MODES; m++)
    {
        if (Weapon.FireModeClass[m] != None)
        {
			if (Weapon.FireMode[m].bIsFiring)
			{
                log(self$".Died() Weapon: "$Weapon$ " is currently firing, so calling StopFire()", 'DevSound');
                Weapon.StopFire(m);
            }
        }
    }

	SetFearCost();

	Super.Died( Killer, damageType, HitLocation );

    if (SecondaryWeapon != None)
    {
        TossVel = Vector(GetViewRotation());
        TossVel = TossVel * ((Velocity Dot TossVel) + 500) + Vect(0,0,200);
        TossSecondaryWeapon(TossVel);
    }
}

// toss out a weapon
function TossSecondaryWeapon(Vector TossVel)
{
	local Vector X,Y,Z;

	SecondaryWeapon.Velocity = TossVel;
	GetAxes(Rotation,X,Y,Z);
	SecondaryWeapon.DropFrom(Location + 0.8 * CollisionRadius * X - 0.5 * CollisionRadius * Y);
}

// Set the characters weapon to a specific one (mostly used for setting mounted weapons).
function SetWeapon( Weapon aWeapon )
{
	log( self$ " Infantry::SetWeapon() aWeapon: "$aWeapon, 'DevAnim' );
	
	PendingWeapon = aWeapon;

	if ( Weapon != None )
	{
		Weapon.PutDown();
	}
	else
	{
		ChangedWeapon();
	}
}

// Add Item to this pawn's inventory.
// Returns true if successfully added, false if not.
function bool AddInventory( inventory NewItem )
{
	// Skip if already in the inventory.
	local inventory Inv;
	local actor Last;
	local int	nBucket;

	Last = self;

	// The item should not have been destroyed if we get here.
	if (NewItem == None )
		return False;

	if (((gbxWeapon( NewItem ) != None) && (gbxWeapon( NewItem ).m_eWeaponType == WeaponSecondary)) ||
		(gbxUsableItem( NewItem ) != None))
	{
		if (gbxWeapon( NewItem ) != None)
			nBucket = gbxWeapon( NewItem ).m_bWeaponBucket;
		else
			nBucket = gbxUsableItem( NewItem ).m_bItemBucket;

		if (nBucket >= MAX_SECONDARY_BUCKETS)
		{
			Log( "Bucket for "$NewItem$" set too high!" );
			return false;
		}

		for( Inv=SecondaryInventory[nBucket]; Inv!=None; Inv=Inv.Inventory )
		{
			if ((Inv.Class == NewItem.Class) && NewItem.bCanHaveMultipleCopies && (Powerups(NewItem) != None))
			{
				Powerups(Inv).NumCopies = Powerups(Inv).NumCopies + 1;
				return false;
			}
			if( Inv == NewItem )
			{
				return false;
			}
			Last = Inv;
		}
		if (Last == self)
		{
			SecondaryInventory[nBucket] = NewItem;
			PendingSecondaryWeapon = NewItem;
			if (gbxUsableItem(NewItem) != None)
			{
				NewItem.SetOwner(Self); //SDJ 06/09/2004: Grenades need their owner set so that the replicated function ClientWeaponSet() can actually make it to the owner client.
				gbxUsableItem(NewItem).ClientWeaponSet(true);
			}
			else if (gbxWeapon(NewItem) != None)
				gbxWeapon(NewItem).ClientWeaponSet(true);
		}
		else
			Last.Inventory = NewItem;
	}
	else
	{
		for( Inv=Inventory; Inv!=None; Inv=Inv.Inventory )
		{
			if( Inv == NewItem )
				return false;
			Last = Inv;
		}
		if (Last != None)
			Last.Inventory = NewItem;
	}

	// Add to back of inventory chain (so minimizes net replication effect).
	NewItem.SetOwner(Self);
	NewItem.Inventory = None;

	if ( Controller != None )
		Controller.NotifyAddInventory(NewItem);
	return true;
}

function name GetWeaponBoneFor(Inventory I)
{
	if (gbxWeapon(I) != None)
	{
		if (gbxWeapon(I).m_eWeaponType == WeaponPrimary)
		{
			if (m_fWeaponRightHand)
				return gbxWeapon(I).GetWeaponBone();
			else
				return 'rifle_hold_lefthand';
		}
		else
			return gbxWeapon(I).GetWeaponBone();
	}

	return 'rifle_hold';
}

function name GetHolsterBoneFor(Inventory I)
{
	if (gbxWeapon(I) != None)
	{
		return gbxWeapon(I).GetHolsterBone();
	}

	return 'rifle_hold';
}

/* We're in the state of changing our height, so prevent other idles and whatnot from interrupting until we're done
*/
State WaitForFlinch
{
	ignores PlayWaiting, PlayFiring;

	event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		if (Channel == 0)
		{
//			GotoState(m_szOldState);
			GotoState('');
			PlayWaiting();
		}
	}

	function BeginState()
	{
	}
}

//---------------------------------------------------------
//	PlayWaiting
//---------------------------------------------------------
simulated function PlayWaiting( optional bool bSkipTween )
{
	// Overridden to prevent rogue animations being played while
	// manning a turret weapon.
	if ( IsTransitioning() )
	{
		return;
	}
	else if ( bIsManningTurret )
	{
		if ( Job == Job_MG42_Gunner )
			PlayAnim( ForwardLevelAnim,,, NINEPOINT_CHANNEL0);
		else if ( Job == Job_Placing_TNT )
			return;
		else
			AddAnimToQueue( PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnIdleAnim( self ), QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, true, false, 1.0, 0.15, class'PawnAnimRandomIdleCallback' );
	}
	else
	{
		Super.PlayWaiting( bSkipTween );
	}
}

//---------------------------------------------------------
//	PlayMoving
//---------------------------------------------------------
simulated function PlayMoving()
{
	// Overridden to prevent rogue animations being played while
	// manning a turret weapon.
	if ( IsTransitioning() )
	{
		return;
	}
	else if ( bIsManningTurret )
	{
		if ( Job == Job_MG42_Gunner )
			PlayAnim( ForwardLevelAnim,,, NINEPOINT_CHANNEL0);
		else
			AddAnimToQueue( PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnIdleAnim( self ), QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, true, false, 1.0, 0.15, class'PawnAnimRandomIdleCallback');
	}
	else
	{
		Super.PlayMoving();
	}
}

//---------------------------------------------------------
//	PrepareToMount
//---------------------------------------------------------
function PrepareToMount()
{
	ResetLookAtImmediate(true, true, true);
	StopLookAt( true, true, true );
	bDoTorsoTwist = false;
}

//---------------------------------------------------------
//	SetTurretAnims
//---------------------------------------------------------
function SetTurretAnims(  Name MountAnim, Name DismountAnim )
{
	TurretMountAnim = MountAnim;
	TurretDismountAnim = DismountAnim;

	log( self$ " Infantry::SetTurretAnims( TurretMountAnim: "$TurretMountAnim$", TurretDismountAnim: "$TurretDismountAnim$")", 'DevAnim' );
}

//---------------------------------------------------------
//	RotateTurret
//---------------------------------------------------------
event RotateTurret( Rotator Rot )
{
	if (Weapon != None && Weapon.IsA('TurretWeapon'))
	{
		TurretWeapon(Weapon).FaceRotation( Rot );
	}
}

//---------------------------------------------------------
//	SetNinePointAnimations
//---------------------------------------------------------
function SetNinePointAnimations(Name ForDown, Name ForLev, Name ForUp,
								Name LeftDown, Name LeftLev, Name LeftUp,
								Name RightDown, Name RightLev, Name RightUp)
{
	ForwardDownAnim = ForDown;
	ForwardLevelAnim = ForLev;
	ForwardUpAnim = ForUp;
	LeftDownAnim = LeftDown;
	LeftLevelAnim = LeftLev;
	LeftUpAnim = LeftUp;
	RightDownAnim = RightDown;
	RightLevelAnim = RightLev;
	RightUpAnim = RightUp;
}

//---------------------------------------------------------
//	DoNinePointBlending
//---------------------------------------------------------
// Perform nine-point blending, which blends three single-frame animations to produce
// an interpolated pose for the infantry pawn.
function DoNinePointBlending(NinePointDir Dir1, float BlendAlpha1, NinePointDir Dir2, float BlendAlpha2, optional bool fTorsoOnly)
{
	local Name Dir1Anim, Dir2Anim;

	if (BlendAlpha2 > 0.01) {
		if (fTorsoOnly)
		{
			AnimBlendParams(NINEPOINT_CHANNEL2, BlendAlpha2, 0.0f, 0, NINEPOINT_BLENDBONE);
		}
		else
		{
			AnimBlendParams(NINEPOINT_CHANNEL2, BlendAlpha2, 0.0f, 0);
		}
	}
	if (BlendAlpha1 > 0.01) {
		if (fTorsoOnly)
		{
			AnimBlendParams(NINEPOINT_CHANNEL1, BlendAlpha1, 0.0f, 0, NINEPOINT_BLENDBONE);
		}
		else
		{
			AnimBlendParams(NINEPOINT_CHANNEL1, BlendAlpha1, 0.0f, 0);
		}
	}

	// Dir1 denotes the first animation to blend.  The first animation
	// should be an "edge animation" (aligned with one of the cardinal
	// directions of up, down, left, or right).
	//
	// Dir2 denotes the second animation to blend.
	// It represents a "diagonal animation" (aligned with one
	// of the diagonal directions: e.g. up-left, down-right, etc.
	//
	switch(Dir1) {
		case NPD_UpLeft:
			Dir1Anim = LeftUpAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_UpCenter:
			Dir1Anim = ForwardUpAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_UpRight:
			Dir1Anim = RightUpAnim;
			break;
		//--------------
		case NPD_MidLeft:
			Dir1Anim = LeftLevelAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_MidCenter:
			Dir1Anim = ForwardLevelAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_MidRight:
			Dir1Anim = RightLevelAnim;
			break;
		//--------------
		case NPD_LowLeft:
			Dir1Anim = LeftDownAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_LowCenter:
			Dir1Anim = ForwardDownAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_LowRight:
			Dir1Anim = RightDownAnim;
			break;
	}

	switch(Dir2) {
		case NPD_UpLeft:
			Dir2Anim = LeftUpAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_UpCenter:
			Dir2Anim = ForwardUpAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_UpRight:
			Dir2Anim = RightUpAnim;
			break;
		//--------------
		case NPD_MidLeft:
			Dir2Anim = LeftLevelAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_MidCenter:
			Dir2Anim = ForwardLevelAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_MidRight:
			Dir2Anim = RightLevelAnim;
			break;
		//--------------
		case NPD_LowLeft:
			Dir2Anim = LeftDownAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_LowCenter:
			Dir2Anim = ForwardDownAnim;
			break;
		case NPD_LowRight:
			Dir2Anim = RightDownAnim;
			break;
	}

	// Play the new Dir1 animation if it has changed.
	if (Dir1Anim != CurNinePointAnim1) {
		CurNinePointAnim1 = Dir1Anim;
		LoopAnim(CurNinePointAnim1, 1.0, 0.1, NINEPOINT_CHANNEL1);
	}

	// Play the new Dir2 animation if it has changed.
	if (Dir2Anim != CurNinePointAnim2) {
		CurNinePointAnim2 = Dir2Anim;
		LoopAnim(CurNinePointAnim2, 1.0, 0.1, NINEPOINT_CHANNEL2);
	}
}

//---------------------------------------------------------
//	StopNinePointBlending
//---------------------------------------------------------
function StopNinePointBlending()
{
	AnimBlendParams(NINEPOINT_CHANNEL1, 0, 0.0f, 0);
	AnimBlendParams(NINEPOINT_CHANNEL2, 0, 0.0f, 0);
	PlayAnim( CurNinePointAnim1, NINEPOINT_CHANNEL1 );
	PlayAnim( CurNinePointAnim2, NINEPOINT_CHANNEL2 );
}

//---------------------------------------------------------
//	CanCrewTurret
//---------------------------------------------------------
function bool CanCrewTurret( TurretWeapon TheTurret )
{
	// Ask the Mind if it's ok to crew.
	if ( Controller != None && Controller.IsA( 'gbxAIController' ) )
	{
		log( self$ " Infantry::CanCrewTurret() asking gbxAIController if can recruit", 'DevAnim' );
		return gbxAIController( Controller ).CanCrewTurret( TheTurret );
	}
	else
	{
		log( self$ " Infantry::CanCrewTurret() returning true!", 'DevAnim' );
		return true;
	}
}

function CrewTurret( TurretWeapon NewTurret, class<gbxAIController> NewMindClass, EJobType NewJob )
{
	local gbxAIController NewMind;

	Turret = NewTurret;

	if ( Controller.IsA( 'Mind' ) )
	{
		NewMind = gbxAIController( Controller ).ChangeMind( NewMindClass );
		NewMind.StartJob( NewJob );
	}
}

function BreakOutOfJob()
{
	if ( Controller.IsA( 'gbxAIController' ) )
	{
		gbxAIController( Controller ).BreakOutJustMe();
	}
}

simulated function FaceRotation( rotator NewRotation, float DeltaTime )
{
	local	Vector	CamLookAt;
	//local	Rotator	PawnBodyRotation;
	//local	int		DeltaRotation;
	local	TurretWeapon aTurretWeapon;

	// GBX:naj - added 7/28/03 - if the pawn is on a turret weapon,
	// tell the weapon to rotate, not the possessed pawn.
	if ( bIsManningTurret )
	{
		if (Weapon != None && Weapon.IsA('TurretWeapon'))
		{
			aTurretWeapon = TurretWeapon(Weapon);
			aTurretWeapon.FaceRotation( NewRotation );
			SetLookAtPoint( Location + 1000.0 * Vector( NewRotation ), false, true );
		}
		return;
	}

	if (bDoTorsoTwist)
	{
		Super.FaceRotation( NewRotation, DeltaTime );
		return;
	}

	ViewPitch = NewRotation.Pitch;

	if ( Physics == PHYS_Ladder )
		SetRotation(OnLadder.Walldir);
	else
	{
		if (!bIsProne)
		{
			if (IsHumanControlled())
			{
//				CamLookAt = (Location + EyePosition()) + (vect(60, 0, 0) >> NewRotation);
				CamLookAt = MeshEyePosition + (vect(60, 0, 0) >> NewRotation);
				SetAimAtPoint( CamLookAt, true );
			}
		}
/*
			if (bRotateToFace)
			{
				if ( (Physics == PHYS_Walking) || (Physics == PHYS_RootMotion) || (Physics == PHYS_Falling) )
					NewRotation.Pitch = 0;

				DeltaRotation = AngleDiff( Rotation.Yaw, NewRotation.Yaw );
				PawnBodyRotation = NewRotation;
				if (DeltaRotation < 0)
					PawnBodyRotation.Yaw = Rotation.Yaw + max( DeltaRotation, (DeltaTime * -13000));
				else
					PawnBodyRotation.Yaw = Rotation.Yaw + min( DeltaRotation, (DeltaTime * 13000));
				if (PawnBodyRotation.Yaw < 0)
					PawnBodyRotation.Yaw = 65535 + PawnBodyRotation.Yaw;
				else if (PawnBodyRotation.Yaw > 65535)
					PawnBodyRotation.Yaw = PawnBodyRotation.Yaw - 65535;
				SetRotation(PawnBodyRotation);

				if (Abs(DeltaRotation) < 1.0)
					bRotateToFace = false;
			}
		}
		else
		{
*/
			if ( (Physics == PHYS_Walking) || (Physics == PHYS_Falling) )
				NewRotation.Pitch = 0;
			SetRotation(NewRotation);
/*
		}
*/
	}
}

function FireSecondary( optional float F )
{
    if( SecondaryWeapon!=None )
    {
		if (gbxWeapon( SecondaryWeapon ) != None)
			gbxWeapon( SecondaryWeapon ).Fire(F);
		else if (gbxUsableItem( SecondaryWeapon ) != None)
			SecondaryWeapon.Use(F);
	}
}

// Just changed to pendingSecondaryWeapon
function ChangedSecondaryWeapon()
{
//	local Weapon OldWeapon;

	if (PendingSecondaryWeapon == None)
		return;

    ServerChangedSecondaryWeapon(SecondaryWeapon, PendingSecondaryWeapon);
    if (Role < ROLE_Authority)
	{
		SecondaryWeapon = PendingSecondaryWeapon;
		PendingSecondaryWeapon = None;
	}
	SecondaryWeapon.Instigator = self;

	if ( SecondaryWeapon != None )
	{
		//log("ServerChangedWeapon: Attaching Weapon to actor bone.");
		SecondaryWeapon.AttachToPawn(self);
	}
}

simulated event UpdateTorsoRotation( float DeltaTime, Rotator NewRotation )
{
	//local	Rotator	PawnBodyRotation;
	local	int		DeltaRotation;

	// GBX:naj - added 7/28/03 - if the pawn is on a turret weapon,
	// tell the weapon to rotate, not the possessed pawn.
	if (Weapon != None && Weapon.IsA('TurretWeapon'))
	{
		return;
	}

	// GBX:PAD: The player control of this is handled above, so blow this off if this pawn is a player.
	if ((Controller == None) || Controller.bIsHumanPlayer)
	{
		return;
	}

	ViewPitch = NewRotation.Pitch;

//	if (FootTurning && (Controller.Focus == None))
//		bRotateToFace = true;

	DeltaRotation = AngleDiff( Rotation.Yaw, NewRotation.Yaw );
	if (((abs(DeltaRotation) > 5000) && (Controller.Focus == None)) || !bDoTorsoTwist)
		bRotateToFace = true;

	//GBX:naj - This block of code is bad!  It overwrites the results of any logic that
	// may have come before it in the tick.  UpdateTorsoRotation() is called at the end
	// of UpdateLookDir() and is generally the last code to touch bIsAtAiming before any
	// calls to IsAimingAtTarget().
	// GBX:PAD: Lets try an experiment here.  Ultimately, the idea behind this is that, when automatically rotating
	// the guy to face thier target if the torso can't turn to face it, you need to make sure that the guy isn't still
	// rotating.  This check basically tests the range of the torso rotation against how much the entire body is rotating.
	// The idea is that the torso has already been turning also, so even though the body hasn't rotated all the way yet,
	// more than likely the torso has will be facing the target before the body finishes rotating.  Thus the large range
	if (abs(DeltaRotation) < 10000)
	{
		bIsAtAiming = true;
	}
	else
	{
		bIsAtAiming = false;
	}

	if (!bIsAtAiming)
	{
		if (gbxWeapon(Weapon) != None)
		{
			if (gbxWeapon(Weapon).m_nAIWeaponBurstCount > 0)
			{
				gbxWeapon(Weapon).InvalidateBurst();
			}
		}
	}
}

function bool IsAPlayerPawn()
{
	return false;
}

event Approaching(Actor Other, Vector OtherMovementDirection)
{
	// some other Actor is approaching this gbxPawn...

	// can't do anything for players, maybe tell the approaching actor to wait instead of running over me?
	if (IsAPlayerPawn())
		return;

	//Log(name $ ".Approaching() - I am about to get run over by " $ Other.name );

	if ( Controller != None && Controller.IsA( 'gbxAIController' ) )
	{
		gbxAIController( Controller ).Approaching( Other, OtherMovementDirection );
	}
}


function MatchStarting()
{
	local MeshAnimation	aMeshAnim;
	local ExtendedAttachmentInfo	anEAInfo;
	local String facialPackage;
	local int	i, j;
	local bool	fFound;

	Super.MatchStarting();

	if (IsDead())
	{
//		SetPhysics(PHYS_KarmaRagdoll);
//		BeginState();
		Destroy();
		return;
	}
	else
	{
		facialPackage = GetCharacterFacialPackage();
		
		if (facialPackage != "")
		{
			log(self$" emotion package set to " $ facialPackage);
			aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation(DynamicLoadObject(facialPackage, class'MeshAnimation'));
			if (aMeshAnim != None)
			{
				LinkSkelAnim(aMeshAnim);
			}
		}

		if (Level.bUrbanCover)
		{
			aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation(DynamicLoadObject("a_corner_city.a_corner_city",class'MeshAnimation'));
		}
		else
		{
			aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation(DynamicLoadObject("a_corner_standard.a_hold_rifle",class'MeshAnimation'));
		}
		if (aMeshAnim != None)
		{
			LinkSkelAnim(aMeshAnim);
		}
		aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation(DynamicLoadObject(PawnAnimInfoClass.Default.WeaponAnimSet,class'MeshAnimation'));
		if (aMeshAnim != None)
		{
			if (MeshAnim != None)
				UnlinkSkelAnim(MeshAnim, false);
			if (LinkSkelAnim(aMeshAnim))
			{
				MeshAnim = aMeshAnim;
				MeshAnimName = PawnAnimInfoClass.Default.WeaponAnimSet;
				CurMeshAnimName = MeshAnimName;
			}
			bInitializeAnimation = false;
			
			RestartAnimQueue();
			PlayWaiting();
			PlayMoving();
		}
	}

	fFound = false;
	for (i = 0; i < ExtendedAttachments.Length; i++)
	{
		if ((ExtendedAttachments[i].m_nmSocketName == 'Head') && (ExtendedAttachments[i].m_nmPartName == GetCharacterHead()))
		{
			fFound = true;
			if (ExtendedAttachments[0].m_szGroupName != "")
				ExtendedAttachmentNamedGroup( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_szGroupName );
			else
				ExtendedAttachment( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmSocketName, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmPartName );
			break;
		}
	}
	
	if (!fFound)
	{
		if (DrawType != DT_StaticMesh)
		{
			if (GetCharacterHead() != '')
			{
				anEAInfo = new( Level.Outer ) class'ExtendedAttachmentInfo';
				anEAInfo.m_nmSocketName = 'Head';
				anEAInfo.m_nmPartName = GetCharacterHead();

				ExtendedAttachments[0] = anEAInfo;
				if (ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart == None)
					ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart = Spawn( class'AttachedPart', self );
				if (ExtendedSkins.Length > 0)
				{
					for (j = 0; j < ExtendedSkins.Length; j++)
					{
						if (ExtendedSkins[j] != None)
						{
							ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart.Skins[j] = ExtendedSkins[j];
						}
					}
				}
				if (ExtendedAttachments[0].m_szGroupName != "")
					ExtendedAttachmentNamedGroup( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_szGroupName );
				else
					ExtendedAttachment( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmSocketName, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmPartName );
			}
		}
	}

	SetVoiceType( GetCharacterVoiceType( Level.IsDemoBuild() ) );
	if (m_flLegScale == 1.0f)
	{
		m_flLegScale = GetCharacterScale();
		if (m_flLegScale != 1.0f)
		{
			ChangeCharacterHeight();
		}
	}
}

simulated event PostRespawnPlay()
{
	Super.PostRespawnPlay();
	
	SetCollisionSize( Default.CollisionHeight, Default.CollisionRadius );
	SetCollision( true, true, true );
}

defaultproperties
{
	// Infantry Pawns shouldn't accept projectors (otherwise tank/grenade/etc blast marks will get placed on them)
	bAcceptsProjectors=false

	bNoDefaultInventory=false
	//BaseEyeHeight=79.0	moved to gbxPawn out of necessity...
	//EyeHeight=79.0		moved to gbxPawn out of necessity...
	//CrouchHeight=51.0		moved to gbxPawn out of necessity...

	// WARNING!!! - These MUST match the values defined in Engine\NavigationPoint.uc...
	CollisionHeight=84.0
	CollisionRadius=28.0
	CrouchRadius=28.0
	ProneHeight=25.0
	ProneRadius=28.0

    RagdollLifeSpan=0.0
	RagDeathVel=200
	RagInvInertia=5
	RagShootStrength=1500
	RagSpinScale=2.0
	RagDeathUpKick=0
	RagDeathFriction=0.6

    Begin Object Class=KarmaParamsSkel Name=InfantrySquibble
		KSkeleton="temp_ragdoll"
		KRestitution=0.2
		KBuoyancy=0.9
	    KStartEnabled=True
		KImpactThreshold=500
		KVelDropBelowThreshold=0.06
		KConvulseSpacing=(Min=0.5,Max=2.2)
        bDestroyOnSimError=True
		KLinearDamping=0.1
		KAngularDamping=8.0
		bKDoubleTickRate=True
		KMass=1.0
		KActorGravScale=1.25
		KFriction=0.6
		bHighDetailOnly=False
		bKImportantRagdoll = true;
    End Object
    KParams=KarmaParams'InfantrySquibble'

	RagdollOverride="temp_ragdoll"

	PawnDamageSounds(0)=Sound'IMPACTS.BULLET_BODY'

	m_fWeaponRightHand=true

	bCanGoProne=false
	bDoTorsoTwist=true
	eWeaponAimedState=WAS_Relaxed

	MinSecsBeforeDisappear=-1
	MaxKarmaSeconds=6.0

	m_bBoneCalcFrameOffset=0
	m_bCurBoneCalcFrameOffset=0
	m_bMaxBoneCalcFrameOffset=0
	m_fAutoSetFrameOffset=true

	bPawnBlinks=true
	bCanPickupInventory=False

	bShouldCheckForFriends=false
	bBlockKarma=True
	bBlockActors=True

	RotationFatigueThresholdSP=10923	// 60 deg
	RotationFatigueThresholdMP=8192		// 45 deg
}

	DEGoreLeftArm,
	DEGoreRightArm,
	DEGoreLeftLeg,
	DEGoreRightLeg

simulated function PostNetBeginPlay()
{
	Super.PostNetBeginPlay();
//	Uncomment this to turn off bone calculation on the face by default.
	SetSkeletalBranchExclusion( 'Blender' );
}
