function Died(Controller Killer, class<DamageType> damageType, vector HitLocation)
{	
	Super.Died( Killer, damageType, HitLocation );
	
	if (Killer.bIsHumanPlayer)
		Level.NumKills += 1;
	else
		Level.NumAIKills += 1;
}

simulated function EnteringTacticalView()
{
//	TeamLogoShadow.ShadowActor = Self;
	TeamLogoShadow.SetProjectorActor( self );
}

simulated function LeavingTacticalView()
{
//	TeamLogoShadow.ShadowActor = None;
	TeamLogoShadow.SetProjectorActor( None );
}

event PreRenderActor()
{
	Super.PreRenderActor();
}

simulated function int GetNumGoreTextures()
{
	return PawnPackGoreClass.Static.GetNumPackGoreTextures();
}

simulated function Texture GetGoreTexture( int nLimb )
{
	return PawnPackGoreClass.Static.GetPackGoreTexture( nLimb );
/*
	switch( MyUnit.BaseSkillLevel )
	{
		case SKILL_Novice:
			return( GoreTextureNames[GORE_CONSCRIPT_K98_NONE + nLimb] );
			break;
		case SKILL_Intermediate:
			return( GoreTextureNames[GORE_INFANTRY_K98_NONE + nLimb] );
			break;
		case SKILL_Advanced:
			return( GoreTextureNames[GORE_PANZER_K98_NONE + nLimb] );
			break;
		case SKILL_Veteran:
			return( GoreTextureNames[GORE_PARA_MP40_NONE + nLimb] );
			break;
	}
*/
}

simulated function SetWeaponAnims( class<ItemPawnAnimInfo> AnimInfoClass, bool bUnlinkOldAnims )
{
	local	Texture	aModGrid;
	
	Super.SetWeaponAnims( AnimInfoClass, bUnlinkOldAnims );
	if ((Level.NetMode == NM_Standalone) && (PawnPackGoreClass == None))
	{
		if ((Weapon != None) && Weapon.IsA('gbxWeapon'))
		{
			switch( Level.BaseUnitSkillLevel )
			{
				case SKILL_Novice:
					PawnPackGoreClass = gbxWeapon(Weapon).DEPawnPackGoreClass[0];
					break;
				case SKILL_Intermediate:
					PawnPackGoreClass = gbxWeapon(Weapon).DEPawnPackGoreClass[1];
					break;
				case SKILL_Advanced:
					PawnPackGoreClass = gbxWeapon(Weapon).DEPawnPackGoreClass[2];
					break;
				case SKILL_Veteran:
					PawnPackGoreClass = gbxWeapon(Weapon).DEPawnPackGoreClass[3];
					break;
			}
			
			if (PawnPackGoreClass != None)
			{
				aModGrid = GetGoreTexture(0);
				if (aModGrid != None)
				{
					m_aModGrid = aModGrid;
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

simulated event PlayDying(class<DamageType> DamageType, vector HitLoc)
{
	local	int	nRandLimb;
	local	Texture	aModGrid;
	
	Super.PlayDying( DamageType, HitLoc );

	if (DamageType.Default.m_bExplosiveDamage && !(Level.bNoGore))
	{
		nRandLimb = Rand( GetNumGoreTextures() );
		aModGrid = GetGoreTexture(nRandLimb);
		if (aModGrid != None)
		{
			m_aModGrid = aModGrid;
		}
		if (PawnPackGoreClass != None)
		{
			m_aHeadHandEnable = PawnPackGoreClass.Static.GetPackGoreHandState( nRandLimb );
		}
	}
	
	// In case the player is in tactical view when I die.
	LeavingTacticalView();
}

simulated event PostRespawnPlay()
{
	Super.PostRespawnPlay();
	
	Health = Default.Health;

	RequiredEquipment[0]=Default.RequiredEquipment[0];
}

class InfantryUSA extends Infantry;

enum EFacialBlendingState
{
	E_None,
	E_BlendingIn,
	E_Holding,
	E_BlendingOut,
	E_Disabled
};

var() bool bDisableFacialExpressions;
var name FacialExpressionAnim;
var name FacialExpressionNullAnim;
var float FacialExpressionCheckDistanceTime;
var float FacialExpressionDistance;
var EFacialBlendingState FacialExpressionBlendingState;
var float FacialExpressionBlendStartTime;
var float FacialExpressionBlendInDuration;
var float FacialExpressionHoldTime;
var float FacialExpressionBlendOutDuration;
var float FacialExpressionOffTimeBase;
var float FacialExpressionOffTimeDelta;
var float FacialExpressionNULLTime;
var array<name> FacialExpressionAnimListSmirk;
var array<name> FacialExpressionAnimListScowl;

// GBX::RSC - flag to toggle Salutations
var bool bAllowSalutations;

const TALK_TO_PLAYER_DISTANCE = 768;
const USE_PAWN_MESSAGE_DISTANCE = 128.0f;

const MP_DEAD_BODY_MIN_SECONDS_BEFORE_DISAPPEAR = 30;
const MP_SPLIT_SCREEN_DEAD_BODY_MIN_SECONDS_BEFORE_DISAPPEAR = 15;

var String	PickupCueName;
var Cue		PickupCue;

simulated function PostNetBeginPlay()
{
//	local ExtendedAttachmentInfo	anEAInfo;
//	local int						j;

	Super.PostNetBeginPlay();
	
	if ((!bNoShadow) && (Level.Game.bNoShadows == False) && (Level.NetMode == NM_Standalone))
	{
		Shadow = Spawn(class'ShadowProjector',None,'',Location);
		Shadow.ShadowActor = self;
		Shadow.LightDirection = vect(0,0,1);
		Shadow.bBlobShadow = Level.Game.bBlobShadowsOnly;
		Shadow.LightDistance = 250;
		Shadow.MaxTraceDistance = 350;
		Shadow.RootMotion = true;
		Shadow.InitShadow(None, true);
	}

	//SDJ 03/18/2004: Temporary way to assign heads to client side AI guys. This is essentially a copy of how players get their heads.
	// GBX:PAD: I've commented this out and moved the code elsewhere (in PostNetReceive).  So, lets see if that fix is the right
	// one and, if so, we can get rid of this.
/*
	if (!IsA('gbxPlayerPawn') && (Role < ROLE_Authority))
	{
		anEAInfo = new( Level.Outer ) class'ExtendedAttachmentInfo'; // GBX:naj - modified 3/11/04
		anEAInfo.m_nmSocketName = 'Head';
		anEAInfo.m_nmPartName = 'us_para_head_frank';

		ExtendedAttachments[0] = anEAInfo;
		if (ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart == None)
			ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart = Spawn( class'AttachedPart', self );
		if (ExtendedSkins.Length > 0)
		{
			for (j = 0; j < ExtendedSkins.Length; j++)
			{
				if (ExtendedSkins[j] != None)
				{
					ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart.Skins[j] = ExtendedSkins[j];
				}
			}
		}
		if (ExtendedAttachments[0].m_szGroupName != "")
			ExtendedAttachmentNamedGroup( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_szGroupName );
		else
			ExtendedAttachment( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmSocketName, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmPartName );
	}
*/

	//SDJ 07/09/2004: In MP we need to set MinSecsBeforeDisappear so this AI guy's dead body will disappear.
	if ( (Level.NetMode != NM_Standalone) )
	{
		if (IsSplitScreen())
		{
			MinSecsBeforeDisappear = MP_SPLIT_SCREEN_DEAD_BODY_MIN_SECONDS_BEFORE_DISAPPEAR;
		}
		else
		{
			MinSecsBeforeDisappear = MP_DEAD_BODY_MIN_SECONDS_BEFORE_DISAPPEAR;
		}
	}

	if ((Level.NetMode == NM_Client) && (PawnTeam != TEAM_None) && (TeamLogoShadow == None))
	{
		CreateTeamLogoShadowByTeam();
	}
}

event DisableAutoFacialExpression( bool bDisable )
{
	bUseSmirkFacialExpressions = !bDisable;
	bUseScowlFacialExpressions = !bDisable;
	FacialExpressionBlendInDuration = Default.FacialExpressionBlendInDuration;
	FacialExpressionBlendOutDuration = Default.FacialExpressionBlendOutDuration;
	FacialExpressionHoldTime = Default.FacialExpressionHoldTime;
}

simulated function Tick(float Delta)
{
	Super.Tick( Delta );

	if (!bDisableFacialExpressions)
		UpdateFacialExpression();
}

function SetFacialExpression( name szFacialAnim )
{
	// can only set facial animation when one isn't already in progress
	if (FacialExpressionBlendingState == E_None)
		FacialExpressionAnim = szFacialAnim;
}

function DisableFacialExpression( float flDuration )
{
	FacialExpressionBlendingState = E_Disabled;

	// don't check for player distance for a while...
	FacialExpressionCheckDistanceTime = Level.TimeSeconds + flDuration;

	FlushAnimQueueChannel( EMOTIONCHANNEL, true );
}

function UpdateFacialExpression()
{
	local PlayerController PC;
	local float deltaTime;
	local float distance;
	local float percent;
	local int num;

	if (FacialExpressionBlendingState == E_BlendingIn)  // are we currently blending in?
	{
		deltaTime = Level.TimeSeconds - FacialExpressionBlendStartTime;

		if (deltaTime > FacialExpressionBlendInDuration)
		{
			FacialExpressionBlendingState = E_Holding;
			FacialExpressionBlendStartTime = Level.TimeSeconds;
		}
		else
		{
			// what percent of the way are we done?
			percent = deltaTime / FacialExpressionBlendInDuration;

			AnimFacialExpression(FacialExpressionAnim, 1.0, 0.0, percent);
		}
	}
	else if (FacialExpressionBlendingState == E_Holding)
	{
		deltaTime = Level.TimeSeconds - FacialExpressionBlendStartTime;

		if (deltaTime > FacialExpressionHoldTime)  // time to start blending out?
		{
			FacialExpressionBlendingState = E_BlendingOut;
			FacialExpressionBlendStartTime = Level.TimeSeconds;
		}
	}
	else if (FacialExpressionBlendingState == E_BlendingOut)  // are we currently blending out to normal?
	{
		deltaTime = Level.TimeSeconds - FacialExpressionBlendStartTime;

		if (deltaTime > FacialExpressionBlendOutDuration)
		{
			FacialExpressionBlendingState = E_None;

			// don't check for player distance for a while...
			FacialExpressionCheckDistanceTime = Level.TimeSeconds + FacialExpressionOffTimeBase + (FacialExpressionOffTimeDelta * FRand());
			FacialExpressionNULLTime = Level.TimeSeconds + 1.0f;

			AnimFacialExpression(FacialExpressionNullAnim, 1.0, 0.0, 1.0);
		}
		else
		{
			// what percent of the way are we done?
			percent = 1.0 - (deltaTime / FacialExpressionBlendOutDuration);

			AnimFacialExpression(FacialExpressionAnim, 1.0, 0.0, percent);
		}
	}
	else if (FacialExpressionBlendingState == E_None) // not currently playing a facial animation...
	{
		if ((FacialExpressionNULLTime > 0.0f) && (FacialExpressionNULLTime < Level.TimeSeconds))
		{
			FlushAnimQueueChannel( EMOTIONCHANNEL );
			FacialExpressionNULLTime = 0.0f;
		}

		if (FacialExpressionCheckDistanceTime < Level.TimeSeconds)
		{
			FacialExpressionCheckDistanceTime = Level.TimeSeconds + 0.5;

			if (Controller == None || (Controller.Enemy == None))  // only do facial expressions if this Pawn doesn't have an enemy
			{
				// check if the player is fairly close to us...
				PC = Level.GetLocalPlayerController();

				if ((PC != None) && (PC.Pawn != None))
				{
					distance = VSize(PC.Pawn.Location - Location);

					if (distance < FacialExpressionDistance)
					{
						if (IsPawnFacingActor(PC.Pawn, 0.7))  // about +/- 45 degree view cone
						{
							num = 0;  // indicate not facial expression chosen yet
							if (bUseSmirkFacialExpressions && bUseScowlFacialExpressions)
							{
								if ((FRand() < 0.5) && (FacialExpressionAnimListSmirk.Length > 0))
								{
									num = FacialExpressionAnimListSmirk.Length;
									if (num > 0)
									{
										FacialExpressionAnim = FacialExpressionAnimListSmirk[Rand(num)];
									}
								}
								else
								{
									num = FacialExpressionAnimListScowl.Length;
									if (num > 0)
									{
										FacialExpressionAnim = FacialExpressionAnimListScowl[Rand(num)];
									}
								}
							}
							else if ((bUseSmirkFacialExpressions) && (FacialExpressionAnimListSmirk.Length > 0))
							{
								num = FacialExpressionAnimListSmirk.Length;
								if (num > 0)
								{
									FacialExpressionAnim = FacialExpressionAnimListSmirk[Rand(num)];
								}
							}
							else if ((bUseScowlFacialExpressions) && (FacialExpressionAnimListScowl.Length > 0))
							{
								num = FacialExpressionAnimListScowl.Length;
								if (num > 0)
								{
									FacialExpressionAnim = FacialExpressionAnimListScowl[Rand(num)];
								}
							}

							if (num > 0)  // did we select a facial animation to display?
							{
								FacialExpressionBlendingState = E_BlendingIn;
								FacialExpressionBlendStartTime = Level.TimeSeconds;
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	else  // Facial blending is disabled for a little while.
	{
		if (FacialExpressionCheckDistanceTime < Level.TimeSeconds)
		{
			FacialExpressionBlendingState = E_None;
		}
	}
}

function bool CanCrewTurret(  TurretWeapon TheTurret )
{
	if ( TheTurret.IsA( 'WeapDEMG42_' ) )
	{
		if ( ( TheTurret.Level.Game.GameReplicationInfo.GameType == GT_SKIRMISH ) && ( !TheTurret.Level.Game.IsPawnOnSameTeamAsPlayerByEnum(PawnTeam) ) )
		{
			//log( self$ " InfantryUSA::CanCrewTurret() Turret IS a WeapDEMG42_!  Returning Super.CanCrewTurret", 'MP' );
			return Super.CanCrewTurret( TheTurret );
		}
		else
		{
			//log( self$ " InfantryUSA::CanCrewTurret() returning false!", 'MP' );
			return false;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		//log( self$ " InfantryUSA::CanCrewTurret() Turret is not a WeapDEMG42_!  Returning Super.CanCrewTurret", 'MP' );
		return Super.CanCrewTurret( TheTurret );
	}
}

function LookAtPlayerOverShoulder( bool bLook )
{
	if ( bLook )
	{
		m_flPlayerLookAtDotProduct = -1.0f;				// To allow the pawn to look at targets behind him.
		fNextPlayerLookAtTime = Level.TimeSeconds;		// To force the next AgbxPawn::Tick() to look at the player.
	}
	else
	{
		m_flPlayerLookAtDotProduct = Default.m_flPlayerLookAtDotProduct;
	}
}

function RespondToPlayerUse()
{
	log( "InfantryUSA::RespondToPlayerUse()", 'RSC' );
	if ( !IsHumanControlled() && Controller.IsA( 'gbxAIController' ) )
	{
		gbxAIController( Controller ).RespondToPlayerUse();
	}
}

event bool UsedBy(Pawn User)
{
	if (Controller.IsA('ScriptedController'))
	{
		return false;
	}
	if (Level.NetMode != NM_StandAlone)
	{
		return false;
	}
	if (!(User.Weapon.IsAmmoFull()) && User.Weapon.AmmoMatches( Weapon ) && bAllowSalutations )
	{
		if (User.Weapon.IsA('gbxWeapon'))
		{
			gbxWeapon(User.Weapon).RestockWeapon();
			User.ReceiveLocalizedMessage(class'gbxAmmoReceivedMessage', m_nCharType);

			HandleCueLoadAndPlay( PickupCueName, PickupCue );

			Level.TheAISpeechManager.PlaySpeech( 
				self, 
				User,
				'TakeAmmo',
				,
				,
				0.0, 
				MyUnit, 
				1.0, 
				0.5 
			);
		}
	}
	else if( !Super.UsedBy( User ) && (Health > 0) && bAllowSalutations && (Controller.Enemy == None) )
	{
		RespondToPlayerUse();
	}
	return true;
}

function AllowSalutations( bool allowSalutations )
{
	bAllowSalutations = allowSalutations;
}
	
function JoinUnit( name UnitTag, optional bool bForceBecomingLeader )
{
	local Unit	MyOldUnit;
	
	MyOldUnit = MyUnit;
	Super.JoinUnit( UnitTag, bForceBecomingLeader );
	if ((DrawType == DT_Mesh) && (MyOldUnit == None) && !Controller.bIsHumanPlayer)
		Level.TotalSquadMembersInMap += 1;
}

function LeaveCurrentUnit()
{
	local Unit	MyOldUnit;
	
	MyOldUnit = MyUnit;
	Super.LeaveCurrentUnit();
	if ((DrawType == DT_Mesh) && (Health > 0) && (MyOldUnit != None) && !Controller.bIsHumanPlayer)
		Level.TotalSquadMembersInMap -= 1;
}

function Died(Controller Killer, class<DamageType> damageType, vector HitLocation)
{
	if ((MyUnit != None) && (DrawType == DT_Mesh))
		Level.SquadMembersKilled += 1;
		
	if (GetPlayerLeader() != None)
	{
		Level.MissionManager.bSquadmateHasDied = true;
	}		
	Super.Died( Killer, damageType, HitLocation );
}

simulated event PlayDying(class<DamageType> DamageType, vector HitLoc)
{
	Super.PlayDying( DamageType, HitLoc );

	// In case the player is in tactical view when I die.
	LeavingTacticalView();
	
}

simulated function EnteringTacticalView()
{
	if ( Shadow != None )
//		Shadow.ShadowActor = None;
		Shadow.SetProjectorActor( None );

//        TeamLogoShadow.ShadowActor = Self;
	TeamLogoShadow.SetProjectorActor( self );
}

simulated function LeavingTacticalView()
{
//	TeamLogoShadow.ShadowActor = None;
	TeamLogoShadow.SetProjectorActor( None );
	
	if ( Shadow != None )
//		Shadow.ShadowActor = self;
		Shadow.SetProjectorActor( self );
}

simulated event bool TargetFriendly( Vector aHitLoc, Pawn SourcePawn, bool bFiring )
{
	Super.TargetFriendly( aHitLoc, SourcePawn, bFiring );
	
	if (Level.NetMode == NM_Standalone)
	{
		m_flLastDisplayPawnInfo = Level.TimeSeconds;
		bPawnInfoIconOnly = false;

		if (bFiring)
			m_flLastDisplayPawnNoShoot = Level.TimeSeconds;
		return true;
	}
	
	return false;
}

simulated event PostRespawnPlay()
{
	Super.PostRespawnPlay();
	
	Health = Default.Health;

	RequiredEquipment[0]=Default.RequiredEquipment[0];
}

	G_OverthrowFactor=60.0

	bPawnLooksAtTargets=true

	//m_flPlayerLookAtDotProduct=0.7071  // +/- 45 degrees
	m_flPlayerLookAtDotProduct=0.0

	bDisableFacialExpressions=false
	FacialExpressionAnim="emotion_NULL"

	FacialExpressionAnimListScowl(1)="emotion_SCOWL_2"

	myInspectorClass=class'gbxCharacters.gbxInspectorInfantryUSA'

	fUseGorePackShader=false

	MeleeDamage=1000.0
