	bAllowSalutations=true

	PickupCueName="PLAYER.PickupAmmo"
}
class InWorldSoldierIconGermany extends InWorldSoldierIcon;



defaultproperties
{
	MaterialU=288
	MaterialV=129
}
class InWorldSoldierIconUS extends InWorldSoldierIcon;



defaultproperties
{
	MaterialU=242
	MaterialV=129
}
class MeleeAttackCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	local WargamePawn WGPawn;

	if (aPawn.IsA( 'WargamePawn' ) )
	{
		WGPawn = WargamePawn( aPawn );
		WGPawn.m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = false;
		WGPawn.StopTransitioning();

		WGPawn.PlayWaiting();
		WGPawn.PlayMoving();

		if ( WGPawn.Controller.IsA( 'gbxAIController' ) )
		{
			gbxAIController( WGPawn.Controller ).NotifyMeleeAnimFinished();
		}
		return true;
	}

	return false;
}
//=============================================================================
// PawnAnimDeployCallback
//
//	This is a wrapper for BeginState and EndState functionality for an animation a pawn is running
//  It handles setting and resetting states related to reloading a weapon.
//
//=============================================================================
class PawnAnimDeployCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn )
{
//	if (gbxPawn(aPawn) != None)
//	{
//		gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fWeaponRightHand = false;
//		aPawn.Weapon.AttachToPawn( aPawn );
//		return true;
//	}
//
	return false;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	if (fNoStart)
	{
		return false;
	}

//	if (gbxPawn(aPawn) != None)
//	{
//		gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fWeaponRightHand = true;
//		aPawn.Weapon.AttachToPawn( aPawn );
//		return true;
//	}

	return false;
}
//=============================================================================
// PawnAnimDispositionCallback
//
//	This is a wrapper for BeginState and EndState functionality for an animation a pawn is running
//	This takes care of resetting flags related to the pawns disposition (e.g. crouched, wall hug, etc).
//
//=============================================================================
class PawnAnimDispositionCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn )
{
	if (gbxPawn(aPawn) != None)
	{
		gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = true;
//		gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fStartDispositionChange = false;

		return true;
	}

	return false;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	local WargamePawn WGPawn;

	/*
	if (fNoStart)
	{
		return false;
	}
	*/

	if (aPawn.IsA( 'WargamePawn' ) )
	{
		WGPawn = WargamePawn( aPawn );
		WGPawn.m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = false;
		WGPawn.StopTransitioning();

		if ( fNoStart )
			return false;

		if (!WGPawn.bIsCrouched)
			WGPawn.m_bIsCowering = false;
			
		WGPawn.PlayWaiting();
		WGPawn.PlayMoving();

		return true;
	}

	return false;
}
//=============================================================================
// PawnAnimFireCallback
//
//	This is a wrapper for BeginState and EndState functionality for an animation a pawn is running
//  It handles running the reload animation after the fire animation if the gun is empty.
//
//=============================================================================
class PawnAnimFireCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn );

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	if (aPawn.Controller.ReloadAfterWeaponFire() && aPawn.Weapon.NeedsToReload() && (aPawn.Controller.IsA('gbxAIController') || aPawn.Weapon.IsA('WeapDEPanzerfaust') || aPawn.Weapon.IsA('WeapUSBazooka')))
	{
		aPawn.Weapon.ForceReload();
		return true;
	}

	return false;
}
// DEPRECATE THIS CLASS

class PawnAnimFlinchCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;


static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn )
{
	local InfantryUSA	aFriendly;
	
	if ( aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).StartFlinching();

		if ( aPawn.IsA( 'InfantryUSA' ) )
		{
			aFriendly = InfantryUSA(aPawn);			
			aFriendly.DisableFacialExpression( 20.0f );
		}
	}
	return false;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	local InfantryUSA	aFriendly;
	
	if ( aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).StopFlinching();

		if (!fNoStart)
		{
			if ( aPawn.IsA( 'InfantryUSA' ) )
			{
				aFriendly = InfantryUSA(aPawn);				
				aFriendly.FacialExpressionBlendingState = aFriendly.EFacialBlendingState.E_None;
				aFriendly.FacialExpressionCheckDistanceTime = aFriendly.Level.TimeSeconds;
			}
		}
	}
	
	return false;
}
//=============================================================================
// PawnAnimHandSwitchCallback
//
//	This is a wrapper for BeginState and EndState functionality for an animation a pawn is running
//  It handles switching the hand the weapon is attached to before and after the animation.
//
//=============================================================================
class PawnAnimHandSwitchCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn )
{
	if ((gbxPawn(aPawn) != None) && (aPawn.Weapon != None))
	{
		gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fWeaponRightHand = false;
		aPawn.Weapon.AttachToPawn( aPawn );
		return true;
	}

	return false;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	if (fNoStart)
	{
		return false;
	}

	if (gbxPawn(aPawn) != None)
	{
		gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fWeaponRightHand = true;
		aPawn.Weapon.AttachToPawn( aPawn );
		return true;
	}

	return false;
}
//=============================================================================
// PawnAnimHolsterCallback
//
//	This is a wrapper for BeginState and EndState functionality for an animation a pawn is running
//  It handles setting and resetting states related to reloading a weapon.
//
//=============================================================================
class PawnAnimHolsterCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn )
{
//	if (gbxPawn(aPawn) != None)
//	{
//		gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fWeaponRightHand = false;
//		aPawn.Weapon.AttachToPawn( aPawn );
//		return true;
//	}
//
	return false;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	if (fNoStart)
	{
		return false;
	}

//	if (gbxPawn(aPawn) != None)
//	{
//		gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fWeaponRightHand = true;
//		aPawn.Weapon.AttachToPawn( aPawn );
//		return true;
//	}

	return false;
}
//=============================================================================
// PawnAnimRandomIdleCallback
//
//	This is a wrapper for BeginState and EndState functionality for an animation a pawn is running
//	This takes care of starting another random idle at the end of one animation in the loop.  If I don't do this, they
//  loop the same anim over and over again, which looks odd.
//
//=============================================================================
class PawnAnimRandomIdleCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	if (fNoStart)
		return false;

	if (fInterrupt)
		return false;
		
	if ( !aPawn.bIsManningTurret && gbxPawn(aPawn) != None && gbxPawn(aPawn).PawnAnimInfoClass != None )
	{
		// GBX:PAD: OK.  This really sucks, but I've hardcoded in this 90, which is the animation priority for idles.
		// I'll have to ultimately figure out a better place to define these constants that is accessible elsewhere.
		aPawn.AddAnimToQueue(gbxPawn(aPawn).PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnIdleAnim( aPawn ), 90, false, true, false, 1.0, 0.15, class'PawnAnimRandomIdleCallback');
		return true;
	}

	if ( aPawn.Controller.IsA( 'gbxAIController' ) )
		gbxAIController( aPawn.Controller ).NotifyIdleFinished();

	return false;
}
//=============================================================================
// PawnAnimReloadCallback
//
//	This is a wrapper for BeginState and EndState functionality for an animation a pawn is running
//  It handles setting and resetting states related to reloading a weapon.
//
//=============================================================================
class PawnAnimReloadCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn )
{
	if ( aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn(aPawn).StartThirdPersonReload();
		gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fWeaponRightHand = false;
		aPawn.Weapon.AttachToPawn( aPawn );
		return true;
	}

	return false;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	if ( aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn(aPawn).StopThirdPersonReload();
	}

	if ( aPawn != None && aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) && aPawn.Weapon != None )
	{
		gbxPawn(aPawn).m_fWeaponRightHand = true;
		// don't initialize the weapon attachment since this had to have already been done for a reload to happen		
		aPawn.Weapon.AttachToPawn( aPawn, true );

		// TEMPORARY HACK: Weapon reloads are dependent on the viewmodel animation, which may be much longer than the 3rd person animation.
		// This means that AI-controlled pawns often appear to do nothing for several seconds while they wait for their (invisible) viewmodel
		// animation to finish playing.
		// So, for AI-controlled pawns in singleplayer, use the 3rd person reload animation to actually reload the weapon.
		//
		//if ( !aPawn.Level.Game.IsA( 'WargameMultiplayer' ) && !aPawn.IsHumanControlled() )
		if ( !aPawn.IsHumanControlled() )
		{
			aPawn.Weapon.ClientState = WS_ReadyToFire;
			aPawn.Weapon.PlayIdle();
			aPawn.Weapon.ReloadClip();
		}
		// END HACK

		return true;
	}

	return false;
}
//=============================================================================
// PawnAnimReloadCallbackNoSwitch
//
//	This is a wrapper for BeginState and EndState functionality for an animation a pawn is running
//  It handles setting and resetting states related to reloading a weapon.
//
//=============================================================================
class PawnAnimReloadCallbackNoSwitch extends PawnAnimExtra;

static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn )
{
	if ( aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn(aPawn).StartThirdPersonReload();
	}

	return false;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	if ( aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn(aPawn).StopThirdPersonReload();
	}

	if ( aPawn != None )
	{
		// TEMPORARY HACK: Weapon reloads are dependent on the viewmodel animation, which may be much longer than the 3rd person animation.
		// This means that AI-controlled pawns often appear to do nothing for several seconds while they wait for their (invisible) viewmodel
		// animation to finish playing.
		// So, for AI-controlled pawns in singleplayer, use the 3rd person reload animation to actually reload the weapon.
		//
		//if ( !aPawn.Level.Game.IsA( 'WargameMultiplayer' ) && !aPawn.IsHumanControlled() )
		if ( !aPawn.IsHumanControlled() && aPawn.Weapon != None )
		{
			aPawn.Weapon.ClientState = WS_ReadyToFire;
			aPawn.Weapon.PlayIdle();
			aPawn.Weapon.ReloadClip();
		}
		// END HACK

		return true;
	}

	return false;
}
class PlayerKnockDownCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;




static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn )
{
	local int	i;
	
	if( gbxPawn( aPawn ) != None )
	{
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).bSpecialCalcView = true;
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).bAttachCamToHead = true;
		gbxPlayerController( aPawn.Controller ).LimitPlayerInput( true );
		gbxPlayerController( aPawn.Controller ).CombatDesaturationAmount = 0;
		gbxPlayerController( aPawn.Controller ).flLastCombatDesatTime = 0.0;
		aPawn.AccelRate = 0.0;

		gbxPawn( aPawn ).StartTraumaSound();
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).BeginTraumaCam();
		for (i = 0; i < aPawn.ExtendedAttachments.Length; i++)
		{
			aPawn.ExtendedDetachment( aPawn.ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart );
			aPawn.ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart.bHidden = true;
		}
	}

	return true;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterupt )
{
	local int	i;
	
	if( gbxPawn( aPawn ) != None )
	{
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).bSpecialCalcView = false;
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).bAttachCamToHead = false;
		gbxPlayerController( aPawn.Controller ).LimitPlayerInput( false );
		aPawn.accelRate = aPawn.default.AccelRate;
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).EndTraumaCam();

		for (i = 0; i < aPawn.ExtendedAttachments.Length; i++)
		{
			aPawn.ExtendedAttachment( aPawn.ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart, aPawn.ExtendedAttachments[i].m_nmSocketName, aPawn.ExtendedAttachments[i].m_nmPartName );
		}
	}

	return true;
}
class PrepareGrenadeThrowCallback extends PawnAnimHandSwitchCallback;



static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn )
{
	return true;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterupt )
{
	if( WargamePawn( aPawn ) != None )
	{
		WargamePawn( aPawn ).PlayThrow(1);
	}
	return true;
}
//=============================================================================
// TankCommanderPawn:  Pawn that appears as the commander of a tank
//=============================================================================
class TankCommanderPawn extends gbxPawn;

var int		anim_index;
var int 	LastIdleIndex;
var() float IdleRandomBase;
var() float IdleRandomDelay;
var float	IdleRandomTimer;
var bool	bIdleAnimDone;
var bool	bHidePawn;
var() bool	bAllowDamage;
var() bool	bSwitchToIdle;
var() float	EnemyLastSeenTime;  // time enemy was seen last
var() bool	bEnemyWasSeen;
var() bool	bPlayerMountedTank;
var() bool	bPlayerMountComplete;

var() TankCommanderPawnHitCylinder HitCylinder;
var() bool bTankCommaderInvulnerable;

var() gbxPawn MyTankPawn;

var() string MyAnimPackage;

var() array<name> CommanderIdleAnims;
var() name	CommanderHitAnim;
var() name	CommanderFlinchAnim;
var() name	CommanderOpenHatchAnim;
var() name	CommanderCloseHatchAnim;
var() name	CommanderMoveOutAnim;
var() name	CommanderTankBlownupAnim;

var() name	TankCommanderHitPulledInAnim;
var() name	TankCommanderFlinchCloseHatchAnim;
var() name	TankCommanderOpenHatchAnim;
var() name	TankCommanderCloseHatchAnim;
var() name	TankCommanderTankBlownupAnim;

var() int	MainGunChan1, MainGunChan2;

var() bool	bHatchClosing;  // set to true when hatch is closing (and closed)
var() bool	bHatchFullyClosed;  // set to true when commander is inside tank (hatch is fully closed)
var() float	CommanderButtonUpTime;
var() bool	bScriptedHatchOpenOrClose;
var() bool	bScriptedAnimDone;

var() name	CommanderHead;

var float PeekStartTime;
var float PeekEndTime;
var bool bIsPeeking;
var bool bShouldStopPeeking;


const QUEUE_DEATH_PRIORITY = 9999;
const QUEUE_FLINCH_PRIORITY = 97;
const QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY = 90;


function PostBeginPlay()
{
	local IGbxPawnList PawnList;

	Super.PostBeginPlay();

	if( VoiceType == None )
	{
		SetVoiceType( VoiceTypeName );
	}

	// Find our hash index.
	gbxPawnIndex = class'gbxPawn'.Default.gbxPawnIndex;
	class'gbxPawn'.Default.gbxPawnIndex++;

	if ( Role == ROLE_Authority )
	{
		PawnList = Level.GetPawnList();
		gbxPawnList( PawnList ).RegisterGbxPawnByTeam( Self, PawnTeam );
	}

	if (Pawn(Owner) != None)
		PawnTeam = Pawn(Owner).PawnTeam;

	bAllowDamage = true;

	bHatchClosing = false;
	bHatchFullyClosed = false;
	EnemyLastSeenTime = 0.0f;
	bEnemyWasSeen = false;
	bPlayerMountedTank = false;
	bPlayerMountComplete = true;

	PeekStartTime = -1.0f;
	PeekEndTime = -1.0f;
}

function bool IsTankCommander() { return true; }
function Pawn GetMyTank() { return MyTankPawn; }

function SetTankPawn(gbxPawn MyTank, TankCommanderPawnHitCylinder CommanderPawnHitCylinder)
{
	MyTankPawn = MyTank;
	HitCylinder = CommanderPawnHitCylinder;

	if (HitCylinder != None)
		HitCylinder.SetTankCommanderPawn(self);
}

function SetCharacterType( int nCharType )
{
	super.SetCharacterType( nCharType );

	if ( GetCharacterPortrait() != "" )
	{
		Portrait = Texture( DynamicLoadObject( GetCharacterPortrait(), class'Texture' ));
	}

	CharacterName = GetCharacterName();
	CommanderHead = GetCharacterHead();
}

function SetM10CommanderAnims(string anim_package, array<name> StandingIdleAnims, array<name> SittingIdleAnims, name HitAnim, name StandingToSittingAnim, name SittingToStandingAnim, name MoveOutAnim, name BlownupAnim)
{
}

function SetCommanderAnims(string anim_package, array<name> IdleAnims, name HitAnim, name FlinchAnim, name OpenAnim, name CloseAnim, name MoveOutAnim, name BlownupAnim)
{
	local int index;
	local ExtendedAttachmentInfo anEAInfo;
	local MeshAnimation	aMeshAnim;
	local int			j;

	anEAInfo = new( Level.Outer ) class'ExtendedAttachmentInfo';

	if (PawnTeam == Team_German)
	{
		Mesh=Mesh(DynamicLoadObject("K_character_de.de_tanker_body", class'Mesh'));
	}
	else
	{
		if (CommanderHead == 'risner_helmet')
			Mesh=Mesh(DynamicLoadObject("K_character_us.us_tanker_body", class'Mesh'));
		else
			Mesh=Mesh(DynamicLoadObject("K_character_us.us_tanker_body_random", class'Mesh'));
	}

	anEAInfo.m_nmSocketName = 'Head';
	anEAInfo.m_nmPartName = CommanderHead;

	MyAnimPackage = anim_package;  // needed for save/load code after checkpoints

	ExtendedAttachments.Length = ExtendedAttachments.Length + 1;
	ExtendedAttachments[0] = anEAInfo;
	ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart = Spawn( class'AttachedPart', self );
	if (ExtendedSkins.Length > 0)
	{
		for (j = 0; j < ExtendedSkins.Length; j++)
		{
			if (ExtendedSkins[j] != None)
			{
				ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart.Skins[j] = ExtendedSkins[j];
			}
		}
	}

	ExtendedAttachment( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmSocketName, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmPartName );

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation(DynamicLoadObject("a_ev_all.a_ev_corrion", class'MeshAnimation'));
	if (aMeshAnim != None)
	{
		LinkSkelAnim(aMeshAnim);
	}

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation( DynamicLoadObject( anim_package, class'MeshAnimation' ) );
	if ( aMeshAnim != None )
	{
		if ( MeshAnim != None )
			UnlinkSkelAnim( MeshAnim, false );
		if (LinkSkelAnim( aMeshAnim ))
		{
			MeshAnim = aMeshAnim;
		}
		bInitializeAnimation = false;
	}

	// set the animations for the Commander Pawn for this type of tank...
	for (index=0; index < IdleAnims.Length; index++)
	{
		CommanderIdleAnims.Length = CommanderIdleAnims.Length + 1;
		CommanderIdleAnims[index] = IdleAnims[index];
	}

	CommanderHitAnim = HitAnim;
	CommanderFlinchAnim = FlinchAnim;
	CommanderOpenHatchAnim = OpenAnim;
	CommanderCloseHatchAnim = CloseAnim;
	CommanderMoveOutAnim = MoveOutAnim;
	CommanderTankBlownupAnim = BlownupAnim;
}

function MatchStarting()
{
	local MeshAnimation	aMeshAnim;

	Super.MatchStarting();

	ExtendedAttachment( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmSocketName, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmPartName );

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation(DynamicLoadObject("a_ev_all.a_ev_corrion", class'MeshAnimation'));
	if (aMeshAnim != None)
	{
		LinkSkelAnim(aMeshAnim);
	}

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation( DynamicLoadObject( MyAnimPackage, class'MeshAnimation' ) );
	if ( aMeshAnim != None )
	{
		if ( MeshAnim != None )
			UnlinkSkelAnim( MeshAnim, false );
		if (LinkSkelAnim( aMeshAnim ))
		{
			MeshAnim = aMeshAnim;
		}
		bInitializeAnimation = false;
	}

	RestartAnimQueue();
}

function SetTankAnims(name HitPulledInAnim, name FlinchCloseAnim, name HatchOpenAnim, name HatchCloseAnim, name BlownupAnim)
{
	// set the animations for the tank pawn...

	TankCommanderHitPulledInAnim = HitPulledInAnim;
	TankCommanderFlinchCloseHatchAnim = FlinchCloseAnim;
	TankCommanderOpenHatchAnim = HatchOpenAnim;
	TankCommanderCloseHatchAnim = HatchCloseAnim;
	TankCommanderTankBlownupAnim = BlownupAnim;
}

function SetMainGunAnimChannels(int Chan1, int Chan2)
{
	MainGunChan1 = Chan1;
	MainGunChan2 = Chan2;
}

function DisableMainGunFiringAnims()
{
	MyTankPawn.AnimBlendParams(MainGunChan1, 0.0);
	MyTankPawn.AnimBlendParams(MainGunChan2, 0.0);
}

simulated event Destroyed()
{
	local	int	i;

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".Destroyed()", 'Tank');

	for( i = 0; i < ExtendedAttachments.Length; i++ )
	{
		if (ExtendedAttachments[i] != None)
		{
			if (ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart != None)
			{
				ExtendedDetachment( ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart );
				ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart.Destroy();
				ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart = None;
			}
		}
	}

	Super.Destroyed();
}

function SetMovementPhysics()
{
	// override Engine.Pawn and gbxBase.gbxPawn behavior, do nothing
}

function PlayMoveOutAnim()
{
	if ((!bHatchClosing) && (Health > 0))
	{
		Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".PlayMoveOutAnim() - " $ CommanderMoveOutAnim, 'Tank');

		AddAnimToQueue(CommanderMoveOutAnim, QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
	}
}

function SeeEnemy()
{
	if (Health <= 0)
		return;

//	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".SeeEnemy() - Setting EnemyLastSeenTime = " $ Level.TimeSeconds, 'Tank');

	EnemyLastSeenTime = Level.TimeSeconds;
	bEnemyWasSeen = true;
}

function TakeDamage( int Damage, Pawn instigatedBy, Vector hitlocation,
						Vector momentum, class<DamageType> damageType, optional name HitBoxName)
{
	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".TakeDamage() - instigatedBy = " $ instigatedBy.name $ "  Health = " $ Health, 'Tank');

	if ((MyTankPawn != None) && (MyTankPawn.Controller != None))
	{
		if (MyTankPawn.Controller.bGodMode)
			return;
	}

	if (bTankCommaderInvulnerable)
	{
		Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".TakeDamage() - Commander is invulnerable, can't be killed!!!", 'Tank');
		return;
	}

	// if already dead, or damage not allowed (except explosive damage), just return...
	if ((Health <= 0) || (!bAllowDamage && !damageType.Default.m_bDamagesArmor))
		return;

	if ((instigatedBy != None) && (SameTeamAs(instigatedBy)))
	{
		Log(name $ ".TakeDamage - instigatedBy = " $ instigatedBy.name $ ", DamageType.name = " $ DamageType.name $ " (friendly fire ignored)", 'Tank');
		return;  // friendly fire doesn't do damage
	}

	Super.TakeDamage(Damage, instigatedBy, hitlocation, momentum, damageType);

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".TakeDamage() - After Super.TakeDamage, Health = " $ Health, 'Tank');

	if (Health > 0)
	{
		if ((MyTankPawn.Controller != None) && (gbxAIController(MyTankPawn.Controller) != None))
		{
			// make sure the controller knows about this enemy...
			gbxAIController(MyTankPawn.Controller).ConsiderPossibleEnemy(instigatedBy);
		}

		if (GetStateName() == 'Idle')
		{
			bAllowDamage = false;
			bHidePawn = true;  // hide the pawn after this animation is done...

			Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".TakeDamage() - Health = " $ Health $ "  flinch anims = " $ CommanderFlinchAnim $ "  " $ TankCommanderFlinchCloseHatchAnim, 'Tank');

			// play flinch animation...
			AddAnimToQueue(CommanderFlinchAnim, QUEUE_FLINCH_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
			if (MyTankPawn != None)
				MyTankPawn.AddAnimToQueue(TankCommanderFlinchCloseHatchAnim, 99, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

			bHatchClosing = true;

			if (HitCylinder != None)
				HitCylinder.bHidden = true;

			EnemyLastSeenTime = Level.TimeSeconds;

			Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".TakeDamage() - Going to state Combat...", 'Tank');
			GotoState('Combat');
		}
	}
}

simulated function string GetCharacterName()
{
	return CharacterSetupClass.Static.GetCharacterName( m_nCharType, true );
}

simulated function string GetCharacterPortrait()
{
	return CharacterSetupClass.Static.GetCharacterPortrait( m_nCharType, true );
}

function KillCommander(Pawn instigatedBy, class<DamageType> damageType)
{
	local Controller Killer;

	if (Health <= 0)
		return;

	// tank has been killed, make sure commander is killed too...

	Health = -1;

	PlayHit(100, instigatedBy, Location, damageType, vect(0,0,0));

	// Pawn died
	if ( instigatedBy != None )
		Killer = instigatedBy.GetKillerController();

	if ( bPhysicsAnimUpdate )
		TearOffMomentum = vect(0,0,0);

	Died( Killer, damageType, Location );
}

function PlayHit(float Damage, Pawn InstigatedBy, vector HitLocation, class<DamageType> damageType, vector Momentum)
{
	local vector BloodOffset, Mo, HitNormal;
	local class<Effects> DesiredEffect;
	local class<Emitter> DesiredEmitter;
	local vector v1, v2;

	// DON'T spawn any blood decal (otherwise blood from commander pawn winds up on the ground below the tank)...

	if ( (Damage <= 0) && ((Controller == None) || !Controller.bGodMode) )
		return;

	v1 = HitLocation;
	v2 = Location;
	v2.Z = HitLocation.Z;

	HitNormal = Normal(v1 - v2);

	if (Damage > DamageType.Default.DamageThreshold) //spawn some/lots of blood
	{
		// Play any set effect
		if ( EffectIsRelevant(Location,true) )
		{
			DesiredEffect = DamageType.static.GetPawnDamageEffect(HitLocation, Damage, Momentum, self, (Level.bDropDetail || Level.DetailMode == DM_Low));

			if ( DesiredEffect != None )
			{
				BloodOffset = 0.2 * CollisionRadius * HitNormal;
				BloodOffset.Z = BloodOffset.Z * 0.5;

				Mo = Momentum;
				if ( Mo.Z > 0 )
					Mo.Z *= 0.5;
				spawn(DesiredEffect,self,,HitLocation + BloodOffset, rotator(Mo));
			}

			// Spawn any preset emitter

			if (IsHeadshot(HitLocation))
			{
				DesiredEmitter = DamageType.Static.GetPawnDamageHeadshotEmitter(HitLocation, Damage, Momentum, self, (Level.bDropDetail || Level.DetailMode == DM_Low));
				if (DesiredEmitter != None)
					spawn(DesiredEmitter,,,HitLocation+HitNormal, Rotator(HitNormal));
			}
			else
			{
				DesiredEmitter = DamageType.Static.GetPawnDamageEmitter(HitLocation, Damage, Momentum, self, (Level.bDropDetail || Level.DetailMode == DM_Low));
				if (DesiredEmitter != None)
					spawn(DesiredEmitter,,,HitLocation+HitNormal, Rotator(HitNormal));
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// spawn a tiny amount of blood...
		DesiredEmitter = DamageType.Static.GetPawnDamageLittleEmitter(HitLocation, Damage, Momentum, self, (Level.bDropDetail || Level.DetailMode == DM_Low));
		if (DesiredEmitter != None)
			spawn(DesiredEmitter,,,HitLocation+HitNormal, Rotator(HitNormal));
	}
}

simulated function PlayDyingAnim(class<DamageType> DamageType, vector HitLoc)
{
	if (bHatchClosing)  // is commander going inside (or already inside) the tank?
	{
		if (bHidden)
			bHidden = false;

		Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ "PlayDyingAnim - " $ CommanderTankBlownupAnim $ "  " $ TankCommanderTankBlownupAnim, 'Tank');

		AddAnimToQueue(CommanderTankBlownupAnim, QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
		if (MyTankPawn != None)
		{
			MyTankPawn.FlushAnimQueueChannel( 0,, true );
			MyTankPawn.StopAnimating(true);

			MyTankPawn.AddAnimToQueue(TankCommanderTankBlownupAnim, 99, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
		}

		bHatchClosing = false;
		bHatchFullyClosed = false;

		if (HitCylinder != None)
			HitCylinder.bHidden = true;

		bHidePawn = false;  // don't hide the pawn after the death animation ends
	}
	else
	{
		Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ "PlayDyingAnim - " $ CommanderHitAnim $ "  " $ TankCommanderHitPulledInAnim, 'Tank');

		AddAnimToQueue(CommanderHitAnim, QUEUE_DEATH_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
		if (MyTankPawn != None)
		{
			if ((MyTankPawn.PawnTeam != TEAM_German) || (float(MyTankPawn.Health) > (float(MyTankPawn.default.Health) * 0.5f)))
			{
				MyTankPawn.FlushAnimQueueChannel( 0,, true );
				MyTankPawn.StopAnimating(true);

				MyTankPawn.AddAnimToQueue(TankCommanderHitPulledInAnim, 99, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
			}
		}

		bHatchClosing = true;

		if (HitCylinder != None)
			HitCylinder.bHidden = true;

		bHidePawn = true;  // hide the pawn after the death animation ends
	}
}

simulated event PlayDying(class<DamageType> DamageType, vector HitLoc)
{
	local IGbxPawnList PawnList;

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".PlayDying()", 'Tank');

	// DON'T do Ragdoll stuff...

	AmbientSound = None;

	if ( Role == ROLE_Authority )
	{
		PawnList = Level.GetPawnList();
		gbxPawnList( PawnList ).UnregisterGbxPawn( Self );
	}

	PlayDyingAnim(DamageType,HitLoc);

//	TriggerEvent(TriggerOnDeath, Controller, self);

	GotoState('Dying');
}

simulated function PlayWaiting( optional bool bSkipTween )
{
	// override Engine.Pawn and gbxBase.gbxPawn behavior, do nothing
}

function PrepareToMount()
{
	// player wants to mount tank to use machine gun...

	if (Health <= 0)
		return;

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".PrepareToMount() - player wants to use tank...", 'Tank');

	bPlayerMountedTank = true;
	bPlayerMountComplete = false;
}

function CompleteMount()
{
	bPlayerMountComplete = true;
}

function bool IsPlayerOnTank()
{
	local Controller PC;
	local float distance;

	PC = Level.GetLocalPlayerController();

	if ((PC != None) && (PC.Pawn != None))
	{
		if (MyTankPawn != None)
		{
			distance = VSizeIgnoreZ(PC.Pawn.Location - MyTankPawn.Location);

			if (distance < (gbxSVehicle(MyTankPawn).VehicleCollisionRadius * 1.2f))
				return true;
		}
	}

	return false;
}

simulated function gbxPawn GetInspectorPawn()
{
	return MyTankPawn;
}


auto state Idle
{
	simulated event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		Super.AnimEnd(Channel);

		if (Channel == 0)
		{
			bIdleAnimDone = true;
		}
	}

Begin:
	// NOTE: CommanderIdleAnims[0] is assumed to be the 'casual idle' animation (not much movement)
	//       it will loop continuously until it is time for a new idle animation to play

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Idle - Begin:", 'Tank');

	EnemyLastSeenTime = 0.0f;
	bEnemyWasSeen = false;
	bPlayerMountedTank = false;

Peek:
	if (HitCylinder != None)
		bAllowDamage = true;

	AddAnimToQueue(CommanderIdleAnims[0], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

	LastIdleIndex = -1;  // no non-casual index played so far
	IdleRandomTimer = Level.TimeSeconds + IdleRandomBase + IdleRandomDelay * FRand();  // time to start next idle animation

NextIdle:

	bIdleAnimDone = false;
	while (!bIdleAnimDone)
	{
		Sleep(0.1);

		bIsPeeking = false;
		bShouldStopPeeking = false;

		if (PawnTeam == Team_German)  // does this tank commander "peek"?
		{
			if (PeekEndTime > 0.0f)
			{
				bIsPeeking = true;

				if ((EnemyLastSeenTime + CommanderButtonUpTime) <= Level.TimeSeconds)
				{
					Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Idle - enemy not seen for " $ CommanderButtonUpTime $ " seconds, not peeking anymore", 'Tank');

					PeekStartTime = -1.0f;
					PeekEndTime = -1.0f;

					bEnemyWasSeen = false;
					bIsPeeking = false;
				}
				else if (PeekEndTime <= Level.TimeSeconds)
				{
					bShouldStopPeeking = true;
				}
			}
		}

		// check if player is on tank or if enemy has been spotted...
		if ( bPlayerMountedTank || (bEnemyWasSeen && !bIsPeeking) || bShouldStopPeeking )
		{
			if (bPlayerMountedTank)
				Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Idle - player on tank at " $ Level.TimeSeconds, 'Tank');
			else if (bShouldStopPeeking)
				Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Idle - stop peeking at " $ Level.TimeSeconds, 'Tank');
			else if (bEnemyWasSeen && !bIsPeeking)
				Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Idle - saw enemy at " $ Level.TimeSeconds, 'Tank');

			bPlayerMountedTank = false;

			bAllowDamage = false;
			bHidePawn = true;  // hide the pawn after this animation is done...

			Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Idle - close hatch anims = " $ CommanderCloseHatchAnim $ "  " $ TankCommanderCloseHatchAnim, 'Tank');

			// play close hatch animation...
			AddAnimToQueue(CommanderCloseHatchAnim, QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
			if (MyTankPawn != None)
				MyTankPawn.AddAnimToQueue(TankCommanderCloseHatchAnim, 99, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

			bHatchClosing = true;

			if (HitCylinder != None)
				HitCylinder.bHidden = true;

			Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".state Idle -  Going to state Combat...", 'Tank');

			GotoState('Combat');
		}
	}

	if (IdleRandomTimer < Level.TimeSeconds)  // time to play next non-causal idle animation?
	{
		IdleRandomTimer = Level.TimeSeconds + IdleRandomBase + IdleRandomDelay * FRand();  // time to start next idle animation

		anim_index = Rand(CommanderIdleAnims.Length - 1);  // one less than total number, because we '++' it below
		if (anim_index == LastIdleIndex)
			anim_index = (anim_index + 1) % (CommanderIdleAnims.Length - 1);

		LastIdleIndex = anim_index;  // store the non-incremented index since that's what we compare against above

		anim_index++;  // skip index 0

//		Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Idle - anim_index = " $ anim_index $ "  anim = " $ CommanderIdleAnims[anim_index], 'Tank');

		AddAnimToQueue(CommanderIdleAnims[anim_index], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
	}
	else
	{
		// play the "casual idle" animation...
		AddAnimToQueue(CommanderIdleAnims[0], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
	}

	GotoState('Idle', 'NextIdle');
}


state Combat
{
	simulated event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		Super.AnimEnd(Channel);

		if (Channel == 0)
		{
			if (bHatchClosing)
				bHatchFullyClosed = true;
			else
				bHatchFullyClosed = false;

			if (bHidePawn)
				bHidden = true;

			if (bSwitchToIdle)
			{
				if (HitCylinder != None)
					HitCylinder.bHidden = false;

				if (PeekEndTime > Level.TimeSeconds)  // peeking?
				{
					Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Combat - Going to state Idle:Peek", 'Tank');
					GotoState('Idle', 'Peek');
					return;
				}

				PeekStartTime = -1.0f;
				PeekEndTime = -1.0f;

				bEnemyWasSeen = false;

				GotoState('Idle');
				return;
			}
		}
	}

	function PrepareToMount()
	{
		// player wants to mount tank to use machine gun...

		if (Health <= 0)
			return;

		Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".PrepareToMount() - player wants to use tank while in Combat state...", 'Tank');

		// is the commander currently playing the "open hatch" animation OR is the hatch currently open?
		if (bSwitchToIdle || ((!bHatchClosing) && (!bHatchFullyClosed)))
		{
			bAllowDamage = false;
			bHidePawn = true;  // hide the pawn after this animation is done...

			Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Combat - close hatch anims = " $ CommanderCloseHatchAnim $ "  " $ TankCommanderCloseHatchAnim, 'Tank');

			// play close hatch animation...
			AddAnimToQueue(CommanderCloseHatchAnim, QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
			if (MyTankPawn != None)
				MyTankPawn.AddAnimToQueue(TankCommanderCloseHatchAnim, 99, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

			bHatchClosing = true;

			if (HitCylinder != None)
				HitCylinder.bHidden = true;
		}

		bPlayerMountComplete = false;

		Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".state Combat -  Going to state Combat...", 'Tank');

		GotoState('Combat', 'Begin');
	}

	function bool IsSafeToComeOut()
	{
		if ((PawnTeam == Team_German) &&  // does this tank commander "peek"?
			(PeekStartTime > 0.0f) && (PeekStartTime <= Level.TimeSeconds))
		{
			PeekEndTime = Level.TimeSeconds + 4.0f + FRand() * 2.0f;  // how long we stay peeking (length of animations also effect this)

			Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Combat - PeekStartTime = " $ PeekStartTime $ "  PeekEndTime = " $ PeekEndTime, 'Tank');

			return true;  // time to peek, so let's say it's okay to come out
		}

		if ( IsPlayerOnTank() )  // is the player on the tank?
			return false;  // don't come out yet

		// is it not safe to come out now?
		if ((EnemyLastSeenTime + CommanderButtonUpTime) > Level.TimeSeconds)
			return false;  // don't come out yet

		return true;  // else, okay to come out now
	}

Begin:
	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Combat - Begin:", 'Tank');

	bSwitchToIdle = false;  // don't switch states after the current animation ends

	if (PawnTeam == Team_German)  // does this tank commander "peek"?
	{
		PeekStartTime = Level.TimeSeconds + 10.0 + FRand() * 5.0;  // how long we wait before we start peeking
		PeekEndTime = -1.0f;

		Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Combat - Time = " $ Level.TimeSeconds $ "  PeekStartTime = " $ PeekStartTime $ "  PeekEndTime = " $ PeekEndTime, 'Tank');
	}

	if (PawnTeam == Team_US)
	{
		while ( !bPlayerMountComplete )  // wait until the player has completely mounted the tank
		{
			Sleep(0.1);
		}
	}

	while ( !IsSafeToComeOut() )
	{
		Sleep(0.1);
	}

	// wait a little bit before coming back out (so the commander doesn't pop out as soon as the player jumps off tank)...
	Sleep(0.5 + FRand() * 0.3);

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Combat - Commander coming back out at " $ Level.TimeSeconds, 'Tank');

	if (HitCylinder != None)
		bAllowDamage = true;

	bSwitchToIdle = true;
	bHidden = false;  // don't hide the pawn anymore
	bHidePawn = false;

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Combat - open hatch anims = " $ CommanderOpenHatchAnim $ "  " $ TankCommanderOpenHatchAnim, 'Tank');

	DisableMainGunFiringAnims();  // turn off the blending of the main gun firing anims (since this messes up the hatch bones)

	AddAnimToQueue(CommanderOpenHatchAnim, QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
	if (MyTankPawn != None)
		MyTankPawn.AddAnimToQueue(TankCommanderOpenHatchAnim, 99, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

	bHatchClosing = false;
}


state GrenadePlanted
{
Begin:
	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state GrenadePlanted - Begin:", 'Tank');
}


state Scripted
{
	simulated event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		Super.AnimEnd(Channel);

		if (Channel == 0)
		{
			bScriptedAnimDone = true;

			if (bScriptedHatchOpenOrClose)
			{
				bScriptedHatchOpenOrClose = false;  // turn off this flag when the open/close animation ends

				if (bHatchClosing)
					bHatchFullyClosed = true;
				else
				{
					bHatchFullyClosed = false;

					if (HitCylinder != None)
						HitCylinder.bHidden = false;
				}

				if (bHidePawn)
					bHidden = true;
			}
		}
	}

Begin:
	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Scripted - Entering Scripted state", 'Tank');

}


state Dying
{
ignores Trigger, Bump, HitWall, HeadVolumeChange, PhysicsVolumeChange, Falling, BreathTimer;

	event ChangeAnimation() {}
	event StopPlayFiring() {}
	function PlayFiring(float Rate, int FiringMode) {}
	function PlayWeaponSwitch(Weapon NewWeapon) {}
	function PlayTakeHit(vector HitLoc, int Damage, class<DamageType> damageType) {}
	simulated function PlayNextAnimation() {}
	function SeePawn(Pawn OtherPawn) {}

	function Died(Controller Killer, class<DamageType> damageType, vector HitLocation)
	{
	}

	function TakeDamage( int Damage, Pawn instigatedBy, Vector hitlocation,
							Vector momentum, class<DamageType> damageType, optional name HitBoxName)
	{
	}

	simulated event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		Super.AnimEnd(Channel);

		if (Channel == 0)
		{
			if (bHatchClosing)
				bHatchFullyClosed = true;
			else
				bHatchFullyClosed = false;

			if (bHidePawn)
				bHidden = true;
		}
	}

	function BeginState()
	{
		bInvulnerableBody = true;
	}

Begin:
	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Dying - Begin:", 'Tank');

	bAllowDamage = false;
	Sleep(0.15);

	bInvulnerableBody = false;
	PlayDyingSound();
}


defaultproperties
{
	CollisionHeight=84.0

	bBlockActors=false
	bBlockPlayers=false
	bCollideActors=false
	bCollideSkeletalMesh=false
	bCollideWorld=false
	bCollideWhenPlacing=false

	Physics=PHYS_None
	Health=100

	VoiceTypeName="gbxCharacters.VoiceTypeDefault"

	bPawnBlinks=false

	IdleRandomBase=3.0
	IdleRandomDelay=5.0

	CommanderButtonUpTime=10.0

	LookAtDeltaRotation=(Pitch=0,Yaw=49152,Roll=0)
	bFlipPitchAndRoll=false

	bTankCommaderInvulnerable=false
	bScriptedHatchOpenOrClose=false
	bScriptedAnimDone=true
	bExcludeFromOracleCam=true

	bUsesHoldRifleAnim=false
}
//=============================================================================
// TankCommanderPawnHitCylinder:  Actor used for the hittable collision cylinder
//=============================================================================

class TankCommanderPawnHitCylinder extends gbxPawn;

var TankCommanderPawn MyTankCommanderPawn;


function SetTankCommanderPawn(TankCommanderPawn TCP)
{
	MyTankCommanderPawn = TCP;
	Health = TCP.Health;
}

function TakeDamage( int Damage, Pawn instigatedBy, Vector hitlocation,
						Vector momentum, class<DamageType> damageType, optional name HitBoxName)
{
	// check for friendly fire...
	if (MyTankCommanderPawn != None)
	{
		if (MyTankCommanderPawn.SameTeamAs(instigatedBy))
			return;

		MyTankCommanderPawn.TakeDamage(Damage, instigatedBy, hitlocation, momentum, damageType);

		Health = MyTankCommanderPawn.Health;

		if (Health < 0)
		{
			SetCollision(false, false, false);
		}
	}
}

simulated event bool TargetFriendly( Vector aHitLoc, Pawn SourcePawn, bool bFiring )
{
	local bool value;

	value = Super.TargetFriendly( aHitLoc, SourcePawn, bFiring );

	if( Level.NetMode == NM_Standalone && MyTankCommanderPawn.SameTeamAs(SourcePawn) )
	{
		MyTankCommanderPawn.m_flLastDisplayPawnInfo = Level.TimeSeconds;
		MyTankCommanderPawn.bPawnInfoIconOnly = false;

		if (bFiring)
		{
			MyTankCommanderPawn.m_flLastDisplayPawnNoShoot = Level.TimeSeconds;
		}

		return !bHidden;
	}

	return false;
}


defaultproperties
{
	CollisionHeight=30
	CollisionRadius=30
	BaseEyeHeight=25
	EyeHeight=25

	bCollideActors=true
	bCollideWorld=false
	bBlockActors=true
	bBlockPlayers=false
	bProjTarget=true
	bCollideSkeletalMesh=false
	bCollideWhenPlacing=false

	bHidden=false

	Physics=PHYS_None

	bUsesHoldRifleAnim=false
}
class TankGrenadeCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;

static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn ) 
{
	return true;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	if ( aPawn != None && aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).TankGrenadeAnimZoomIn();
	}

	return true;
}//=============================================================================
// TankM10CommanderPawn:  Pawn that appears as the commander of a tank
//=============================================================================
class TankM10CommanderPawn extends TankCommanderPawn;

var() name	CommanderStandingToSittingAnim;
var() array<name> CommanderSittingIdleAnims;
var() name	CommanderSittingToStandingAnim;

var() float SittingIdleRandomBase;
var() float SittingIdleRandomDelay;
var float	SittingIdleRandomTimer;
var int 	LastSittingIdleIndex;

var StaticMesh binocs;


function SetM10CommanderAnims(string anim_package, array<name> StandingIdleAnims, array<name> SittingIdleAnims, name HitAnim, name StandingToSittingAnim, name SittingToStandingAnim, name MoveOutAnim, name BlownupAnim)
{
	local int index;
	local ExtendedAttachmentInfo anEAInfo;
	local MeshAnimation	aMeshAnim;
	local int j;

	anEAInfo = new( Level.Outer ) class'ExtendedAttachmentInfo';

	if (CommanderHead == 'risner_helmet')
		Mesh=Mesh(DynamicLoadObject("K_character_us.us_tanker_body", class'Mesh'));
	else
		Mesh=Mesh(DynamicLoadObject("K_character_us.us_tanker_body_random", class'Mesh'));

	anEAInfo.m_nmSocketName = 'Head';
	anEAInfo.m_nmPartName = CommanderHead;

	MyAnimPackage = anim_package;  // needed for save/load code after checkpoints

	ExtendedAttachments.Length = ExtendedAttachments.Length + 1;
	ExtendedAttachments[0] = anEAInfo;
	ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart = Spawn( class'AttachedPart', self );
	if (ExtendedSkins.Length > 0)
	{
		for (j = 0; j < ExtendedSkins.Length; j++)
		{
			if (ExtendedSkins[j] != None)
			{
				ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart.Skins[j] = ExtendedSkins[j];
			}
		}
	}

	ExtendedAttachment( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmSocketName, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmPartName );

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation(DynamicLoadObject("a_ev_all.a_ev_corrion", class'MeshAnimation'));
	if (aMeshAnim != None)
	{
		LinkSkelAnim(aMeshAnim);
	}

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation( DynamicLoadObject( anim_package, class'MeshAnimation' ) );
	if ( aMeshAnim != None )
	{
		if ( MeshAnim != None )
			UnlinkSkelAnim( MeshAnim, false );
		if (LinkSkelAnim( aMeshAnim ))
		{
			MeshAnim = aMeshAnim;
		}
		bInitializeAnimation = false;
	}

	// set the animations for the Commander Pawn for this type of tank...
	for (index=0; index < StandingIdleAnims.Length; index++)
	{
		CommanderIdleAnims.Length = CommanderIdleAnims.Length + 1;
		CommanderIdleAnims[index] = StandingIdleAnims[index];
	}

	for (index=0; index < SittingIdleAnims.Length; index++)
	{
		CommanderSittingIdleAnims.Length = CommanderSittingIdleAnims.Length + 1;
		CommanderSittingIdleAnims[index] = SittingIdleAnims[index];
	}

	CommanderHitAnim = HitAnim;
	CommanderStandingToSittingAnim = StandingToSittingAnim;
	CommanderSittingToStandingAnim = SittingToStandingAnim;
	CommanderMoveOutAnim = MoveOutAnim;
	CommanderTankBlownupAnim = BlownupAnim;

	binocs = StaticMesh(DynamicLoadObject("s_npc_item_us.equipment.binoculars", class'StaticMesh'));
	if (binocs != None)
		AttachScriptedAttachment(binocs, 'binocs');
}

simulated function PlayDyingAnim(class<DamageType> DamageType, vector HitLoc)
{
	if (binocs != None)
		DetachScriptedAttachment(binocs, 'binocs');

	super.PlayDyingAnim(DamageType, HitLoc);

	bHidePawn = false;  // never hide the M10 commander pawn
}


auto state StandingIdle
{
	simulated event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		Super.AnimEnd(Channel);

		if (Channel == 0)
		{
			bIdleAnimDone = true;
		}
	}

Begin:
	// NOTE: CommanderIdleAnims[0] is assumed to be the 'casual idle' animation (not much movement)
	//       it will loop continuously until it is time for a new idle animation to play

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state StandingIdle - Begin:", 'Tank');

	EnemyLastSeenTime = 0.0f;
	bEnemyWasSeen = false;
	bPlayerMountedTank = false;

	if (HitCylinder != None)
		bAllowDamage = true;

	AddAnimToQueue(CommanderIdleAnims[0], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

	LastIdleIndex = -1;  // no non-casual index played so far
	IdleRandomTimer = Level.TimeSeconds + IdleRandomBase + IdleRandomDelay * FRand();  // time to start next idle animation

NextIdle:

	bIdleAnimDone = false;
	while (!bIdleAnimDone)
	{
		Sleep(0.1);

		// check if player is on tank or if enemy has been spotted...
		if ( bPlayerMountedTank || bEnemyWasSeen )
		{
			if (bPlayerMountedTank)
				Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state StandingIdle - player on tank at " $ Level.TimeSeconds, 'Tank');
			else if (bEnemyWasSeen)
				Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state StandingIdle - saw enemy at " $ Level.TimeSeconds, 'Tank');

			bPlayerMountedTank = false;

			bAllowDamage = false;
			bHidePawn = false;  // hide the pawn after this animation is done...

			Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state StandingIdle - play standing to sitting anims = " $ CommanderStandingToSittingAnim, 'Tank');

			// play standing to sitting hatch animation...
			AddAnimToQueue(CommanderStandingToSittingAnim, QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

			bHatchClosing = true;
			bIdleAnimDone = false;

			if (HitCylinder != None)
				HitCylinder.bHidden = true;

			Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".state StandingIdle -  Going to state M10Combat...", 'Tank');

			GotoState('M10Combat');
		}
	}

	if (IdleRandomTimer < Level.TimeSeconds)  // time to play next non-causal idle animation?
	{
		IdleRandomTimer = Level.TimeSeconds + IdleRandomBase + IdleRandomDelay * FRand();  // time to start next idle animation

		anim_index = Rand(CommanderIdleAnims.Length - 1);  // one less than total number, because we '++' it below
		if (anim_index == LastIdleIndex)
			anim_index = (anim_index + 1) % (CommanderIdleAnims.Length - 1);

		LastIdleIndex = anim_index;  // store the non-incremented index since that's what we compare against above

		anim_index++;  // skip index 0

		Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Idle - anim_index = " $ anim_index $ "  anim = " $ CommanderIdleAnims[anim_index], 'Tank');

		AddAnimToQueue(CommanderIdleAnims[anim_index], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
	}
	else
	{
		// play the "casual idle" animation...
		AddAnimToQueue(CommanderIdleAnims[0], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
	}

	GotoState('StandingIdle', 'NextIdle');
}


state M10Combat
{
	simulated event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		Super.AnimEnd(Channel);

		if (Channel == 0)
		{
			if (bHatchClosing)
				bHatchFullyClosed = true;
			else
				bHatchFullyClosed = false;

			if (bSwitchToIdle)
			{
				if (HitCylinder != None)
					HitCylinder.bHidden = false;

				bEnemyWasSeen = false;

				GotoState('StandingIdle');
				return;
			}

			bIdleAnimDone = true;
		}
	}

	function PrepareToMount()
	{
		// player wants to mount tank to use machine gun...

		if (Health <= 0)
			return;

		Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".PrepareToMount() - player wants to use tank while in M10Combat state...", 'Tank');

		// is the commander currently playing the "sitting to standing" animation OR is the commander currently standing?
		if (bSwitchToIdle || ((!bHatchClosing) && (!bHatchFullyClosed)))
		{
			bAllowDamage = false;
			bHidePawn = false;  // hide the pawn after this animation is done...

			Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state M10Combat - play standing to sitting anims = " $ CommanderStandingToSittingAnim, 'Tank');

			// play standing to sitting animation...
			AddAnimToQueue(CommanderStandingToSittingAnim, QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

			bHatchClosing = true;

			if (HitCylinder != None)
				HitCylinder.bHidden = true;
		}

		bPlayerMountComplete = false;

		Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".state M10Combat -  Going to state M10Combat...", 'Tank');

		GotoState('M10Combat', 'Begin');
	}

	function bool IsSafeToComeOut()
	{
		if ( IsPlayerOnTank() )  // is the player on the tank?
			return false;  // don't come out yet

		// is it not safe to come out now?
		if ((EnemyLastSeenTime + CommanderButtonUpTime) > Level.TimeSeconds)
			return false;  // don't come out yet

		return true;  // else, okay to come out now
	}

Begin:
	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state M10Combat - Begin:", 'Tank');

	bSwitchToIdle = false;  // don't switch states after the current animation ends

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state M10Combat - bPlayerMountComplete = " $ bPlayerMountComplete $ "  waiting for bPlayerMountComplete == true at " $ Level.TimeSeconds, 'Tank');

	while ( !bPlayerMountComplete )  // wait until the player has completely mounted the tank
	{
		Sleep(0.1);
	}

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state M10Combat - bPlayerMountComplete = " $ bPlayerMountComplete $ " at " $ Level.TimeSeconds, 'Tank');

	while ( !IsSafeToComeOut() )
	{
		Sleep(0.1);

		if (bIdleAnimDone)
		{
			if (SittingIdleRandomTimer < Level.TimeSeconds)  // time to play next non-causal idle animation?
			{
				SittingIdleRandomTimer = Level.TimeSeconds + SittingIdleRandomBase + SittingIdleRandomDelay * FRand();  // time to start next idle animation

				anim_index = Rand(CommanderSittingIdleAnims.Length - 1);  // one less than total number, because we '++' it below
				if (anim_index == LastSittingIdleIndex)
					anim_index = (anim_index + 1) % (CommanderSittingIdleAnims.Length - 1);

				LastSittingIdleIndex = anim_index;  // store the non-incremented index since that's what we compare against above

				anim_index++;  // skip index 0

				Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state Idle - anim_index = " $ anim_index $ "  anim = " $ CommanderSittingIdleAnims[anim_index], 'Tank');

				AddAnimToQueue(CommanderSittingIdleAnims[anim_index], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
			}
			else
			{
				// play the "casual idle" animation...
				AddAnimToQueue(CommanderSittingIdleAnims[0], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
			}

			bIdleAnimDone = false;
		}
	}

	// wait a little bit before coming back out (so the commander doesn't pop out as soon as the player jumps off tank)...
	Sleep(0.5 + FRand() * 0.3);

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state M10Combat - Commander coming back out at " $ Level.TimeSeconds, 'Tank');

	if (HitCylinder != None)
		bAllowDamage = true;

	bSwitchToIdle = true;

	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state M10Combat - play sitting to standing anims = " $ CommanderSittingToStandingAnim, 'Tank');

	AddAnimToQueue(CommanderSittingToStandingAnim, QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

	bHatchClosing = false;
}


state GrenadePlanted
{
Begin:
	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")"  $ ".state GrenadePlanted - Begin:", 'Tank');
}


defaultproperties
{
	CollisionHeight=84.0

	bBlockActors=false
	bBlockPlayers=false
	bCollideActors=false
	bCollideSkeletalMesh=false
	bCollideWorld=false
	bCollideWhenPlacing=false

	Physics=PHYS_None
	Health=100

	VoiceTypeName="gbxCharacters.VoiceTypeDefault"

	bPawnBlinks=false

	IdleRandomBase=3.0
	IdleRandomDelay=5.0

	SittingIdleRandomBase=3.0
	SittingIdleRandomDelay=3.0

	CommanderButtonUpTime=10.0

	LookAtDeltaRotation=(Pitch=0,Yaw=49152,Roll=0)
	bFlipPitchAndRoll=false

	bTankCommaderInvulnerable=false
	bScriptedHatchOpenOrClose=false
	bScriptedAnimDone=true
	bExcludeFromOracleCam=true

	bUsesHoldRifleAnim=false
}
//=============================================================================
// TankM10GunnerPawn:  Pawn that just sits there in the M10 tank
//=============================================================================
class TankM10GunnerPawn extends gbxPawn;

var() name	GunnerHead;
var() string MyAnimPackage;


function SetCharacterType( int nCharType )
{
	super.SetCharacterType( nCharType );

	if ( GetCharacterPortrait() != "" )
	{
		Portrait = Texture( DynamicLoadObject( GetCharacterPortrait(), class'Texture' ));
	}

	CharacterName = GetCharacterName();
	GunnerHead = GetCharacterHead();
}

function SetM10GunnerAnim(string anim_package, name IdleAnim)
{
	local ExtendedAttachmentInfo anEAInfo;
	local MeshAnimation	aMeshAnim;
	local int j;

	anEAInfo = new( Level.Outer ) class'ExtendedAttachmentInfo';

	Mesh = Mesh(DynamicLoadObject("K_character_us.us_tanker_body_random", class'Mesh'));

	anEAInfo.m_nmSocketName = 'Head';
	anEAInfo.m_nmPartName = GunnerHead;

	MyAnimPackage = anim_package;  // needed for save/load code after checkpoints

	ExtendedAttachments.Length = ExtendedAttachments.Length + 1;
	ExtendedAttachments[0] = anEAInfo;
	ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart = Spawn( class'AttachedPart', self );
	if (ExtendedSkins.Length > 0)
	{
		for (j = 0; j < ExtendedSkins.Length; j++)
		{
			if (ExtendedSkins[j] != None)
			{
				ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart.Skins[j] = ExtendedSkins[j];
			}
		}
	}

	ExtendedAttachment( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmSocketName, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmPartName );

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation(DynamicLoadObject("a_ev_all.a_ev_corrion", class'MeshAnimation'));
	if (aMeshAnim != None)
	{
		LinkSkelAnim(aMeshAnim);
	}

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation( DynamicLoadObject( anim_package, class'MeshAnimation' ) );
	if ( aMeshAnim != None )
	{
		if ( MeshAnim != None )
			UnlinkSkelAnim( MeshAnim, false );
		if (LinkSkelAnim( aMeshAnim ))
		{
			MeshAnim = aMeshAnim;
		}
		bInitializeAnimation = false;
	}

	LoopAnim(IdleAnim, 1.0);
}

function MatchStarting()
{
	local MeshAnimation	aMeshAnim;

	Super.MatchStarting();

	ExtendedAttachment( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmSocketName, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmPartName );

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation(DynamicLoadObject("a_ev_all.a_ev_corrion", class'MeshAnimation'));
	if (aMeshAnim != None)
	{
		LinkSkelAnim(aMeshAnim);
	}

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation( DynamicLoadObject( MyAnimPackage, class'MeshAnimation' ) );
	if ( aMeshAnim != None )
	{
		if ( MeshAnim != None )
			UnlinkSkelAnim( MeshAnim, false );
		if (LinkSkelAnim( aMeshAnim ))
		{
			MeshAnim = aMeshAnim;
		}
		bInitializeAnimation = false;
	}

	RestartAnimQueue();
}

function TakeDamage( int Damage, Pawn instigatedBy, Vector hitlocation,
						Vector momentum, class<DamageType> damageType, optional name HitBoxName)
{
	// The M10 tank gunner never dies, since we don't want to transition to ragdoll inside a Karma vehicle and there is no custom death animation
//	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".TakeDamage() - instigatedBy = " $ instigatedBy.name $ "  Health = " $ Health, 'Tank');
}

defaultproperties
{
	CollisionHeight=84.0

	bBlockActors=false
	bBlockPlayers=false
	bCollideActors=false
	bCollideSkeletalMesh=false
	bCollideWorld=false
	bCollideWhenPlacing=false

	Physics=PHYS_None
	Health=100

	bPawnBlinks=false
	bExcludeFromOracleCam=true
	bUsesHoldRifleAnim=false
}
//=============================================================================
// TankM10LoaderPawn:  Pawn that loads rounds in an M10 tank
//=============================================================================
class TankM10LoaderPawn extends gbxPawn;

var int		anim_index;
var int 	LastIdleIndex;
var() float IdleRandomBase;
var() float IdleRandomDelay;
var float	IdleRandomTimer;
var bool	bIdleAnimDone;

var() name	LoaderHead;

var() string MyAnimPackage;

var() array<name> LoaderIdleAnims;
var() name	LoaderFireAnim;
var() name	LoaderReloadAnim;
var() name	LoaderDeathAnim;

const QUEUE_DEATH_PRIORITY = 9999;
const QUEUE_FIRE_RELOAD_PRIORITY = 99;
const QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY = 90;


function SetCharacterType( int nCharType )
{
	super.SetCharacterType( nCharType );

	if ( GetCharacterPortrait() != "" )
	{
		Portrait = Texture( DynamicLoadObject( GetCharacterPortrait(), class'Texture' ));
	}

	CharacterName = GetCharacterName();
	LoaderHead = GetCharacterHead();
}

function SetM10LoaderAnims(string anim_package, array<name> IdleAnims, name FireAnim, name ReloadAnim, name DeathAnim)
{
	local int index;
	local ExtendedAttachmentInfo anEAInfo;
	local MeshAnimation	aMeshAnim;
	local int j;

	anEAInfo = new( Level.Outer ) class'ExtendedAttachmentInfo';

	if (LoaderHead == 'risner_helmet')
		Mesh=Mesh(DynamicLoadObject("K_character_us.us_tanker_body", class'Mesh'));
	else
		Mesh=Mesh(DynamicLoadObject("K_character_us.us_tanker_body_random", class'Mesh'));

	anEAInfo.m_nmSocketName = 'Head';
	anEAInfo.m_nmPartName = LoaderHead;

	MyAnimPackage = anim_package;  // needed for save/load code after checkpoints

	ExtendedAttachments.Length = ExtendedAttachments.Length + 1;
	ExtendedAttachments[0] = anEAInfo;
	ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart = Spawn( class'AttachedPart', self );
	if (ExtendedSkins.Length > 0)
	{
		for (j = 0; j < ExtendedSkins.Length; j++)
		{
			if (ExtendedSkins[j] != None)
			{
				ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart.Skins[j] = ExtendedSkins[j];
			}
		}
	}

	ExtendedAttachment( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmSocketName, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmPartName );

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation(DynamicLoadObject("a_ev_all.a_ev_corrion", class'MeshAnimation'));
	if (aMeshAnim != None)
	{
		LinkSkelAnim(aMeshAnim);
	}

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation( DynamicLoadObject( anim_package, class'MeshAnimation' ) );
	if ( aMeshAnim != None )
	{
		if ( MeshAnim != None )
			UnlinkSkelAnim( MeshAnim, false );
		if (LinkSkelAnim( aMeshAnim ))
		{
			MeshAnim = aMeshAnim;
		}
		bInitializeAnimation = false;
	}

	// set the animations for the Loader Pawn for this type of tank...
	for (index=0; index < IdleAnims.Length; index++)
	{
		LoaderIdleAnims.Length = LoaderIdleAnims.Length + 1;
		LoaderIdleAnims[index] = IdleAnims[index];
	}

	LoaderFireAnim = FireAnim;
	LoaderReloadAnim = ReloadAnim;
	LoaderDeathAnim = DeathAnim;
}

function MatchStarting()
{
	local MeshAnimation	aMeshAnim;

	Super.MatchStarting();

	ExtendedAttachment( ExtendedAttachments[0].m_AttachedPart, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmSocketName, ExtendedAttachments[0].m_nmPartName );

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation(DynamicLoadObject("a_ev_all.a_ev_corrion", class'MeshAnimation'));
	if (aMeshAnim != None)
	{
		LinkSkelAnim(aMeshAnim);
	}

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation( DynamicLoadObject( MyAnimPackage, class'MeshAnimation' ) );
	if ( aMeshAnim != None )
	{
		if ( MeshAnim != None )
			UnlinkSkelAnim( MeshAnim, false );
		if (LinkSkelAnim( aMeshAnim ))
		{
			MeshAnim = aMeshAnim;
		}
		bInitializeAnimation = false;
	}

	RestartAnimQueue();
}

simulated event Destroyed()
{
	local	int	i;

	Log(name $ ".Destroyed()", 'Tank');

	for( i = 0; i < ExtendedAttachments.Length; i++ )
	{
		if (ExtendedAttachments[i] != None)
		{
			if (ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart != None)
			{
				ExtendedDetachment( ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart );
				ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart.Destroy();
				ExtendedAttachments[i].m_AttachedPart = None;
			}
		}
	}

	Super.Destroyed();
}

function SetMovementPhysics()
{
	// override Engine.Pawn and gbxBase.gbxPawn behavior, do nothing
}

simulated function string GetCharacterName()
{
	return CharacterSetupClass.Static.GetCharacterName( m_nCharType, true );
}

simulated function string GetCharacterPortrait()
{
	return CharacterSetupClass.Static.GetCharacterPortrait( m_nCharType, true );
}

function TakeDamage( int Damage, Pawn instigatedBy, Vector hitlocation,
						Vector momentum, class<DamageType> damageType, optional name HitBoxName)
{
	// The M10 loader only dies when the tank is killed, since we need him to continue playing animations as long as the tank can fire
//	Log(name $ "("$MyTankPawn.name$")" $ ".TakeDamage() - instigatedBy = " $ instigatedBy.name $ "  Health = " $ Health, 'Tank');
}

function KillLoader(Pawn instigatedBy, class<DamageType> damageType)
{
	local Controller Killer;

	// tank has been killed, make sure loader is killed too...

//	Log(name $ ".KillLoader()", 'Tank');

	Health = -1;

	PlayHit(100, instigatedBy, Location, damageType, vect(0,0,0));

	// Pawn died
	if ( instigatedBy != None )
		Killer = instigatedBy.GetKillerController();

	if ( bPhysicsAnimUpdate )
		TearOffMomentum = vect(0,0,0);

	Died( Killer, damageType, Location );
}

function PlayHit(float Damage, Pawn InstigatedBy, vector HitLocation, class<DamageType> damageType, vector Momentum)
{
	local vector BloodOffset, Mo, HitNormal;
	local class<Effects> DesiredEffect;
	local class<Emitter> DesiredEmitter;
	local vector v1, v2;

	// DON'T spawn any blood decal (otherwise blood from loader pawn winds up on the ground below the tank)...

	if ( (Damage <= 0) && ((Controller == None) || !Controller.bGodMode) )
		return;

	v1 = HitLocation;
	v2 = Location;
	v2.Z = HitLocation.Z;

	HitNormal = Normal(v1 - v2);

	if (Damage > DamageType.Default.DamageThreshold) //spawn some/lots of blood
	{
		// Play any set effect
		if ( EffectIsRelevant(Location,true) )
		{
			DesiredEffect = DamageType.static.GetPawnDamageEffect(HitLocation, Damage, Momentum, self, (Level.bDropDetail || Level.DetailMode == DM_Low));

			if ( DesiredEffect != None )
			{
				BloodOffset = 0.2 * CollisionRadius * HitNormal;
				BloodOffset.Z = BloodOffset.Z * 0.5;

				Mo = Momentum;
				if ( Mo.Z > 0 )
					Mo.Z *= 0.5;
				spawn(DesiredEffect,self,,HitLocation + BloodOffset, rotator(Mo));
			}

			// Spawn any preset emitter

			if (IsHeadshot(HitLocation))
			{
				DesiredEmitter = DamageType.Static.GetPawnDamageHeadshotEmitter(HitLocation, Damage, Momentum, self, (Level.bDropDetail || Level.DetailMode == DM_Low));
				if (DesiredEmitter != None)
					spawn(DesiredEmitter,,,HitLocation+HitNormal, Rotator(HitNormal));
			}
			else
			{
				DesiredEmitter = DamageType.Static.GetPawnDamageEmitter(HitLocation, Damage, Momentum, self, (Level.bDropDetail || Level.DetailMode == DM_Low));
				if (DesiredEmitter != None)
					spawn(DesiredEmitter,,,HitLocation+HitNormal, Rotator(HitNormal));
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// spawn a tiny amount of blood...
		DesiredEmitter = DamageType.Static.GetPawnDamageLittleEmitter(HitLocation, Damage, Momentum, self, (Level.bDropDetail || Level.DetailMode == DM_Low));
		if (DesiredEmitter != None)
			spawn(DesiredEmitter,,,HitLocation+HitNormal, Rotator(HitNormal));
	}
}

simulated function PlayDyingAnim(class<DamageType> DamageType, vector HitLoc)
{
	Log(name $ ".PlayDyingAnim() - " $ LoaderDeathAnim, 'Tank');

	AddAnimToQueue(LoaderDeathAnim, QUEUE_DEATH_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
}

simulated event PlayDying(class<DamageType> DamageType, vector HitLoc)
{
	local IGbxPawnList PawnList;

//	Log(name $ ".PlayDying()", 'Tank');

	// DON'T do Ragdoll stuff...

	AmbientSound = None;

	if ( Role == ROLE_Authority )
	{
		PawnList = Level.GetPawnList();
		gbxPawnList( PawnList ).UnregisterGbxPawn( Self );
	}

	PlayDyingAnim(DamageType,HitLoc);

//	TriggerEvent(TriggerOnDeath, Controller, self);

	GotoState('Dying');
}

simulated function PlayWaiting( optional bool bSkipTween )
{
	// override Engine.Pawn and gbxBase.gbxPawn behavior, do nothing
}


state Idle
{
	simulated event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		Super.AnimEnd(Channel);

		if (Channel == 0)
		{
			bIdleAnimDone = true;
		}
	}

Begin:
	// NOTE: LoaderIdleAnims[0] is assumed to be the 'casual idle' animation (not much movement)
	//       it will loop continuously until it is time for a new idle animation to play

	Log(name $ ".state Idle - Begin:", 'Tank');

	AddAnimToQueue(LoaderIdleAnims[0], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

	LastIdleIndex = -1;  // no non-casual index played so far
	IdleRandomTimer = Level.TimeSeconds + IdleRandomBase + IdleRandomDelay * FRand();  // time to start next idle animation

NextIdle:

	bIdleAnimDone = false;
	while (!bIdleAnimDone)
	{
		Sleep(0.1);
	}

	if (IdleRandomTimer < Level.TimeSeconds)  // time to play next non-causal idle animation?
	{
		IdleRandomTimer = Level.TimeSeconds + IdleRandomBase + IdleRandomDelay * FRand();  // time to start next idle animation

		anim_index = Rand(LoaderIdleAnims.Length - 1);  // one less than total number, because we '++' it below
		if (anim_index == LastIdleIndex)
			anim_index = (anim_index + 1) % (LoaderIdleAnims.Length - 1);

		LastIdleIndex = anim_index;  // store the non-incremented index since that's what we compare against above

		anim_index++;  // skip index 0

//		Log(name $ ".state Idle - anim_index = " $ anim_index $ "  anim = " $ LoaderIdleAnims[anim_index], 'Tank');

		AddAnimToQueue(LoaderIdleAnims[anim_index], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
	}
	else
	{
		// play the "casual idle" animation...
		AddAnimToQueue(LoaderIdleAnims[0], QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
	}

	GotoState('Idle', 'NextIdle');
}

// this is the 'auto' state because we want the Loader pawn to start with a shell in his hands
auto state FireThenReload
{
	simulated event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		Super.AnimEnd(Channel);

		if (Channel == 0)
		{
			bIdleAnimDone = true;
		}
	}

Begin:

	Log(name $ ".state FireThenReload - Begin:", 'Tank');

	AddAnimToQueue(LoaderFireAnim, QUEUE_FIRE_RELOAD_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

	bIdleAnimDone = false;
	while (!bIdleAnimDone)
	{
		Sleep(0.1);
	}

	AddAnimToQueue(LoaderReloadAnim, QUEUE_FIRE_RELOAD_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

	bIdleAnimDone = false;
	while (!bIdleAnimDone)
	{
		Sleep(0.1);
	}

	GotoState('Idle');
}

state Dying
{
ignores Trigger, Bump, HitWall, HeadVolumeChange, PhysicsVolumeChange, Falling, BreathTimer;

	event ChangeAnimation() {}
	event StopPlayFiring() {}
	function PlayFiring(float Rate, int FiringMode) {}
	function PlayWeaponSwitch(Weapon NewWeapon) {}
	function PlayTakeHit(vector HitLoc, int Damage, class<DamageType> damageType) {}
	simulated function PlayNextAnimation() {}
	function SeePawn(Pawn OtherPawn) {}

	function BeginState()
	{
		bInvulnerableBody = true;
	}

	function Died(Controller Killer, class<DamageType> damageType, vector HitLocation)
	{
	}

	function TakeDamage( int Damage, Pawn instigatedBy, Vector hitlocation,
							Vector momentum, class<DamageType> damageType, optional name HitBoxName)
	{
	}

Begin:
	Log(name $ ".state Dying - Begin:", 'Tank');

	PlayDyingSound();
}


defaultproperties
{
	CollisionHeight=84.0

	bBlockActors=false
	bBlockPlayers=false
	bCollideActors=false
	bCollideSkeletalMesh=false
	bCollideWorld=false
	bCollideWhenPlacing=false

	Physics=PHYS_None
	Health=100

	VoiceTypeName="gbxCharacters.VoiceTypeDefault"

	bPawnBlinks=false
	bExcludeFromOracleCam=true
	bUsesHoldRifleAnim=false
}
class TNTDismountCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;

static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn ) 
{
	return true;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	if ( aPawn != None && aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).TNTDismountAnimFinished();
	}

	return true;
}class TNTMountCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;

static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn ) 
{
	return true;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	if ( aPawn != None && aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).TNTMountAnimFinished();
	}

	return true;
}class TNTPlantCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;

static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn ) 
{
	return true;
}

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	if ( aPawn != None && aPawn.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		gbxPawn( aPawn ).TNTPlantAnimFinished();
	}

	return true;
}//=============================================================================
// TruckDriverPawn:  Pawn that drives the Opel Blitz Truck
//=============================================================================
class TruckDriverPawn extends gbxPawn;


defaultproperties
{
	CollisionRadius=1.0
	CollisionHeight=1.0

	bBlockActors=false
	bBlockPlayers=false
	bCollideActors=false
	bCollideSkeletalMesh=false
	bCollideWorld=false
	bCollideWhenPlacing=false

	Physics=PHYS_None
	Health=100

	VoiceTypeName="gbxCharacters.VoiceTypeDefault"

	bPawnBlinks=false
	bExcludeFromOracleCam=true
	bUsesHoldRifleAnim=false
}
//=============================================================================
// TurretMountCallback
//
//	Callback class used with turret mount animations for player pawns only.
//
//=============================================================================
class TurretMountCallback extends PawnAnimExtra;



static function bool BeginAnim( AnimPawn aPawn );

static function bool EndAnim( AnimPawn aPawn, bool fNoStart, bool fInterrupt )
{
	local WargamePawn WGPawn;

	if (aPawn.IsA( 'WargamePawn' ) )
	{
		WGPawn = WargamePawn( aPawn );
		WGPawn.m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = false;

		if ( WGPawn.Controller.bIsHumanPlayer )
		{
			if ( WGPawn.bIsManningTurret )
				WGPawn.CompleteTurretDismount();
			else
				WGPawn.CompleteTurretMount( fNoStart );
		}

		WGPawn.PlayWaiting();
		WGPawn.PlayMoving();

		return true;
	}

	return false;
}

// VoiceTypeCampbell - created 5/02/05 GBX:RSC
//----------------------------------------------------------------

class VoiceTypeCampbell extends VoiceType;

defaultproperties
{
	PackageName="BD_CAMPBELL"
	PlayerSayingMyNameString="BD_HARTSOCK.L_campbell_A"
	Player2SayingMyNameString="BD_BAKER.L_campbell_A"

	SpeechSoundInfos(0)=(GroupName="Dummy",KeyName="Dummy");

	// See Enemy Maneuvering
	SpeechSoundInfos(1)=(GroupName=EnemyMoving,KeyName=TheyreMoving,SoundName="M_SEEENEMYMOVE_A",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=true)
	SpeechSoundInfos(2)=(GroupName=EnemyMoving,KeyName=TakingOff,SoundName="M_SEEENEMYMOVE_B",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=true)	
	SpeechSoundInfos(3)=(GroupName=EnemyMoving,KeyName=OtherSide,SoundName="M_SEEENEMYMOVE_C",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=true)

class VoiceTypeCourtland extends VoiceType;

defaultproperties
{
	PackageName="BD_COURTLAND"

	PlayerSayingMyNameString="BD_HARTSOCK.L_courtland_A"
	Player2SayingMyNameString="BD_BAKER.L_courtland_A"

	SpeechSoundInfos(0)=(GroupName="Dummy",KeyName="Dummy");

//----------------------------------------------------------------
// VoiceTypeDesola
//----------------------------------------------------------------

class VoiceTypeDesola extends VoiceType;

defaultproperties
{
	PackageName="BD_DESOLA"
	PlayerSayingMyNameString="BD_HARTSOCK.L_desola_A"
	Player2SayingMyNameString="BD_BAKER.L_desola_A"

// GEARBOX 2004-12-09 JWS created
// This defines the voices for German MP character Voice B
class VoiceTypeMPDEB extends VoiceType;

defaultproperties
{
	PackageName="MP_PAWN_GER_B";
	SpeechSoundInfos(0)=(GroupName="Dummy",KeyName="Dummy");

//=============== Codebook ===============

	// Codebook Victory
	SpeechSoundInfos(1)=(GroupName=CodebookVictory,KeyName=WeGotCodebook,SoundName="M_CODEBOOKVICTORY_A",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=false)
	SpeechSoundInfos(2)=(GroupName=CodebookVictory,KeyName=CodebookIsSafe,SoundName="M_CODEBOOKVICTORY_B",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=false)

// VoiceTypeMPDEPB
//
// German Player 2 for Multiplayer/Skirmish games - in German
//----------------------------------------------------------------
class VoiceTypeMPDEPB extends VoiceType;
 
defaultproperties
{
	PackageName="BD_CMD_GER_B"

	SpeechSoundInfos(0)=(GroupName="Dummy",KeyName="Dummy");

	// Assault Command - Generic

	SpeechSoundInfos(5)=(GroupName=AssaultGeneric,KeyName=GoAssault,SoundName="L_ASSAULT_E",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=true)
	SpeechSoundInfos(6)=(GroupName=AssaultGeneric,KeyName=Charge,SoundName="L_ASSAULT_F",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=true)

// GEARBOX 2004-12-09 JWS created
// This defines the voices for US MP character Voice B
class VoiceTypeMPUSB extends VoiceType;

defaultproperties
{
	PackageName="MP_PAWN_ENG_B";
	SpeechSoundInfos(0)=(GroupName="Dummy",KeyName="Dummy");

//=============== Codebook ===============

	// Codebook Victory
	SpeechSoundInfos(1)=(GroupName=CodebookVictory,KeyName=WeGotCodebook,SoundName="M_CODEBOOKVICTORY_A",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=false)
	SpeechSoundInfos(2)=(GroupName=CodebookVictory,KeyName=CodebookIsSafe,SoundName="M_CODEBOOKVICTORY_B",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=false)

	// Codebook Defeat

	SpeechSoundInfos(4)=(GroupName=CodebookDefeat,KeyName=CodebookIsSafe,SoundName="M_CODEBOOKDEFEAT_B",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=false)

//----------------------------------------------------------------
// VoiceTypeSKDED
//
// German Pawn for Skirmish games - in German
//----------------------------------------------------------------
class VoiceTypeSKDED extends VoiceType;

defaultproperties
{
	PackageName="SK_PAWN_GER_D";
	SpeechSoundInfos(0)=(GroupName="Dummy",KeyName="Dummy");

	// See Enemy Maneuvering
	SpeechSoundInfos(1)=(GroupName=EnemyMoving,KeyName=EnemyMovingA,SoundName="M_SEEENEMYMOVE_A",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500)
	SpeechSoundInfos(2)=(GroupName=EnemyMoving,KeyName=EnemyMovingB,SoundName="M_SEEENEMYMOVE_B",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500)	
	SpeechSoundInfos(3)=(GroupName=EnemyMoving,KeyName=EnemyMovingC,SoundName="M_SEEENEMYMOVE_C",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500) 
	SpeechSoundInfos(4)=(GroupName=EnemyMoving,KeyName=EnemyMovingD,SoundName="M_SEEENEMYMOVE_D",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500)	

	// First Enemy Sighted

//----------------------------------------------------------------
// VoiceTypeSPGermanA
//----------------------------------------------------------------
class VoiceTypeSPGermanA extends VoiceType;

// TODO: replace german_battle_com with real sounds
defaultproperties
{
	PackageName="BD_SP_GER_A";

	SpeechSoundInfos(0)=(GroupName="Dummy",KeyName="Dummy");

	// See Enemy Maneuvering
	SpeechSoundInfos(1)=(GroupName=EnemyMoving,KeyName=EnemyMovingA,SoundName="M_SEEENEMYMOVE_A",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=true)
	SpeechSoundInfos(2)=(GroupName=EnemyMoving,KeyName=EnemyMovingB,SoundName="M_SEEENEMYMOVE_B",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=true)	
	SpeechSoundInfos(3)=(GroupName=EnemyMoving,KeyName=EnemyMovingC,SoundName="M_SEEENEMYMOVE_C",Volume=1.0,Pitch=1.0,Radius=500,bPreload=true)

// WargamePawn:  base class of gbx pawns which use MoCap animation
//=============================================================================

class WargamePawn extends gbxPawn
	native;

#exec OBJ LOAD FILE=..\texture\t_interface_mb.utx



enum EHitArea
{
	HitHead,
	HitChest,
	HitBack,
	HitLegs,
	HitArms,
	HitOther
};

enum ESpeedLevel
{
	SL_Creeping,
	SL_Walking,
	SL_Running,
	SL_Sprinting
};

const	MODE_Nothing	= 0;
const	MODE_Knife		= 1;
