var Texture m_LCDUnit[3];
var Texture m_LCDCircle;

native final function DrawGBXHudC(canvas Canvas, gbxHud Hud, FontInfo Fonts, int nPass);

replication
{
	reliable if (ROLE==ROLE_Authority)
		ClientTookDamage;
		
	reliable if ( bNetDirty && (ROLE==ROLE_Authority) )
		m_flSprintTimer;

	// replicated functions sent to server by owning client
	reliable if( Role<ROLE_Authority )
		ServerChangedSecondaryWeapon;
}

simulated function PostNetBeginPlay()
{
	Super.PostNetBeginPlay();
	
	// GBX:PAD: Reduce the walk/run threshold since we're reducing the speed of things due to the limp animation playing
	GroundSpeed = GetIdealGroundSpeed();
	BaseMovementRate = GetIdealBaseMovementRate();
}

function Reset()
{
	Super.Reset();
}

/*
function GiveJob( EJobType NewJob )
{
	Job = NewJob;
}
*/

simulated function DrawUnitTile( Canvas Canvas, gbxHUD HUD, int nXPos, int nYPos, Unit aUnit )
{
	local float fReinforcingTimeScale, fReinforcingSizeScale, fTimeRemaining;

	fReinforcingSizeScale = 1.0;

	if ( Level.NetMode == NM_LISTENSERVER || Level.NetMode == NM_CLIENT )
	{
		fTimeRemaining = aUnit.GetReinforcementsEffectTimeRemaining();
		if ( fTimeRemaining > 0.0 )
		{
			// PSV: 6/17/2004 In MP games, we want to scale the unit icons on the compass when they've just reinforced.
			fReinforcingTimeScale = aUnit.GetReinforcementsEffectTimeRemaining() / aUnit.GetReinforcementsEffectDuration();
			fReinforcingSizeScale = 1.0 + ( fReinforcingTimeScale * (m_fUnitReinforcementsIconMultiplier - 1.0) );

			// PSV: 7/19/2004 Update member variable if larger
			if ( fTimeRemaining > m_fReinforcementEffectTimeRemaining )
				m_fReinforcementEffectTimeRemaining = fTimeRemaining;
		}
	}

	Canvas.SetPos( nXPos, nYPos );
	if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
	{
		switch (aUnit.UnitType)
		{
			case EUnitType.UnitType_Assault:
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.flMinScaleX * fReinforcingSizeScale, 17 * Hud.flMinScaleY * fReinforcingSizeScale, 35, 221, 17, 17);
				break;
			case EUnitType.UnitType_Base:
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.flMinScaleX * fReinforcingSizeScale, 17 * Hud.flMinScaleY * fReinforcingSizeScale, 35, 204, 17, 17);
				break;
			case EUnitType.UnitType_Vehicle:
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.flMinScaleX, 17 * Hud.flMinScaleY, 35, 238, 17, 17);
				break;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		switch (aUnit.UnitType)
		{
		case EUnitType.UnitType_Assault:
			Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale * fReinforcingSizeScale, 17 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale * fReinforcingSizeScale, 35, 221, 17, 17);
			break;
		case EUnitType.UnitType_Base:
			Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale * fReinforcingSizeScale, 17 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale * fReinforcingSizeScale, 35, 204, 17, 17);
			break;
		case EUnitType.UnitType_Vehicle:
			Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 17 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 35, 238, 17, 17);
			break;
		}
	}
}

simulated function DrawCompassUnit( Canvas Canvas, gbxHUD HUD, int nPass, int nCurUnitIdx )
{
	local gbxPlayerController P;
	local Unit ledUnit, tempUnit;
	local int	nUnitColorIdx, nAngle;
	local color UnitColor;
	local Vector View,x,y,z;
	local Rotator	ViewAngle, aRotation;
	local bool	fCalcAxes;
	local float cx,cy,cx2,cy2;
	local float flObjectiveDot, flRightDot, xPos, yPos, xPos2, yPos2;

	// Draw any beacons
	P = gbxPlayerController(Controller);
	if (P==None)
		return;

	ledUnit = P.GetPlayerLedUnit();
	if (ledUnit==None)
		return;

	tempUnit = ledUnit.SubUnits[ nCurUnitIdx ];
	if (tempUnit==None)
		return;

	if (tempUnit.NumMembers == 0)
		return;
		
	nUnitColorIdx = tempUnit.GetUnitEffectiveness();
	if (nUnitColorIdx == 2)
		UnitColor = class'Canvas'.Static.MakeColor( 107, 147, 28, 255 );
	else if (nUnitColorIdx == 1)
		UnitColor = class'Canvas'.Static.MakeColor( 193, 188, 44, 255 );
	else
		UnitColor = class'Canvas'.Static.MakeColor( 223, 95, 28 );
				
	if (tempUnit.IsAttachedToSuperUnit())
	{
		switch (tempUnit.bUnitID)
		{
			case 1:
				if (nCurUnitIdx == P.iAddresseeUnit)
				{
					Canvas.SetDrawColor(228,220,197,255);
					if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
					{
						Canvas.SetPos( (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (24.5 * Hud.flMinScaleX), (346 * Hud.ScaleY) + (24.5 * Hud.flMinScaleY) );
						Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',21 * Hud.flMinScaleX, 21 * Hud.flMinScaleY, 57, 187, 21, 21);
					}
					else
					{
						Canvas.SetPos( (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (24.5 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), (300 * Hud.ScaleY) + (24.5 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale) );
						Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',21 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 21 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 57, 187, 21, 21);
					}
				}
				Canvas.SetDrawColor(UnitColor.R, UnitColor.G, UnitColor.B);
//				Canvas.SetPos( (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (29.5 * Hud.flMinScaleX), (346 * Hud.ScaleY) + (29.5 * Hud.flMinScaleY) );
//				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.ScaleX, 17 * Hud.ScaleY, 159, 66, 17, 17);
				if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
					DrawUnitTile( Canvas, HUD, (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (27 * Hud.flMinScaleX), (346 * Hud.ScaleY) + (27 * Hud.flMinScaleY), tempUnit );
				else
					DrawUnitTile( Canvas, HUD, (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (27 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), (300 * Hud.ScaleY) + (27 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), tempUnit );
				break;
			case 2:
				if (nCurUnitIdx == P.iAddresseeUnit)
				{
					Canvas.SetDrawColor(228,220,197,255);
					if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
					{
						Canvas.SetPos( (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (24.5 * Hud.flMinScaleX), (346 * Hud.ScaleY) + (46.5 * Hud.flMinScaleY) );
						Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',21 * Hud.flMinScaleX, 21 * Hud.flMinScaleY, 57, 187, 21, 21);
					}
					else
					{
						Canvas.SetPos( (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (24.5 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), (300 * Hud.ScaleY) + (46.5 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale) );
						Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',21 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 21 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 57, 187, 21, 21);
					}
				}
				Canvas.SetDrawColor(UnitColor.R, UnitColor.G, UnitColor.B);
//				Canvas.SetPos( (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (29.5 * Hud.flMinScaleX), (346 * Hud.ScaleY) + (51.5 * Hud.flMinScaleY) );
//				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.ScaleX, 17 * Hud.ScaleY, 159, 100, 17, 17);
				if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
					DrawUnitTile( Canvas, HUD, (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (27 * Hud.flMinScaleX), (346 * Hud.ScaleY) + (49 * Hud.flMinScaleY), tempUnit );
				else
					DrawUnitTile( Canvas, HUD, (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (27 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), (300 * Hud.ScaleY) + (49 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), tempUnit );
				break;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		if ((m_flNextHudCalc < Level.TimeSeconds) || (tempUnit.bUnitID == 0) || !HUD.bOptimizedCompass)
		{
			if (!fCalcAxes)
			{
//				ViewAngle = GetViewRotation();
				ViewAngle.Yaw = HUD.m_nCompassYaw;
				ViewAngle.Pitch = 0;
				GetAxes(ViewAngle, X, Y, Z);
				fCalcAxes = true;
			}

			if ((gbxSVehicle(Base) != None) && (tempUnit.UnitType == EUnitType.UnitType_Vehicle))
			{
				View = X;
			}
			else
			{
				View = tempUnit.GetUnitCentroid() - Location;
				View.Z = 0;
			}
			flObjectiveDot = Normal(View) Dot X;
			flRightDot = Normal(View) Dot Y;

			cx = 40 * flRightDot;
			cy = 40 * -flObjectiveDot;

			nAngle = 65536/6.283 * atan( flObjectiveDot, flRightDot );
			nAngle = (49150 + nAngle) & 0xffff;

			xPos = 36 + cx;
			yPos = 37 + cy;

			if (tempUnit.bUnitID > 0)
			{
				m_flUnitXPos[ tempUnit.bUnitID - 1 ] = xPos;
				m_flUnitYPos[ tempUnit.bUnitID - 1 ] = yPos;
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if (tempUnit.bUnitID > 0)
			{
				xPos = m_flUnitXPos[ tempUnit.bUnitID - 1 ];
				yPos = m_flUnitYPos[ tempUnit.bUnitID - 1 ];
			}
		}

		if (tempUnit.Leader != None && !HUD.bIsSplitScreen)
		{
			xPos2 = xPos + 2.5;
			yPos2 = yPos + 2.5;
			
			if ((m_flNextHudCalc < Level.TimeSeconds) || (tempUnit.bUnitID == 0) || !HUD.bOptimizedCompass)
			{
				aRotation.Yaw = tempUnit.Leader.Rotation.Yaw;
				aRotation.Roll = 0;
				aRotation.Pitch = 0;
				flObjectiveDot = Vector(aRotation) Dot X;
				flRightDot = Vector(aRotation) Dot Y;

				if (nCurUnitIdx == P.iAddresseeUnit)
				{
					cx2 = 10.75 * flRightDot;
					cy2 = 10.75 * -flObjectiveDot;
				}
				else
				{
					cx2 = 8.5 * flRightDot;
					cy2 = 8.5 * -flObjectiveDot;
				}

				nAngle = 65536/6.283 * atan( flObjectiveDot, -flRightDot );
				nAngle = (49150 + nAngle) & 0xffff;

				xPos2 = xPos2 + cx2 + 3.4;
				yPos2 = yPos2 + cy2 + 4.4;

				if (tempUnit.bUnitID > 0)
				{
					m_flUnitDirXPos[ tempUnit.bUnitID - 1 ] = xPos2;
					m_flUnitDirYPos[ tempUnit.bUnitID - 1 ] = yPos2;
					m_nUnitDirAngle[ tempUnit.bUnitID - 1 ] = nAngle;
				}
			}
			else
			{
				if (tempUnit.bUnitID > 0)
				{
					xPos2 = m_flUnitDirXPos[ tempUnit.bUnitID - 1 ];
					yPos2 = m_flUnitDirYPos[ tempUnit.bUnitID - 1 ];
					nAngle = m_nUnitDirAngle[ tempUnit.bUnitID - 1 ];
				}
			}

			if (nCurUnitIdx == P.iAddresseeUnit)
			{
				Canvas.SetDrawColor(228,220,197,255);
			}
			else
			{
				Canvas.DrawColor = UnitColor;
			}
			aRotation.Yaw = nAngle;

			//////////////////////////////////////////////
			// Draw triangle in direction of unit on ring
			/////////////////////////////////////////////
			if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
			{
				Canvas.SetPos((43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (xPos2 * Hud.flMinScaleX), (346 * Hud.ScaleY) + (yPos2 * Hud.flMinScaleY));
				Canvas.DrawTileRotated(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',9 * Hud.flMinScaleX, 7 * Hud.flMinScaleY, 105, 178, 9, 7, (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + ((xPos2 + 4.4) * Hud.flMinScaleX), (346 * Hud.ScaleY) + ((yPos2 + 3.4) * Hud.flMinScaleY), aRotation);
			}
			else
			{
				Canvas.SetPos((43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (xPos2 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), (300 * Hud.ScaleY) + (yPos2 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale));
				Canvas.DrawTileRotated(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',9 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 7 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 105, 178, 9, 7, (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + ((xPos2 + 4.4) * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), (346 * Hud.ScaleY) + ((yPos2 + 3.4) * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), aRotation);
			}
		}
		
		if (nCurUnitIdx == P.iAddresseeUnit)
		{
			Canvas.SetDrawColor(228,220,197,255);
			if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
			{
				Canvas.SetPos((43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (xPos * Hud.flMinScaleX), (346 * Hud.ScaleY) + (yPos * Hud.flMinScaleY));
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',21 * Hud.flMinScaleX, 21 * Hud.flMinScaleY, 57, 187, 21, 21);
			}
			else
			{
				Canvas.SetPos((43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (xPos * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), (300 * Hud.ScaleY) + (yPos * Hud.flSplitScreenScale));
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',21 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 21 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 57, 187, 21, 21);
			}
		}
		Canvas.DrawColor = UnitColor;
		
		xPos += 2.5;
		yPos += 2.5;

		if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
            DrawUnitTile( Canvas, HUD, (43.0f * Hud.ScaleX) + (xPos * Hud.flMinScaleX), (346.0f * Hud.ScaleY) + (yPos * Hud.flMinScaleY), tempUnit );
		else
			DrawUnitTile( Canvas, HUD, (43.0f * Hud.ScaleX) + (xPos * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), (300.0f * Hud.ScaleY) + (yPos * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), tempUnit );
/*		
		switch (tempUnit.bUnitID)
		{
			case 1:
				Canvas.SetPos(xPos * Hud.ScaleX, yPos * Hud.ScaleY);
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.ScaleX, 17 * Hud.ScaleY, 159, 66, 17, 17);
				break;
			case 2:
				Canvas.SetPos(xPos * Hud.ScaleX, yPos * Hud.ScaleY);
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.ScaleX, 17 * Hud.ScaleY, 159, 83, 17, 17);
				break;
			case 3:
				Canvas.SetPos(xPos * Hud.ScaleX, yPos * Hud.ScaleY);
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.ScaleX, 17 * Hud.ScaleY, 159, 100, 17, 17);
				break;
		}
*/
	}
}

simulated function DrawGBXHud( canvas Canvas, gbxHud Hud, FontInfo Fonts, int nPass )
{
	// Draw LCD Info
	local gbxPlayerController P;
	local Unit ledUnit;

	DrawGBXHudC( Canvas, Hud, Fonts, nPass );
	
	if (nPass == 0)
	{
		P = gbxPlayerController(Controller);
		if (P==None)
			return;

		ledUnit = P.GetAddresseeUnit();
		if(ledUnit != None)
		{
			if (ledUnit.UnitType < UnitType_None)
			{
				Canvas.DrawLCDIcon(1, m_LCDUnit[ledUnit.UnitType], 4, 3);
				if (ledUnit.IsAttachedToSuperUnit())
					Canvas.DrawLCDIcon(1, m_LCDCircle, 0, 0);
			}				 
			Canvas.SetLCDFontSize(11);
			Canvas.DrawLCDText(1, ledUnit.GetUnitTypeName(), 43, 0);
			if (Level.NetMode == NM_Standalone && ledUnit.Leader != None)
			{
				Canvas.SetLCDFontSize(8);
				Canvas.DrawLCDText(1, ledUnit.Leader.CharacterName, 50, 20);
			}
						
			Canvas.ResetLCDFontSize();
		}
	}
}

simulated function DrawSelfForGBXHud( canvas Canvas, gbxHud Hud, FontInfo Fonts, int nPass )
{
	DrawSelfForGBXHudC( Canvas, Hud, Fonts, nPass );
}

/*
// Allow each class to draw something to the hud if needed
simulated function DrawGBXHud(canvas Canvas, gbxHud Hud, FontInfo Fonts, int nPass)
{
	local gbxPlayerController P;

	local float reinforcePercentage;

	// Draw any beacons

			Canvas.SetDrawColor(185, 48, 38);
		else if (Health < 50)
			Canvas.SetDrawColor(231,144,30);
		else if (Health < 80)
			Canvas.SetDrawColor(144,231,30);
		else
			Canvas.SetDrawColor(21,217,11);
		
		if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
		{
			Canvas.SetPos((43 * Hud.flMinScaleX) + (44 * Hud.ScaleX), (346 * Hud.ScaleY) + (22 * Hud.flMinScaleY));
			if (bIsCrouched)
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',25 * Hud.flMinScaleX,46 * Hud.flMinScaleY,167,129,25,48);
			else
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',25 * Hud.flMinScaleX,46 * Hud.flMinScaleY,142,129,25,48);
		}
		else
		{
			Canvas.SetPos((43 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale) + (44 * Hud.ScaleX), (300 * Hud.ScaleY) + (22 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale));
			if (bIsCrouched)
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',25 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale,46 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale,167,129,25,48);
			else
				Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',25 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale,46 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale,142,129,25,48);
		}
		
		Canvas.SetDrawColor(0, 0, 0, 102);

		if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
		{
			Canvas.SetPos( (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (26.5 * Hud.flMinScaleX), (345.5 * Hud.ScaleY) + (27 * Hud.flMinScaleY) );
			Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.flMinScaleX, 17 * Hud.flMinScaleY, 35, 187, 17, 17);
			Canvas.SetPos( (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (26.5 * Hud.flMinScaleX), (345.5 * Hud.ScaleY) + (49 * Hud.flMinScaleY) );
			Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.flMinScaleX, 17 * Hud.flMinScaleY, 35, 187, 17, 17);
		}
		else
		{
			Canvas.SetPos( (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (26.5 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), (299.5 * Hud.ScaleY) + (27 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale) );
			Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 17 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 35, 187, 17, 17);
			Canvas.SetPos( (43 * Hud.ScaleX) + (26.5 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale), (299.5 * Hud.ScaleY) + (49 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale) );
			Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',17 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 17 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 35, 187, 17, 17);
		}

		Canvas.SetDrawColor(228,220,197);
		ledUnit = P.GetPlayerLedUnit();

		if( (ledUnit != None) && (ledUnit.NumSubUnits > 0) )
		{
			nCurUnitIdx = 0;
			do
			{
				if (nCurUnitIdx != P.iAddresseeUnit)
				{
					DrawCompassUnit( Canvas, HUD, nPass, nCurUnitIdx );
				}

				nCurUnitIdx++;
			}
			until (nCurUnitIdx >= ledUnit.NumSubUnits);

			// Do this so that the active unit is always on top of all the others.
			DrawCompassUnit( Canvas, HUD, nPass, P.iAddresseeUnit );
		}
		if (m_flNextHudCalc < Level.TimeSeconds)
		{
			m_flNextHudCalc = Level.TimeSeconds + WGPAWN_HUD_CALC_INTERVAL;
		}
	}

		// PSV: 7/16/2004 Experiment with drawing the MP reinforcement count next to player icon
		if ( Level.NetMode == NM_LISTENSERVER || Level.NetMode == NM_CLIENT )
		{
			if ( Hud.PlayerOwner.Pawn != None ) 
			{
				oldFont = Canvas.Font;
				Canvas.Font = Hud.WargameFontNumbers;

				if ( gbxPawn(Hud.PlayerOwner.Pawn).MyUnit != None )
					reinforcePercentage = m_fReinforcementEffectTimeRemaining / gbxPawn(Hud.PlayerOwner.Pawn).MyUnit.GetReinforcementsEffectDuration();

					reinforcePercentage = 0.0;

				{
					Canvas.SetPos( ( 180 - XL ) * Hud.ScaleX, 404* Hud.ScaleY );
					Canvas.DrawText(s,false, Hud.ScaleX, Hud.ScaleY);
				}
				else
				{
					Canvas.SetPos( ( 175 - XL ) * Hud.ScaleX, 376* Hud.ScaleY );
					Canvas.DrawText(s,false, Hud.flSplitScreenScale, Hud.flSplitScreenScale);
				}

				Canvas.Font = oldFont;

				// Background grime
				Canvas.SetDrawColor(26,20,14,51);
				if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
				{
					Canvas.SetPos( 145 * Hud.ScaleX, 411 * Hud.ScaleY );
					Canvas.DrawTile( material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp', 65 * Hud.flMinScaleX, 31 * Hud.flMinScaleY, 412, 205, 65, 31);
				}

				{
					Canvas.SetPos( 145 * Hud.ScaleX, 387 * Hud.ScaleY );
					Canvas.DrawTile( material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp', 65 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 31 * Hud.flSplitScreenScale, 412, 205, 65, 31);
				}

				Canvas.SetDrawColor(228, 220, 197,51+(204 * reinforcePercentage));

				if ( !HUD.bIsSplitScreen )
				{
					Canvas.SetPos( 190 * Hud.ScaleX, 415 * Hud.ScaleY );
					Canvas.DrawTile(material't_interface_mb.hud.interface_comp',0.5 * 25 * Hud.flMinScaleX,0.5 * 46 * Hud.flMinScaleY,142,129,25,48);

				}
			}
			else
			{
				Log( self$ " WargamePawn::DrawGbxHUD() Hud.PlayerOwner.Pawn == None!", 'PSV');
			}
		}
	}
}

// DrawBeacon allows us to screen for certain becaons
simulated function DrawBeacon(gbxBeacons B, Canvas C, gbxHud H,  float X, float Y)
{
	B.DrawBeacon(Self,C,H,X,Y);
}


function Died(Controller Killer, class<DamageType> damageType, vector HitLocation)
{
	Super.Died(Killer, damageType, HitLocation);

	// We died while on a turret.  Let make sure we completely dismount it
	if (bIsManningTurret)
		CompleteTurretDismount();
}

function PlayDyingSound()
{
	// only play the sound if this is a player. the ai death sounds are handled in mind
	if( self.IsA( 'gbxPlayerPawn' ) )
	{
		if( Level.NetMode == NM_Standalone )
	{
			//log( "WargamePawn::PlayDyingSound() - " $ self $ " has died.", 'RSC' );
		bPlayPlayerDyingSounds=true;
		fLastTimeDyingSoundPlayed=Level.TimeSeconds;
		BulletPassByCue = LoadSound( "IMPACTS.BULLET_PASSBY" );
		if( BulletPassByCue != None )
		{
			Self.PlayOwnedSoundCue( BulletPassByCue, SLOT_None,,,,, );
		}
		else
		{
			log( "WargamePawn::PlayDyingSound() - Could NOT Load Sound IMPACTS.BULLET_PASSBY", 'RSC' );
		}

		BulletBodyCue = LoadSound( "IMPACTS.BULLET_BODY" );
		if( BulletBodyCue != None )
		{
			Self.PlayOwnedSoundCue( BulletBodyCue, SLOT_None,,,,, );
		}
		else
		{
			log( "WargamePawn::PlayDyingSound() - Could NOT Load Sound IMPACTS.BULLET_BODY", 'RSC' );
		}

		Level.TheAISpeechManager.PlaySpeech( 
				self, 
			None,
			'Pain',
			,
			,
			0.0, 
			MyUnit, 
			1.0, 
			0.5 
		);

		Level.TheAISpeechManager.PlaySpeech( 
				self, 
			None,
			'Death',
			,
			,
			0.5, 
			MyUnit, 
			1.0, 
			0.5 
		);
	}
	else
	{
			log( "WargamePawn::PlayDyingSound() - " $ self $ " has died.", 'RSC' );
	Level.TheAISpeechManager.PlaySpeech( 
				self, 
		None,
		'Death',
		,
		,
		0.0, 
		MyUnit, 
		1.0, 
		0.5 
	);
	}
	}
	return;
}

function PlayTeleportEffect(bool bOut, bool bSound)
{
	// Removed for Bug #15974 
	// Causes the fov to change quickly over time when spawned in.
	//if ( IsHumanControlled() )
	//	PlayerController(Controller).SetFOVAngle(135);
}

function PrevSkill()
{
	if( gbxWeapon(Weapon)!=None )
		gbxWeapon(Weapon).PrevWeaponFunction();
}

function NextSkill()
{
	if( gbxWeapon(Weapon) != None )
		gbxWeapon(Weapon).NextWeaponFunction();
}

// Clean up the Influences

simulated event Destroyed()
{
	Super.Destroyed();	
	WaterRippleEmitter.Kill();		//Remove the water ripple emitter from memory
}

function CheckBob(float DeltaTime, vector Y)
{
//	if (bWeaponDrawn)
//	{
//		BobTime += 0.2 * DeltaTime;
//		WalkBob = 100.0 * Y * ZoomBob * sin(8 * BobTime);
//		return;
//	}

	Super.CheckBob(DeltaTime, Y);
}

simulated function DisplayDebug(Canvas Canvas, out float YL, out float YPos)
{
	local int i, ndx, Priority;
	local byte bPlayingFull, bLooping;
	local name AnimName;
	local float AnimFrame, AnimRate;

	Super.DisplayDebug(Canvas, YL, YPos);

	Canvas.DrawColor.R = 255;
	Canvas.DrawColor.B = 0;
	Canvas.DrawColor.G = 0;
	
	YPos += YL;
	Canvas.SetPos(4,YPos);
	Canvas.DrawText("ANIMQUEUE CONTENTS:", false);	
	
	for( ndx = 0; ndx < AnimQueue.Length; ++ndx )
	{
		if ((AnimQueue[ ndx ].nChannel == 0) && (AnimQueue[ ndx ].bPlaying == 1))
		{
			Priority = AnimQueue[ ndx ].nPriority;
			bPlayingFull = AnimQueue[ ndx ].bPlayFull;
			bLooping = AnimQueue[ ndx ].bLoop;
			break;
		}
	}

	GetAnimParams( 0, AnimName, AnimFrame, AnimRate );
	YPos += YL;
	Canvas.SetPos(4,YPos);
	Canvas.DrawText( "ANIM QUEUE:", false);
	YPos += YL;
	Canvas.SetPos(4,YPos);
	Canvas.DrawText( "CUR: "$AnimName$" - FR "$AnimFrame$" ; PRI "$Priority$" FULL "$bPlayingFull$" ; LOOP "$bLooping, false);
	YPos += YL;
	Canvas.SetPos(4,YPos);	

	for( i = 0; i < AnimQueue.Length; ++i )
	{
		Canvas.DrawText( i$": "$AnimQueue[i].szAnimName$" - PRI "$AnimQueue[i].nPriority$" ; FULL "$AnimQueue[i].bPlayFull$" ; LOOP "$AnimQueue[i].bLoop, false);
		YPos += YL;
		Canvas.SetPos(4,YPos);
	}

	if ( IdleQueue.Length > 0 )
	{
		YPos += YL;
		Canvas.SetPos(4,YPos);
		Canvas.DrawText( "IDLE QUEUE:", false);
		YPos += YL;
		Canvas.SetPos(4,YPos);
		
		for( i = 0; i < IdleQueue.Length; ++i )
		{
			Canvas.DrawText( i$": "$IdleQueue[i].szAnimName$" - HASPLAYED "$IdleQueue[i].bAnimHasBeenPlayed, false);
			YPos += YL;
			Canvas.SetPos(4,YPos);
		}
	}
}


function int AdjustHitLocDamage( Pawn instigatedBy, int Damage, EHitArea aHitArea )
{
	local	int	nAdjustedDamage;	

	nAdjustedDamage = Damage;

	// Handle headshots.  Here's the rule:
	// Allow headshots iff:
	// 1) The victim is not human-controlled;
	// 2) The shooter IS human-controlled.
	//
	// Headshots are instant-kill.
	//
	// TODO optional hitbox location-based damage.
	if ( !IsHumanControlled() && instigatedBy.IsHumanControlled() )
	{
		switch (aHitArea)
		{
			case HitHead:
				nAdjustedDamage = Health;
				break;

			case HitChest:
				break;

			case HitBack:
				break;

			case HitLegs:
				break;

			case HitArms:
				break;

			case HitOther:
				break;
		}
	}

	return nAdjustedDamage;
}

function TakeDamage( int Damage, Pawn instigatedBy, Vector hitlocation,
						Vector momentum, class<DamageType> damageType, optional name HitBoxName)
{
	local gbxPlayerController PC;
	local float dist;
	//local Vector DontCareVect;

//jlbxx	if (HitBoxName != '')
//jlbxx		Log(name $ ".TakeDamage(WargamePawn) - HitBoxName = " $ HitBoxName);

	if ((DrawType == DT_StaticMesh) && !fCanTakeDamage)
	{
		return;
	}

	if (!Level.m_fFriendlyFire)
	{
		// Player can always hurt himself
		if ( damageType.Name != 'DamageRunOver' && instigatedBy != Self )
		{
			if( SameTeamAs( instigatedBy ) )
			{
				// No friendly fire in multiplayer.  Only explosive friendly fire in single player, if the flag is set
				if( Level.NetMode != NM_Standalone || !damageType.Default.m_bExplosiveDamage || !bFriendlyExplosiveDamage )
				{
						PlayFlinch();
						PlayMoving();
						return;
				}
			}
		}
	}

	// If we're in tactical view and in MP, pull us out.
	if ( Level.NetMode == NM_LISTENSERVER )
	{
		if ( Controller != None )
		{
			PC = gbxPlayerController(Controller);
			if ( PC != None )
			{
				if ( PC.bInOracleCameraMP && !(PC.OracleCam.bActivating && !PC.OracleCam.bActivatingUp) )
				{
					Log("WargamePawn::TakeDamage Deactivating oracle camera since yo ass got shot!", 'PSV');
					PC.ActivateOracle();
				}
			}
		}
	}

	// Ignore the damage request if the target is mounted on a turret and the turret disapproves
	// of the shot (used to prevent snipers from killing MG42 gunners from a distance).
	if ( Turret != None && Turret.RejectDamageRequest(  instigatedBy, Self, damageType ) )
		return;

	if (bIsHalftrackRider)  // is this Pawn a passenger or MG42 gunner in a Halftrack?
	{
		// was it bullet type damage and was it an AI guy that instigated the damage?
		if ( damageType.default.m_bBulletDamage && !instigatedBy.IsHumanControlled() )
		{
			dist = VSize(instigatedBy.Location - Location);
			if (dist > HALFTRACK_AI_NO_BULLET_DAMAGE_RANGE)  // ignore damage unless AI is close enough
			{
				return;
			}
		}
	}

	// For AI pawns: when hit, stop firing whatever burst you might be in the middle of.
	if ( !IsHumanControlled() )
		StopFiringWeapon();
	
/*
	// Do location based damage for all gbxDamageTypes except DamageRunOver.
	if ( !ClassIsChildOf( damageType, class'DamageRunOver' ) && ClassIsChildOf(damageType, class 'gbxDamageType') )
	{
		m_eLastHitLoc = CalcHitAdjust(0, damageType, HitLocation, DontCareVect );
		Damage = AdjustHitLocDamage( instigatedBy, Damage, m_eLastHitLoc ); // SJP
	}
*/

	Super.TakeDamage(Damage, instigatedBy, hitlocation, momentum, damageType);

	RegisterDamageWithProtectionTimer();

	PlayFlinch();
	PlayMoving();

	UpdateGroundSpeed();
}

simulated function ClientTookDamage( Vector hitdir, Pawn instigatedBy )
{
	local gbxPlayerController PC;

	PC = gbxPlayerController(Controller);
	
	if (PC != None)
	{	
		// PSV: 5/26/2004 If we're in tactical view and in MP, pull us out.
		if ( Level.NetMode == NM_CLIENT )
		{
			if ( PC.bInOracleCameraMP && !(PC.OracleCam.bActivating && !PC.OracleCam.bActivatingUp) )
			{
				// Not no mo' you aint sucka!
				Log("WargamePawn::ClientTookDamage Deactivating oracle camera since yo ass got shot!", 'PSV');
				PC.ActivateOracle();
			}
		}
	}
}

// Lame attempt at locational damage.  Calculates the rotational adjustments based on where you are hit and the % of the full
// damage you receive.
function EHitArea CalcHitAdjust(int DamagePct, class<DamageType> damageType, vector HitLoc, out vector KickAdjust)
{
	local vector X,Y,Z, HitVec, HitVec2D;
	local float dotx, doty;
	local EHitArea	aHitSpot;

	GetAxes(Rotation,X,Y,Z);
	X.Z = 0;
	HitVec = Normal(HitLoc - Location);
	HitVec2D= HitVec;
	HitVec2D.Z = 0;

	dotx = HitVec2D dot X;
	doty = HitVec dot Y;

	aHitSpot = HitOther;

	// Check for an upper body shot

	if ( HitLoc.Z > ((Location.Z + CollisionHeight) - (0.40 * CollisionHeight)) )
	{
		if (dotx> 0.31) 	// Front side of body
		{
			KickAdjust.Z = (damageType.default.DamageKick.Z * DamagePct) * 2;
		}
		else if (dotx < -0.31)	// Back side of body
		{
			KickAdjust.Z = (damageType.default.DamageKick.Z * DamagePct) * -2;
		}
		else
			KickAdjust.Z = 0;
		aHitSpot = HitHead;
	}
	else if ( HitLoc.Z > (Location.Z + (0.3 * CollisionHeight)) )
	{
		if (dotx> 0.31) 	// Front side of body
		{
			KickAdjust.Z = damageType.default.DamageKick.Z * DamagePct;
			aHitSpot = HitChest;
		}
		else if (dotx < -0.31)	// Back side of body
		{
			KickAdjust.Z = (damageType.default.DamageKick.Z * DamagePct) * -1;
			aHitSpot = HitBack;
		}
		else
		{
			KickAdjust.Z = 0;
			aHitSpot = HitArms;
		}
	}
	else	// Lower shot
	{
		if (dotx> 0.31) 	// Front side of body
		{
			KickAdjust.Z = (damageType.default.DamageKick.Z * DamagePct) * -1;
		}
		else if (dotx < -0.31)
		{
			KickAdjust.Z = damageType.default.DamageKick.Z * DamagePct;
		}
		else
			KickAdjust.Z = 0;
		aHitSpot = HitLegs;
	}

	// Process Left/Right

	if (doty > 0.0)
	{
		KickAdjust.X = damageType.default.DamageKick.X;
	}
	else
	{
		KickAdjust.X = (damageType.default.DamageKick.X)*-1;
	}

	KickADjust.Y = 0;	// Never roll

	return aHitSpot;
}

//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Animation Notify functions
simulated function FootStepping(int side, optional bool bAllowFirstPerson)
{
	
//	local int Index;
	local IImpactManager ImpactMgr;
	local Material FloorMat;
	local Vector HitLoc, HitNormal;

	local float WaterDepth;
	local Actor HitActor;

	//Make sure we skip this function if the pawn is dying
	// Handle first person stepping in the Tick, so we can better match the step to the weapon bob
	if(IsDead() || GetStateName()=='Dying' || ( IsFirstPerson() && !bAllowFirstPerson ) )
		return;

	// First get the floor material.
	bTraceWater = true;
	HitActor = Trace( HitLoc, HitNormal, Location - (CollisionHeight+20)*Vect(0,0,1), Location + CollisionHeight*vect(0,0,1), true,, FloorMat );
	bTraceWater = false;

	if( HitActor!=None && HitActor.IsA('WaterVolume') )
	{

		if(WaterRippleEmitter==None)
		{
			log( "Level.bIsAtNight=" $ Level.bIsAtNight, 'RSC' );
			if( Level.bIsAtNight )
				WaterRippleEmitter=Spawn(class'gbxEffects.WaterRippleNight',,,Location,rot(16384,0,0));
			else
			WaterRippleEmitter=Spawn(class'gbxEffects.WaterRipple',,,Location,rot(16384,0,0));
		}

		WaterRippleEmitter.Emitters[0].UnSuspendSpawning();
		WaterRippleEmitter.SetLocation(HitLoc);
		WaterSurfaceZ = HitLoc.z;
		bInWater = true;

		WaterDepth = VSize( (Location - CollisionHeight*vect(0,0,1)) - HitLoc );			

		if( Level.bIsAtNight )
			Spawn(class'gbxEffects.WaterSplashSmallNight',,,HitLoc,rot(16384,0,0));	
		else
		Spawn(class'gbxEffects.WaterSplashSmall',,,HitLoc,rot(16384,0,0));			

		if( WaterDepth < WADE_WATER_DEPTH )
		{				
			HandleCueLoadAndPlay( StepWaterCueName, StepWaterCue, StepWaterCueName_ST, StepWaterCue_ST );
		}
		else
		{
			HandleCueLoadAndPlay( WadeWaterCueName, WadeWaterCue, WadeWaterCueName_ST, WadeWaterCue_ST );
		}

	}
	else
	{
		if(WaterRippleEmitter != None)
			WaterRippleEmitter.Emitters[0].SuspendSpawning();
		
		bInWater = false;

		// GBX:naj - modified 5/30/03 - Let the ImpactManager handle the footstep sounds.
		if(!IsA('InfantryGerman'))
		{
			ImpactMgr = class'ImpactManager'.static.GetInstance( Level.Outer, self );
			if (ImpactMgr != None)
			{
				ImpactMgr.HandleFootStep( FloorMat, Self );
			}
		}
	}
}

//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Animation Notify functions
simulated function FootTurnImpact(int side)
{
//	local int Index;
	local IImpactManager ImpactMgr;
	local Material FloorMat;
	local Vector HitLoc, HitNormal;
	local float WaterDepth;
	local Actor HitActor;

	//Make sure we skip this function if the pawn is dying
	if(IsDead() || GetStateName()=='Dying')
		return;

	// First get the floor material.
	bTraceWater = true;
	HitActor = Trace( HitLoc, HitNormal, Location - (CollisionHeight+20)*Vect(0,0,1), Location + CollisionHeight*vect(0,0,1), true,, FloorMat );
	bTraceWater = false;



	if(HitActor!=None && HitActor.IsA('WaterVolume') )
	{

		if(WaterRippleEmitter==None)
		{
			log( "Level.bIsAtNight=" $ Level.bIsAtNight, 'RSC' );
			if( Level.bIsAtNight )
				WaterRippleEmitter=Spawn(class'gbxEffects.WaterRippleNight',,,Location,rot(16384,0,0));
			else
			WaterRippleEmitter=Spawn(class'gbxEffects.WaterRipple',,,Location,rot(16384,0,0));
		}

		WaterRippleEmitter.Emitters[0].UnSuspendSpawning();
		WaterRippleEmitter.SetLocation(HitLoc);
		WaterSurfaceZ = HitLoc.z;
		bInWater = true;

		WaterDepth = VSize( (Location - CollisionHeight*vect(0,0,1)) - HitLoc );

		if( Level.bIsAtNight )
			Spawn(class'gbxEffects.WaterSplashSmallNight',,,HitLoc,rot(16384,0,0));
		else
		Spawn(class'gbxEffects.WaterSplashSmall',,,HitLoc,rot(16384,0,0));

		if( WaterDepth < WADE_WATER_DEPTH )
		{
			HandleCueLoadAndPlay( StepWaterCueName, StepWaterCue, StepWaterCueName_ST, StepWaterCue_ST );
		}
		else
		{
			HandleCueLoadAndPlay( WadeWaterCueName, WadeWaterCue, WadeWaterCueName_ST, WadeWaterCue_ST );
		}

	}
	else
	{
		if(WaterRippleEmitter != None)
			WaterRippleEmitter.Emitters[0].SuspendSpawning();

		bInWater = false;

		if(!IsA('InfantryGerman'))
		{
			// GBX:naj - modified 5/30/03 - Let the ImpactManager handle the footstep sounds.
			ImpactMgr = class'ImpactManager'.static.GetInstance( Level.Outer, self );
			if (ImpactMgr != None)
			{
				ImpactMgr.HandleFootTurn( FloorMat, Self );
			}
		}
	}
}

// Notify called when ready to land (should loop)
function CheckLanding()
{
	if ( Physics == PHYS_Falling )
	{
		// stop animating, haven't landed yet
		TweenAnim('Land', 9000.0);
	}
}

//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Animation functions

simulated event AnimEnd(int Channel)
{
	Super.AnimEnd( Channel );
/*
	if ( Channel == 0 )
	{
		if (m_fDispositionAnimPlaying)
		{
			m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = false;
//			m_fStartDispositionChange = false;
			PlayMoving();
		}
		PlayWaiting();
	}
	else if ( Channel == FIRINGCHANNEL )
	{
		AnimBlendToAlpha(FIRINGCHANNEL,0,0.05);
		m_fRunningTorsoAnim = false;
	}
	else if ( Channel == TAKEHITCHANNEL )
	{
		AnimBlendToAlpha(TAKEHITCHANNEL,0,0.1);
	}
	else if ( Channel == FALLINGCHANNEL )
	{
		if ( Physics != PHYS_Falling )
		{
			AnimBlendToAlpha(FALLINGCHANNEL,0,0.1);
			PlayWaiting();
		}
		else
			PlayFalling();
	}
*/
}

simulated event ChangeAnimation()
{
	if ( (Controller != None) && Controller.bControlAnimations )
		return;
	// player animation - set up new idle and moving animations
	PlayWaiting();
	PlayMoving();
}

//-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
// Player Animation functions

simulated function PlayDyingAnim(class<DamageType> DamageType, vector HitLoc)
{
	local int index;

	if (bUseCustomDeathAnim)
	{
		if (CustomDeathAnims.Length > 0)
		{
			FlushAnimQueueChannel(0,,true);

			index = Rand(CustomDeathAnims.Length);
			AddAnimToQueue(CustomDeathAnims[index], QUEUE_DEATH_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);

			return;
		}
	}
	
	FlushAnimQueueChannel(0,,true);
	AddAnimToQueue('standing_die', QUEUE_DEATH_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
}

{
}

function KnockOffHelmet()
{
}

simulated function vector EyePosition()
{
/*	local vector EyePos;

	if ( bPlayedDeath )
	{
		EyePos = GetBoneCoords(EyeBone).Origin;
		if ( Level.TimeSeconds - DeathStart < 0.1 )
			EyePos = EyePos + SmoothedEyeDiff * (1 - 10*(Level.TimeSeconds-DeathStart));
		return EyePos + WalkBob;
	}
	else
*/
	return EyeHeight * vect(0,0,1) + WalkBob;
}

simulated event PlayDying(class<DamageType> DamageType, vector HitLoc)
{
	// Do most of the dying stuff (tear off, ragoll etc.)
	Super.PlayDying(DamageType, HitLoc);
	
	// GBX:BB - Make sure ripples stop spawning
	if( WaterRippleEmitter != None )
		WaterRippleEmitter.Kill();

//	SmoothedEyeDiff = EyePosition() - GetBoneCoords(EyeBone).Origin;
	//bPlayedDeath = true;
	//DeathStart = Level.TimeSeconds;

	/*
	if ( bPhysicsAnimUpdate )
	{
		bTearOff = true;
		bReplicateMovement = false;
		HitDamageType = DamageType;
		TakeHitLocation = HitLoc;
		if ( (HitDamageType != None) && (HitDamageType.default.GibModifier >= 100) )
			ChunkUp(Rotation, DamageType);
	}
	*/

	/* UWRAGDOLL
	if ( (Level.NetMode != NM_DedicatedServer) && (KPhysics != '') )
	{
		bPhysicsAnimUpdate = false;
		SetPhysics(PHYS_KarmaRagDoll);
		KAddImpulse(TearOffMomentum, TakeHitLocation);
	}
	else
	*/

	/*
		Velocity += TearOffMomentum;
		SetPhysics(PHYS_Falling);
	*/

	// If we are not in ragdoll for whatever reason, turn off gameplay animations and play a dying animation
	if ( Physics != PHYS_KarmaRagDoll )
	{
		bBlockZeroExtentTraces = false;
		bBlockNonZeroExtentTraces = false;

		AnimBlendToAlpha(FIRINGCHANNEL,0,0.1);
		m_fRunningTorsoAnim = false;
		AnimBlendToAlpha(TAKEHITCHANNEL,0,0.1);
		AnimBlendToAlpha(FALLINGCHANNEL,0,0.1);
		PlayDyingAnim(DamageType,HitLoc);
	}

	TriggerEvent(TriggerOnDeath, Controller, self);
	//GotoState('Dying');
}

function PlayHit(float Damage, Pawn InstigatedBy, vector HitLocation, class<DamageType> damageType, vector Momentum)
{
	Super.PlayHit(Damage, InstigatedBy,HitLocation, damageType,Momentum);

	if ( Health > 0 )
		return;

//	StopAnimating();
}

	HandleCueLoadAndPlay( BulletImpactCueName, BulletImpactCue );

		else
			PlayOwnedSound(UWHit[Rand(2)], SLOT_Pain,1.0,,,MyPitch);
		return;
	}
	else
	{
		PlaySound(HitSound[rand(4)], SLOT_Pain,1.0,,,MyPitch);
	}
*/
}

simulated function FaceRotation( rotator NewRotation, float DeltaTime )
{
	local	Rotator	PawnBodyRotation;
	local	int		DeltaRotation;

	ViewPitch = NewRotation.Pitch;

	if ( Physics == PHYS_Ladder )
		SetRotation(OnLadder.Walldir);
	else
	{
		if (PlayerController(Controller).bBehindView)
		{
			if ( (Physics == PHYS_Walking) || (Physics == PHYS_RootMotion) || (Physics == PHYS_Falling) )
				NewRotation.Pitch = 0;

			if (!FootStill)
				SetRotation(NewRotation);
			else if (FootTurning)
			{
				DeltaRotation = AngleDiff( Rotation.Yaw, NewRotation.Yaw );
				PawnBodyRotation = NewRotation;
				if (DeltaRotation < 0)
					PawnBodyRotation.Yaw = Rotation.Yaw + max( DeltaRotation, (DeltaTime * -13000));
				else
					PawnBodyRotation.Yaw = Rotation.Yaw + min( DeltaRotation, (DeltaTime * 13000));
				if (PawnBodyRotation.Yaw < 0)
					PawnBodyRotation.Yaw = 65535 + PawnBodyRotation.Yaw;
				else if (PawnBodyRotation.Yaw > 65535)
					PawnBodyRotation.Yaw = PawnBodyRotation.Yaw - 65535;
				SetRotation(PawnBodyRotation);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			Super.FaceRotation( NewRotation, DeltaTime );
		}
	}
}

/*
FIXME - blend up/down
FIXME - clamp based on rotation of bone below neck
FIXME - use head rotation for movement dir, and if start moving, turn body to face movement dir
* Animation sequence run_lookup   19  Tracktime: 36.000000 rate: 60.000000
	  First raw frame  3357  total raw frames 36  group: [None]

 * Animation sequence run_lookdown   20  Tracktime: 36.000000 rate: 60.000000
	  First raw frame  3393  total raw frames 36  group: [None]
*/
/*
simulated function FaceRotation( rotator NewRotation, float DeltaTime )
{
	local int TurnRate;
	local rotator NeckRot;

	//if ( Physics == PHYS_Ladder )
	// don't turn body

	NeckRot = GetBoneRotation('Bip01 Head');
	NeckRot.Yaw = NewRotation.Yaw;
	NeckRot.Pitch = Clamp(NewRotation.Pitch & 65535, -8192, 8192);
	SetBoneDirection( 'Bip01 Head', NeckRot );
	if ( abs(NewRotation.Yaw - Rotation.Yaw) > 8192 )
		bTurningBody = true;

	if ( bTurningBody )
	{
		TurnRate = 32768 * DeltaTime;
		if ( abs(NewRotation.Yaw - Rotation.Yaw) < TurnRate )
		{
			SetRotation(NewRotation);
			bTurningBody = false;
		}
		else
		{
			if ( abs(NewRotation.Yaw - Rotation.Yaw) > 14000 )
				TurnRate = Max(TurnRate, abs(NewRotation.Yaw - Rotation.Yaw) - 14000);
			NewRotation.Yaw = Rotation.Yaw + TurnRate;
			if ( Rotation.Yaw ClockwiseFrom NewRotation.Yaw )
				NewRotation.Yaw = NewRotation.Yaw;
			else
				NewRotation.Yaw = Rotation.Yaw - TurnRate;
			SetRotation(NewRotation);
		}
	}
}
*/

simulated event PlayFalling()
{
	local name OldAnim;
	local float frame,rate;

	GetAnimParams(0,OldAnim,frame,rate);

	if ( (OldAnim=='running_jump') || (OldAnim=='jump_in_place') )
		return;

//  GBX:PAD: It's going to be unlikely we'll really have guys "fall" in the game, so lets not risk playing any animation
//  for things like this since it just looks bad.
//	PlayJump();
}

simulated event PlayJump()
{
	BaseEyeHeight =  0.7 * Default.BaseEyeHeight;
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if ( (Acceleration.X != 0) || (Acceleration.Y != 0) )
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnRunningJumpAnim(), QUEUE_JUMP_PRIORITY, true, false, true, 1.0);
		}
		else
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnJumpInPlaceAnim(), QUEUE_JUMP_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0);
		}
	}

	CurrentDir = DCLICK_None;
}

//SJP: Trigger jump sound
function bool DoJump( bool bUpdating )
{
	if( Super.DoJump(bUpdating) )
	{
		//Penalize sprinting if you jump
//		if (Role == ROLE_Authority)
//		{
//			m_flSprintTimer = m_flSprintTimer - STAMINA_COST_JUMP;
//		}			
//		m_flJumpMeterTime = Level.TimeSeconds + WGPAWN_JUMP_METER_TIME;

		if (IsHumanControlled())
		{
			HandleCueLoadAndPlay( JumpCueName, JumpCue, JumpCueName_ST, JumpCue_ST );
		}

		if( gbxPlayerController(Controller) != None && gbxPlayerController(Controller).IsZoomed() )
			gbxPlayerController(Controller).ChangeView(0);
		
		m_flJumpEndurance =  m_flJumpEndurance - JUMP_ENDURANCE_FACTOR;
		if (m_flJumpEndurance < JUMP_ENDURANCE_MIN)
		{
			m_flJumpEndurance = JUMP_ENDURANCE_MIN;
		}
		
		return true;
	}

    return false;
}

function PlayLanded(float impactVel)
{
	local Pawn PlayerPawn;

	impactVel = impactVel/JumpZ;
	impactVel = 0.1 * impactVel * impactVel;
	if (!bIsCrouched )
		BaseEyeHeight = Default.BaseEyeHeight;

	log( "WargamePawn::PlayLanded() - Controller=" $ gbxPlayerController(Controller), 'RSC' );

	if ( impactVel > 0.17 )
	{
		// play the grunt sound of the player
		//HandleCueLoadAndPlay( LandGruntCueName, LandGruntCue, LandGruntCueName_ST, LandGruntCue_ST );
		PlayerPawn = gbxPawn( MyUnit.GetControllingPlayerController().Pawn );
		Level.TheAISpeechManager.PlaySpeech( 
			PlayerPawn, 
			None,
			'Jumping',
			,
			,
			0.0, 
			MyUnit, 
			1.0, 
			0.5 
		);
	}

	if ( (impactVel > 0.01)  )
	{
		if (IsHumanControlled() )
		{
			if ( !TouchingWaterVolume() )
			{
				HandleCueLoadAndPlay( LandCueName, LandCue, LandCueName_ST, LandCue_ST );
			}
			else
			{
				//HandleCueLoadAndPlay( LandWaterCueName, LandWaterCue, LandWaterCueName_ST, LandWaterCue_ST );
			}
		}
	}
}

simulated event PlayLandingAnimation(float ImpactVel)
{
	if ( (impactVel > 0.06) || IsAnimating(FALLINGCHANNEL) )
	{
		PlayWaiting();
	}
//	else if ( !IsAnimating(0) )
	else
	{
		PlayWaiting();
	}
}

/*
Animation channel FIRINGCHANNEL used for firing / combat blending
*/
simulated event StopPlayFiring()
{
	if ( bSteadyFiring )
	{
		// FIXME - smooth blend out firing
		bSteadyFiring = false;
		AnimBlendToAlpha(FIRINGCHANNEL,0,0.1);
		m_fRunningTorsoAnim = false;
		PlayWaiting();
	}
}

simulated function PlayFiring(float Rate, int FiringMode)
{
	if ( bIgnorePlayFiring )
		return;

	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if (!IsMoving())
		{
			if ( m_bCornerFiring )
				AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnFireAnim( self ), QUEUE_FIRE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, Rate, 0.0, class'PawnAnimFireCallback');
			else
				AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnFireAnim( self ), QUEUE_FIRE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, Rate, 0.03, class'PawnAnimFireCallback');

			if (PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnHasCycleAnim( self ))
			{
				AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnCycleAnim( self ), QUEUE_FIRE_PRIORITY, false, false, false, Rate, 0.05, class'PawnAnimHandSwitchCallback');
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		log(self$".PlayFiring( "$Rate$", "$FiringMode$" ) - Weapon not set",'pad');
	}
}

simulated function PlayWaiting( optional bool bSkipTween )
{
//	if (MeshAnim != None)
//	{
//		LinkSkelAnim(MeshAnim);
//	}	

	if ( KVehicle(Base) != None )
	{
		AnimateRiding();
	}
	else if ( Physics == PHYS_Swimming )
	{
		AnimateTreading();
	}
	else if ( Physics == PHYS_Flying )
	{
		AnimateFlying();
	}
	else if ( Physics == PHYS_Ladder )
	{
		AnimateStoppedOnLadder();
	}
	else if ( Physics == PHYS_Falling )
	{
		if ( !IsAnimating(FALLINGCHANNEL) )
			PlayFalling();
	}
	else if ( bIsCrouched )
	{
		if (bIsStrafing)
			AnimateCrouchStrafing();
		else
			AnimateCrouching( bSkipTween );
	}
	else if ( bIsProne )
	{
		if (bIsStrafing)
			AnimateProneMoving();
		else
			AnimateProne();
	}
	else if ( bSteadyFiring )
	{
		PlayFiring(1.0, MODE_MachineGun);
	}
	else if (!m_fRunningTorsoAnim || !m_fNoInterruptTorso)
	{
		AnimateStanding( bSkipTween );
	}
}

simulated function PlayMoving()
{
//	if (MeshAnim != None)
//	{
//		LinkSkelAnim(MeshAnim);
//	}

	if ( (Physics == PHYS_None) || ((Controller != None) && Controller.bPreparingMove) )
	{
		// bot is preparing move - not really moving
		PlayWaiting();
		return;
	}

	if ( (Physics == PHYS_Swimming) || ((Physics == PHYS_Falling) && IsPlayingSwimming() && TouchingWaterVolume()) )
	{
		AnimateSwimming();
	}
	else if ( Physics == PHYS_Ladder )
	{
		AnimateClimbing();
	}
	else if ( Physics == PHYS_Flying )
	{
		AnimateFlying();
	}
	else
	{
//		LockRootMotion( 2 );

		// In order from slow to fast:
		if ( bIsProne )
		{
			AnimateProneMoving();
		}
		else if ( bIsCrouched )
		{
			if (bIsStrafing)
				AnimateCrouchStrafing();
			else
				AnimateCrouchWalking();
		}
//		else if ( bIsCreeping )
//		{
//			if (bIsStrafing)
//				AnimateCreepStrafing();
//			else
//				AnimateCreeping();
//		}
		else if ( bIsWalking )
		{
			if (bIsStrafing)
				AnimateWalkStrafing();
			else
				AnimateWalking();
		}
		else if ( bIsSprinting )
		{
			AnimateSprinting();
		}
		else
		{
			if (bIsStrafing)
				AnimateRunStrafing();
			else
				AnimateRunning();
		}
	}
}

/* LoopIfNeeded()
play looping idle animation only if not already animating
*/
/*
simulated function LoopIfNeeded(name NewAnim, float NewRate, float BlendIn, optional int channel, optional name blendbone)
{
	local name OldAnim;
	local float frame,rate;

	GetAnimParams(0,OldAnim,frame,rate);

	// FIXME - get tween time from anim
	if (channel > 0)
	{
		AnimBlendParams(channel, 1.0, 0.0, 0.5, blendbone, false);
	}
	if ( (NewAnim != OldAnim) || (NewRate != Rate) || !IsAnimating(0) )
	{
		LoopAnim(NewAnim, NewRate, BlendIn,channel);
	}
	else
	{
		LoopAnim(NewAnim, NewRate,,channel);
	}
}
*/

//************************************************************************************
// Private animation functions

// Current assumptions
//
// all swimming and treading water anims should belong to the group SWIMMING
// all running anims should belong to the group RUNNING

simulated function bool IsPlayingSwimming()
{
	return AnimIsInGroup(0,'SWIMMING');
}

/* AnimateSwimming()
Moving through water - check acceleration for direction
*/
simulated function AnimateSwimming()
{
	MovementAnims[0] = 'Swim';
	MovementAnims[1] = 'Swim';
	MovementAnims[2] = 'Swim';
	MovementAnims[3] = 'Swim';
}

/* AnimateTreading()
Still in water
*/
simulated function AnimateTreading()
{
	MovementAnims[0] = 'Swim';
	MovementAnims[1] = 'Swim';
	MovementAnims[2] = 'Swim';
	MovementAnims[3] = 'Swim';
}

/* AnimateProneMoving()
prone and moving
*/
simulated function AnimateProneMoving()
{
	TurnLeftAnim = 'prone_creeping_left';
	TurnRightAnim = 'prone_creeping_right';

	MovementAnims[0] = 'prone_creeping_forward';
	MovementAnims[2] = 'prone_creeping_left';
	MovementAnims[1] = 'prone_creeping_back';
	MovementAnims[3] = 'prone_creeping_right';
}

/* AnimateCrouchWalking()
crouching and walking
*/
simulated function AnimateCrouchWalking()
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnCrouchWalkingAnim( self );			
	}
}

simulated function AnimateCrouchStrafing()
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnCrouchWalkingAnim( self );
	}
}

simulated function AnimateWalking()
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnWalkingAnim( self );
	}

	WalkingPct = Default.WalkingPct;
}

simulated function AnimateWalkStrafing()
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnWalkingAnim( self );
	}

	WalkingPct = Default.WalkingPct;
}

/* AnimateClimbing()
climbing
*/
simulated function AnimateClimbing()
{
	local name NewAnim;
	local int i;

	if ( (OnLadder == None) || (OnLadder.ClimbingAnimation == '') )
		NewAnim = 'Ladder_Climb';
	else
		NewAnim = OnLadder.ClimbingAnimation;
	for ( i=0; i<4; i++ )
		MovementAnims[i] = NewAnim;
	TurnLeftAnim = NewAnim;
	TurnRightAnim = NewAnim;
}

simulated function AnimateStoppedOnLadder()
{
	local name NewAnim;

	if ( (OnLadder == None) || (OnLadder.ClimbingAnimation == '') )
		NewAnim = 'Ladder_Climb';
	else
		NewAnim = OnLadder.ClimbingAnimation;
	TweenAnim(NewAnim, 1.0); // FIXME TEMP - need paused on ladder animation
}

/* AnimateFlying()
flying - not used in Wargame, so don't need real animation
*/
simulated function AnimateFlying()
{
	AnimateSwimming();
}

simulated function AnimateRiding()
{
}

simulated function AnimateStanding( optional bool bSkipTween )
{
	local float TweenTime;

	TweenTime = 0.15;

	if ( (PlayerController(Controller) != None) && PlayerController(Controller).bIsTyping )
	{
		// FIXME - play chatting animation
		return;
	}
	if (m_fDispositionAnimPlaying)
	{
		// We're in the process of standing up, so don't run this for now since it can cause an animation flash
		return;
	}

	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None )
	{
		if ( bSkipTween || ( m_bCornerHunkered && !Weapon.IsReloading() ) )
			//|| m_bStandingBackToWall )
		{
			TweenTime = 0.0;
		}

		AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnIdleAnim( self ), QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, true, false, 1.0, TweenTime, class'PawnAnimRandomIdleCallback');

		if ( m_bCornerHunkered && !m_bStandingOverCorner && !m_bCornerFiring )
		{
			PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.GetHunkeredTurnAnims( self, TurnLeftAnim, TurnRightAnim );
		}
		else
		{
			switch (eWeaponAimedState)
			{
				case WAS_Relaxed:
					TurnLeftAnim = PawnAnimInfoClass.Default.TurnLeftRelaxed;
					TurnRightAnim = PawnAnimInfoClass.Default.TurnRightRelaxed;
					break;
				case WAS_CombatRelaxed:
					TurnLeftAnim = PawnAnimInfoClass.Default.TurnLeftCombatRelaxed;
					TurnRightAnim = PawnAnimInfoClass.Default.TurnRightCombatRelaxed;
					break;

				case WAS_AimedHip:
				case WAS_Sighted:
					TurnLeftAnim = PawnAnimInfoClass.Default.TurnLeftSighted;
					TurnRightAnim = PawnAnimInfoClass.Default.TurnRightSighted;
					break;
			}
		}
	}
}

simulated function AnimateCrouching( optional bool bSkipTween )
{
	local float TweenTime;

	TweenTime = 0.15;

	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None )
	{
		if ( bSkipTween || ( m_bCornerHunkered && !Weapon.IsReloading() ) )	// Use a tween time if reloading, so that the transition back to the idle is smooth.
		{
			TweenTime = 0.0;
		}

		AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnIdleAnim( self ), QUEUE_IDLE_PRIORITY, false, true, false, 1.0, TweenTime, class'PawnAnimRandomIdleCallback');

		PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnCrouchWalkingAnim( self );	
	}
}

simulated function AnimateProne()
{
	//LoopIfNeeded('idle_prone_combat1',1.0,0.25);
}

simulated function AnimateSprinting()
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnStandingSprintAnim( self );
	}

	SprintPct = Default.SprintPct;
}

simulated function AnimateRunning()
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if (!PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnRunningAnim( self ))
		{
			PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnRunningAnim( self );
		}
	}
}

simulated function AnimateRunStrafing()
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if (!PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnRunningAnim( self ))
		{
			PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnRunningAnim( self );
		}
	}
}

function SetMovementPhysics()
{
	// GBX:naj - for emplacement weapons: don't change the physics until I say so.
	if ( Physics == PHYS_None )
		return;

	if ( IsDead() )
		return;
		
	if (Physics == PHYS_Falling)
		return;
	if ( PhysicsVolume.bWaterVolume )
	{
		SetPhysics(PHYS_Swimming);
	}
	else
	{
		if (bUseRootMotion)
			SetPhysics(PHYS_RootMotion);
		else
			SetPhysics(PHYS_Walking);
	}
}

// Stub events called when physics actually allows crouch to begin or end
// use these for changing the animation (if script controlled)
event EndCrouch(float HeightAdjust)
{
	//local class<PawnAnimExtra> CallbackClass;

	if ( Controller != None && ( !Level.UseMPStyleFatigue() ) )
	{
		if ( IsHumanControlled() )
			Controller.JogFatigue( FatigueJog_PostureChange_Player );
		else
			Controller.JogFatigue( FatigueJog_PostureChange_AI );
	}

	if (Health > 0)
	{
		if (IsHumanControlled())
		{
			HandleCueLoadAndPlay( StandCueName, StandCue, StandCueName_ST, StandCue_ST );
		}

		Super.EndCrouch( HeightAdjust );

		if ( !bTransitionWithoutAnim )	// Skip the transition animation if requested.
		{
			if (m_bIsCowering)
			{
				AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnGrenadeFromCowerAnim( self ), QUEUE_CHANGEHEIGHT_PRIORITY, true, false, true, 1.5, 0.1, class'PawnAnimDispositionCallback' );
			}
			else if (!IsMoving())
			{
				if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
				{
					AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnCrouchToStandAnim( self ), QUEUE_CHANGEHEIGHT_PRIORITY, true, false, true, 1.5, 0.1, class'PawnAnimDispositionCallback' );
				}
				else
				{
					//bIsTransitioning = false;
					log(self$".EndCrouch() - Weapon not set",'pad');
				}
			}
			else
			{
				StopTransitioning();
			}
		}
		else
		{
			// The transition anim has been skipped.  Reset the var.
			bTransitionWithoutAnim = false;
			//bIsTransitioning = false;
		}

//		m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = true;
		MaxDesiredSpeed = 1.0;
	}
}

event StartCrouch(float HeightAdjust)
{
	//local class<PawnAnimExtra> CallbackClass;

	if ( Controller != None && ( !Level.UseMPStyleFatigue() ) )
	{
		if ( IsHumanControlled() )
			Controller.JogFatigue( FatigueJog_PostureChange_Player );
		else
			Controller.JogFatigue( FatigueJog_PostureChange_AI );
	}

	if (IsHumanControlled() && (Level.m_bFadeScreen != 3))  // don't play crouch sounds during title card screen
	{
		HandleCueLoadAndPlay( CrouchCueName, CrouchCue, CrouchCueName_ST, CrouchCue_ST );
	}

	Super.StartCrouch( HeightAdjust );
	// GBX:PAD: Override the base behavior on this since I think the eye height is a bit off compared to the physical height
//	EyeHeight -= HeightAdjust;
//	OldZ += HeightAdjust;
//	BaseEyeHeight = FMin(0.5 * CrouchHeight, CrouchHeight - 20);

	if ( !bTransitionWithoutAnim )	// Skip the transition animation if requested.
	{
		if (m_bIsCowering)
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnGrenadeToCowerAnim( self ), QUEUE_CHANGEHEIGHT_PRIORITY, true, false, true, 1.5, 0.1, class'PawnAnimDispositionCallback' );
		}
		else if (!IsMoving())
		{
			if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
			{
				AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnStandToCrouchAnim( self ), QUEUE_CHANGEHEIGHT_PRIORITY, true, false, true, 1.5, 0.1, class'PawnAnimDispositionCallback' );
			}
			else
			{
				//bIsTransitioning = false;
				log(self$".StartCrouch() - Weapon not set",'pad');
			}
		}
		else
		{
			StopTransitioning();
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// The transition anim has been skipped.  Reset the var.
		bTransitionWithoutAnim = false;
		//bIsTransitioning = false;
	}

	if ( m_bStandingOverCorner )
	{
		m_bStandingOverCorner = false;
	}
	else if ( m_bStandPeeking )
	{
		m_bStandPeeking = false;
	}

//	m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = true;
	MaxDesiredSpeed = CrouchedThreshold;
}

// GBX:PAD: Added to process ending or starting the prone state
// Stub events called when physics actually allows crouch to begin or end
// use these for changing the animation (if script controlled)
event EndProne(float HeightAdjust)
{
	if (Health > 0)
	{
		Super.EndProne( HeightAdjust );
		bDoTorsoTwist=Default.bDoTorsoTwist;
		PlayAnim('up_to_stand_from_prone',1.0,0.15);
		m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = true;
		GotoState('WaitForAnim');
	}
}

event StartProne(float HeightAdjust)
{
	Super.StartProne( HeightAdjust );
	AnimBlendToAlpha(FIRINGCHANNEL, 0, 0.05);
	m_fRunningTorsoAnim = false;
	bDoTorsoTwist=false;
	StopLookAt(false, false, true);
	if (bIsCrouched)
	{
		PlayAnim('down_to_prone_from_crouch',1.0,0.15);
	}
	else
	{
		PlayAnim('down_to_prone_from_stand',1.0,0.15);
	}
	m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = true;
	GotoState('WaitForAnim');
}

function bool IsTransitioning() 
{ 
	//return bIsTransitioning; 
	return IsTrue( IsTransitioningFlag );
}


/* We're in the state of changing our height, so prevent other idles and whatnot from interrupting until we're done
*/
simulated State WaitForAnim
{
	ignores PlayWaiting, PlayMoving, PlayFiring, PlayReload, PlayMelee, PlayThrow;

	event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		if (channel == 0)
		{
			GotoState('');

			m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = false;
//			m_fStartDispositionChange = false;

			//if ( !m_bDontSetMovingAnims )
			//{
			PlayWaiting();
			PlayMoving();
			//}
		}
	}

	function BeginState()
	{
	}
}

simulated function PlayReload(int ReloadMode)
{
	local gbxPawn PlayerPawn;

	if ( Weapon != None && Weapon.bDelayReloading )
		return;

	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if (IsMoving())
		{
			if (PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnReloadHandSwitch( self ))
				AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnReloadAnim( self ), QUEUE_RELOAD_PRIORITY, true, false, true, GetReloadRate(), 0.15, class'PawnAnimReloadCallback', FIRINGCHANNEL, FIRINGBLENDBONE, 1.0, 0.05, 0.95, true);
			else
				AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnReloadAnim( self ), QUEUE_RELOAD_PRIORITY, true, false, true, GetReloadRate(), 0.15, class'PawnAnimReloadCallbackNoSwitch', FIRINGCHANNEL, FIRINGBLENDBONE, 1.0, 0.05, 0.95, true);
		}
		else
		{
			if (PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnReloadHandSwitch( self ))
				AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnReloadAnim( self ), QUEUE_RELOAD_PRIORITY, true, false, true, GetReloadRate(), 0.15, class'PawnAnimReloadCallback');
			else
				AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnReloadAnim( self ), QUEUE_RELOAD_PRIORITY, true, false, true, GetReloadRate(), 0.15, class'PawnAnimReloadCallbackNoSwitch');
		}
	}
	else
	{
		log(self$".PlayReload( "$ReloadMode$" ) - Weapon not set",'pad');
	}

	// Shout, "Reloading!" about 1/4 of the time
	if ( FRand() <= 0.25 && !IsHumanControlled() )
	{
		PlayerPawn = gbxPawn( MyUnit.GetControllingPlayerController().Pawn );
		Level.TheAISpeechManager.PlaySpeech( 
			Self, 
			PlayerPawn,
			'Reloading',
			,
			,
			0.0, 
			MyUnit, 
			1.0, 
			0.5 
		);
	}

	// GBX:naj - added 10/15/03
	PlayWaiting();
}

simulated function PlayDeploy(int ReloadMode)
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if (IsMoving())
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnDeployAnim( self ), QUEUE_WEAPONSWITCH_PRIORITY, true, false, true, GetReloadRate(), 0.15, class'PawnAnimDeployCallback', FIRINGCHANNEL, FIRINGBLENDBONE, 1.0, 0.05, 0.95, true);
		}
		else
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnDeployAnim( self ), QUEUE_WEAPONSWITCH_PRIORITY, true, false, true, GetReloadRate(), 0.15, class'PawnAnimDeployCallback');
		}
	}
	else
	{
		log(self$".PlayDeploy( "$ReloadMode$" ) - Weapon not set",'pad');
	}

	// GBX:naj - added 10/15/03
	PlayWaiting();
}

simulated function PlayHolster(int ReloadMode)
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if (IsMoving())
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnHolsterAnim( self ), QUEUE_WEAPONSWITCH_PRIORITY, true, false, true, GetReloadRate(), 0.15, class'PawnAnimHolsterCallback', FIRINGCHANNEL, FIRINGBLENDBONE, 1.0, 0.05, 0.95, true);
		}
		else
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnHolsterAnim( self ), QUEUE_WEAPONSWITCH_PRIORITY, true, false, true, GetReloadRate(), 0.15, class'PawnAnimHolsterCallback');
		}
	}
	else
	{
		log(self$".PlayHolster( "$ReloadMode$" ) - Weapon not set",'pad');
	}

	// GBX:naj - added 10/15/03
	PlayWaiting();
}

simulated function PlayReloadTurret()
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		AddAnimToQueue( PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnReloadAnim( Self ), QUEUE_RELOAD_PRIORITY, true, false, true, 1.0, 0.15, class'FlakVReloadCallback', FIRINGCHANNEL, FIRINGBLENDBONE, 1.0, 0.05, 0.95, true);
	}
}

function float GetReloadRate()
{
	if ( Controller.IsA( 'gbxAIController' ) )
	{
		return gbxAIController( Controller ).GetWeaponReloadRate();
	}
	else
	{
		return 1.0;
	}
}

simulated function PlayThrow(int ReloadMode)
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
//		if (IsMoving())
//		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnThrowGrenadeAnim( self ), QUEUE_GRENADE_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.0, class'PawnAnimHandSwitchCallback', FIRINGCHANNEL, FIRINGBLENDBONE, 1.0, 0.15, 0.95, true);
//		}
//		else
//		{
//			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnThrowGrenadeAnim( self ), QUEUE_GRENADE_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.0, class'PawnAnimHandSwitchCallback',,,,,, false);
//		}
	}

	PlayWaiting();
}

simulated function PlayReturnGrenadeThrow()
{
	// Use death priority here, since failure to return the grenade will result in death!

	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if (IsMoving())
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnReturnGrenadeAnim( self ), QUEUE_DEATH_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15, class'PawnAnimHandSwitchCallback', FIRINGCHANNEL, FIRINGBLENDBONE, 1.0, 0.15, 0.95, true);
		}
		else
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnReturnGrenadeAnim( self ), QUEUE_DEATH_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15, class'PawnAnimHandSwitchCallback',,,,,,true);
		}
	}

	PlayWaiting();
}


simulated function PlayFlinch()
{
	// If this guy is cowering it looks really bad to flinch during this, so just blow it off for now.
	if (	m_bIsCowering || IsTransitioning() || IsFlinching() || 
			bHasStartedMountAnim || bIsManningTurret || 
			( Weapon != None && Weapon.IsReloading() ) || 
			( Controller != None && Controller.IsA( 'gbxAIController' ) && !gbxAIController( Controller ).ApproveFlinchRequest() ) )	
		return;
		
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if (IsMoving())
		{
//			PlayTorsoAnim(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnFlinchAnim( self ),1.0,0.5,true);
//			m_fRunningTorsoAnim = true;
			if (!bIsCrouched)
				AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnFlinchAnim( self ), QUEUE_FLINCH_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15, class'PawnAnimFlinchCallback', FIRINGCHANNEL, FIRINGBLENDBONE, 1.0, 0.15, 0.95, true);
		}
		else
		{
//			PlayAnim(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnFlinchAnim( self ),1.0,0.5);
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnFlinchAnim( self ), QUEUE_FLINCH_PRIORITY, false, false, false, 1.0, 0.15, class'PawnAnimFlinchCallback');
		}
	}
	else
	{
		log(self$".PlayFlinch() - Weapon not set",'pad');
	}
}

simulated State Reloading
{
	ignores PlayWaiting, PlayFiring, PlayFlinch;

	event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		if ((Channel == 0) && !m_fRunningTorsoAnim)
		{
			GotoState(m_szOldState);
			m_fWeaponRightHand = true;
			Weapon.AttachToPawn( self );
		}
        else if (Channel == FIRINGCHANNEL)
		{
			GotoState(m_szOldState);
			m_fWeaponRightHand = true;
			Weapon.AttachToPawn( self );
			AnimBlendToAlpha(FIRINGCHANNEL, 0, 0.05);
			m_fRunningTorsoAnim = false;
			m_fNoInterruptTorso = false;
		}
	}

	function BeginState()
	{
		m_fWeaponRightHand = false;
		Weapon.AttachToPawn( self );
	}
}

simulated State AttackAnim
{
	ignores PlayWaiting, PlayFiring, PlayFlinch;

	event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		if (Channel == 0)
		{
			GotoState('');
			AnimBlendToAlpha(FIRINGCHANNEL, 0, 0.05);
			m_fRunningTorsoAnim = false;
			if ( bIsCrouched )
			{
				if (bIsStrafing)
					AnimateCrouchStrafing();
				else
					AnimateCrouching();
			}
			else
				AnimateStanding();
		}
	}
}

simulated State ThrowAnim
{
	ignores PlayWaiting, PlayFiring, PlayFlinch;

	event AnimEnd(int Channel)
	{
		if (Channel == FIRINGCHANNEL)
		{
			GotoState('');
			if ( bIsCrouched )
			{
				if (bIsStrafing)
					AnimateCrouchStrafing();
				else
					AnimateCrouching();
			}
			else
				AnimateStanding();
		}
	}
}

function SetMaxAllowedSpeed( ESpeedLevel speedLevel )
{
	MaxAllowedSpeedLevel = speedLevel;
	if( MaxAllowedSpeedLevel == SL_Creeping )
	{
//		SetCreeping( true );
		SetWalking( false );
		SetSprinting( false );
	}
	else if( MaxAllowedSpeedLevel == SL_Walking )
	{
//		SetCreeping( false );
		SetWalking( true );
		SetSprinting( false );
	}
	else if( MaxAllowedSpeedLevel == SL_Running )
	{
//		SetCreeping( false );
		SetWalking( false );
		SetSprinting( false );
	}
	else if ( MaxAllowedSpeedLevel == SL_Sprinting )
	{
//		SetCreeping( false );
		SetWalking( false );
		SetSprinting( true );
	}
}
/*
function SetCreeping(bool bNewIsCreeping)
{
	if (bNewIsCreeping)
//		MaxDesiredSpeed = CreepingPct * LimpingPct;
		MaxDesiredSpeed = CreepingPct;
	else
		MaxDesiredSpeed = 1.0;
}
*/
function SetWalking(bool bNewIsWalking)
{
	if (bNewIsWalking)
//		MaxDesiredSpeed = WalkingPct * LimpingPct;
		MaxDesiredSpeed = WalkingPct;
	else
		MaxDesiredSpeed = 1.0;
}
/*
simulated function AnimateCreeping()
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if (!PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnCreepingAnim( self ))
		{
			eWeaponAimedState = WAS_Sighted;
			PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnCreepingAnim( self );
		}
	}

	CreepingPct = Default.CreepingPct;
