simulated function AnimateCreepStrafing()
{
	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if (!PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnCreepingAnim( self ))
		{
			eWeaponAimedState = WAS_AimedSighted;
			PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnCreepingAnim( self );
		}
	}

	CreepingPct = Default.CreepingPct;
}
*/
simulated function PlayTorsoAnim(name anim, float Rate, float Tween, bool bNoInterrupt)
{
/*
	if (!m_fRunningTorsoAnim || !m_fNoInterruptTorso)
	{
		AnimBlendParams(FIRINGCHANNEL, 1.0, 0.0, 0.5, FIRINGBLENDBONE, false);
		PlayAnim(anim,Rate,Tween,FIRINGCHANNEL);
		m_fRunningTorsoAnim = true;
		m_fNoInterruptTorso = bNoInterrupt;
	}
*/
}

// Set the facial animation that will be blended in above the neck bone
function AnimFacialExpression( name szFacialAnim, optional float Rate, optional float Tween, optional float Blend )
{
	UnsetSkeletalBranchExclusion( 'Blender' );

	if (Rate == 0.0)  // Rate not specified?
		Rate = 1.0;

	if (Blend == 0.0)  // Blend not specified?
		Blend = 1.0;

	AddAnimToQueue(szFacialAnim, 0, true, false, false, Rate, Tween, None, EMOTIONCHANNEL, EMOTIONBLENDBONE, Blend, 0.0, 1.0);
}

// Play a gesture animation.  If bTorsoOnly is set, the gesture will only be played above the hip bone, and it can be
// played while in motion.  If bNoInterrupt is set, then the animation will have to fully play out before other animations
// such as firing or reloading can be run.
function bool PlayGestureAnim( name szGestureAnim, bool bNoInterrupt )
{
	// GBX:PAD: Don't play these when crouched since we don't have animations for it so the guy pops up to do the gesture.
	if ( bIsCrouched || m_bCornerHunkered )
		return false;

	StopFiringWeapon();

	if (IsMoving())
	{
		if (!bIsCrouched)
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(szGestureAnim, QUEUE_GESTURE_PRIORITY, bNoInterrupt, false, false, 1.0, 0.05, class'PawnAnimHandSwitchCallback', FIRINGCHANNEL, FIRINGBLENDBONE, 1.0, 0.05, 0.95, true);
			return true;
		}
	}
	else
	{
		AddAnimToQueue(szGestureAnim, QUEUE_GESTURE_PRIORITY, bNoInterrupt, false, false, 1.0, 0.05, class'PawnAnimHandSwitchCallback');
		return true;
	}

	return false;
}

function PlayReactToBulletsAnim()
{
	if ( m_bCornerFiring || m_bStandingOverCorner || bIsManningTurret )
		return;

	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		if (IsMoving())
		{
			if (!bIsCrouched)
				AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnReactToBulletsAnim( self ), QUEUE_GESTURE_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15, None, FIRINGCHANNEL, FIRINGBLENDBONE, 1.0, 0.05, 0.95, true);
		}
		else
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnReactToBulletsAnim( self ), QUEUE_GESTURE_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15);
		}
	}
}

function float PlayKnockDownAnim()
{
	// See gbxPlayerPawn
	return 0.0f;
}

/*
function updateSprint(float Delta)
{
	if (Role < Role_Authority)
	{
		return;
	}
	
	if (bIsSprinting)
	{
		// GBX:PAD: Have their sprint time decrease proportionate to what the encumberance for their weapon is.
		m_flSprintTimer -= Delta + (Delta * (1.0f - m_flEncumberance));
		
		if ((m_flSprintTimer <= 0.0) || (m_flRefreshStaminaTime < Level.TimeSeconds))
		{
			if (m_flSprintTimer < 0.0)
				m_flSprintTimer = 0.0;
				
			SetSprinting( false );
		}
		else if (IsMoving())
		{
			m_flRefreshStaminaTime = Level.TimeSeconds + STAMINAREFRESHDELAY;
		}
	}
	else if (m_flSprintTimer < MAXSPRINTTIME)
	{
		if ((m_flSprintTimer <= 0.0) && (m_flRefreshStaminaTime < Level.TimeSeconds))
		{
			m_flRefreshStaminaTime = Level.TimeSeconds + STAMINAREFRESHDELAY;
			m_flSprintTimer = 0.01;
		}
		else
		{
			if (m_flRefreshStaminaTime < Level.TimeSeconds)
			{
				m_flSprintTimer += (Delta / 2);
				if (m_flSprintTimer > MAXSPRINTTIME)
					m_flSprintTimer = MAXSPRINTTIME;
			}
		}
	}
}
*/

simulated function Tick(float Delta)
{
	local vector vWaterSurface;
	local Actor HitActor;
	local Material FloorMat;
	local Vector HitLoc, HitNormal;

	Super.Tick( Delta );
	
	if (m_flJumpEndurance < 1.0f)
	{
		m_flJumpEndurance =m_flJumpEndurance + (Delta * JUMP_ENDURANCE_RECOVERY);
		if (m_flJumpEndurance > 1.0f)
		{
			m_flJumpEndurance = 1.0f;
		}
	}

	if( IsFirstPerson() )
	{
		if( WalkBob.Z < LastWalkBob && bDoFirstPersonFootStep )
		{
			FootStepping( 0, true );
			bDoFirstPersonFootStep = false;
		}
		else if( WalkBob.Z > LastWalkBob )
		{
			bDoFirstPersonFootStep = true;
		}

		LastWalkBob = WalkBob.Z;
	}

	// GBX:BB - Check to see if the pawn jumped or fell into or out of some water
	if ( Physics == PHYS_Falling )
	{	
		bTraceWater = true;
		HitActor = Trace( HitLoc, HitNormal, Location - (CollisionHeight+10)*Vect(0,0,1), Location + CollisionHeight*vect(0,0,1), true,, FloorMat );
		bTraceWater = false;

		if( HitActor!=None && HitActor.IsA('WaterVolume') ) // The pawn is in water
		{
			if( bInWater == false ) // The pawn just fell into water
			{
				if( WaterImpactCue == None )
					WaterImpactCue = LoadSound( WaterImpactCueName );

				if( WaterImpactCue != None )
					PlaySoundCue( WaterImpactCue, SLOT_None );

				Spawn(class'gbxEffects.WaterSplashLarge',,,HitLoc,rot(16384,0,0));	
				WaterRippleEmitter.Emitters[0].UnSuspendSpawning();
			}
			WaterSurfaceZ = HitLoc.z;
			bInWater = true;
		}
		else  // The pawn is not in water
		{
			if(bInWater == true) // Pawn just jumped out of the water
			{
				if( WaterImpactCue == None )
					WaterImpactCue = LoadSound( WaterImpactCueName );

				if( WaterImpactCue != None )
					PlaySoundCue( WaterImpactCue, SLOT_None );

				vWaterSurface = Location;
				vWaterSurface.z = WaterSurfaceZ;
				Spawn(class'gbxEffects.WaterSplashLarge',,,vWaterSurface,rot(16384,0,0));	
			}

			bInWater = false;
		}
	}
	
	if( WaterRippleEmitter != None && WaterRippleEmitter.Emitters[0].bSuspendSpawning == false )
	{
		vWaterSurface = Location;
		vWaterSurface.z = WaterSurfaceZ;
		WaterRippleEmitter.SetLocation( vWaterSurface );
	}
}

event SetSprinting(bool bNewIsSprinting)
{
	//SJP: uncomment this to require full sprint bar to enable sprinting
	//if ((m_flSprintTimer < MAXSPRINTTIME) && bNewIsSprinting)
	//	return;
		
	if ((Health < WGPAWN_LIMP_THRESHOLD) && !Controller.IsA('PlayerController'))
		return;
	if (bNewIsSprinting)
	{
		m_flRefreshStaminaTime = Level.TimeSeconds + STAMINAREFRESHDELAY;

		if( gbxPlayerController(Controller) != None && gbxPlayerController(Controller).IsZoomed() )
			gbxPlayerController(Controller).ChangeView(0);

		StopFiringWeapon();	// No firing while sprinting.
	}
//	if (bNewIsSprinting)
//		gbxWeapon(Weapon).m_flBaseOffset = SPRINT_WEAPON_RETRACT;
//	else
//		gbxWeapon(Weapon).m_flBaseOffset = 0.0f;
	Super.SetSprinting( bNewIsSprinting );
}


function bool ApproveShot()
{
	if ( IsFlinching() || IsTransitioning() )
	{
		return false;
	}
	else if ( Controller.bIsHumanPlayer || Controller.IsA( 'ScriptedController' ) )
	{
		return true;
	}
	else
	{
		return !IsTransitioning() && Controller.ApproveShot( TorsoViewRotation() );
	}
}

/*
simulated function rotator AdjustAimNew(Ammunition FiredAmmunition, vector projStart, int aimerror, optional out int bSkipDoTrace )
{
	local Rotator	ViewRotation;
	local int		PawnAimError;

	if ( Controller == None )
		return Rotation;

	if ( bIsManningTurret )
		ViewRotation = Turret.GetFireRotation();
	else
	if ((PlayerController(Controller) != None) && !PlayerController(Controller).bBehindView)
		ViewRotation = Controller.GetViewRotation();
	else
		ViewRotation = TorsoViewRotation();

	// Here's the rationale for Pawn aiming error:
	// PawnAimError = Posture accuracy + weapon-hold accuracy + movement accuracy
	// Posture accuracy = 0 crouch, 25 standing
	// Weapon-hold accuracy = 0 sighted, 25 shouldered, 50 aimed-hip
	// Movement accuracy = 0 stationary, 75 walking, 200 running, 300 sprinting

	if ( !bIsCrouched && !bIsProne )
		PawnAimError = PawnAimError_Standing;

	if ( eWeaponAimedState == WAS_AimedHip )
		PawnAimError += PawnAimError_AimedHip;

	if ( bIsCreeping || bIsWalking )
		PawnAimError += PawnAimError_Walking;
	else if ( bIsSprinting )
		PawnAimError += PawnAimError_Sprinting;
	else if ( Velocity != Vect(0,0,0) ) // ( Running )
		PawnAimError += PawnAimError_Running;

	return Controller.AdjustAimNew(FiredAmmunition, projStart, ViewRotation, aimerror, PawnAimError, bSkipDoTrace);
}
*/

simulated function rotator AdjustAimNew(Ammunition FiredAmmunition, vector projStart, optional out int bSkipDoTrace )
{
	local Rotator	ViewRotation;

	if ( Controller == None )
		return Rotation;

	if ( bIsManningTurret )
		ViewRotation = Turret.GetFireRotation();
	else
	if ((PlayerController(Controller) != None) && !PlayerController(Controller).bBehindView)
		ViewRotation = Controller.GetViewRotation();
	else
		ViewRotation = TorsoViewRotation();


	return Controller.AdjustAimNew(FiredAmmunition, projStart, ViewRotation, bSkipDoTrace);
}

event bool GetLastVantagePoint( out ActorLite VantagePoint )
{
	if ( Controller != None && Controller.IsA( 'gbxAIController' ) )
	{
		return gbxAIController( Controller ).GetLastVantagePoint( VantagePoint );
	}

	return false;
}

function Vector GetNavPointLocation( ActorLite NavPoint )
{
	if ( NavPoint.bIsNavigationPoint )
		return NavigationPoint( NavPoint ).Location;
	else
	if ( NavPoint.bIsNavigationPointLite )
		return NavigationPointLite( NavPoint ).Location;
}

event bool IsCoveredFrom( Vector ThreatLocation, out ActorLite CoverPoint )
{
	local int x;

	// Logic: Test the pawn's recently touched nav point.  If it provides cover, return true.
	// If it doesn't provide cover, check the pawn's claimed nav point.  If IT provides cover
	// AND it's close enough to the recently touched nav point to be considered, return true.
	//
	for ( x=0; x<2; ++x )
	{
		if ( x == 0 )
		{
			if ( MyRecentlyTouchedNavPoint == None )
				continue;
			else
				CoverPoint = MyRecentlyTouchedNavPoint;
		}
		else			
		{
			if ( MyClaimedNavPoint == None )
				return false;
			else if ( MyRecentlyTouchedNavPoint != None && VSize( GetNavPointLocation( MyRecentlyTouchedNavPoint ) - GetNavPointLocation( MyClaimedNavPoint ) ) > IsCoveredThreshold )
				return false;
			else
				CoverPoint = MyClaimedNavPoint;
		}

		if ( CoverPoint.bIsNavigationPoint )
		{
			//if ( NavigationPoint( CoverPoint ).ProvidesCoverFrom( ThreatLocation, 1 ) )
			if ( NavigationPoint( CoverPoint ).ProvidesCoverFrom( ThreatLocation, 1 ) || NavigationPoint( CoverPoint ).ProvidesCoverFrom( ThreatLocation, 0 ))
				return true;
		}
		else
		if ( CoverPoint.bIsNavigationPointLite )
		{
			//if ( NavigationPointLite( CoverPoint ).ProvidesCoverFrom( ThreatLocation, 1 ) )
			if ( NavigationPointLite( CoverPoint ).ProvidesCoverFrom( ThreatLocation, 1 ) || NavigationPointLite( CoverPoint ).ProvidesCoverFrom( ThreatLocation, 0 ) )
				return true;
		}		
	}	

	return false;
}

function BreakOutOfHunker()
{
	m_bCornerHunkered = false;
	m_bCornerFiring = false;
	m_bCornerPeeking = false;
	m_bStandingOverCorner = false;
	m_bUsingCrouchedCover = false;
	m_bStandingBackToWall = false;
	m_bStandPeeking = false;

	PlayWaiting();
}

function StartGoingToCrouch( optional bool bSkipAnim )
{
	//log( self$ " WargamePawn::StartGoingToCrouch( "$bSkipAnim$")", 'DevAnim' );
	
	if( bIsCrouched )
		return;

	m_bCornerFiring = false;
	m_bCornerPeeking = false;
	m_bStandingOverCorner = false;

	FlushAnimQueueChannel( 0,, true );

	if ( !bIsCrouched )
	{
		bTransitionWithoutAnim = bSkipAnim;
		if ( !bSkipAnim )
			StartTransitioning(0);
	}

	Super.StartGoingToCrouch();
}

function StartGoingToStand( optional bool bSkipAnim )
{
	if( !bIsCrouched && !bIsProne )
		return;

	m_bCornerFiring = false;
	m_bCornerPeeking = false;
	m_bStandingOverCorner = false;

	FlushAnimQueueChannel( 0,, true );

	if ( bIsCrouched )
	{
		bTransitionWithoutAnim = bSkipAnim;
		if ( !bSkipAnim )
			StartTransitioning(1);
	}

	Super.StartGoingToStand();
}

function StandFromCoverToPeek()
{
	m_bStandPeeking = true;
	bWantsToCrouch = false;
	StartTransitioning(2);
}

function SetUsingCrouchedCover( bool bFacingWall, optional bool bSkipPlayWaiting )
{
	if (m_bUsingCrouchedCover != bFacingWall)
	{
		m_bUsingCrouchedCover = bFacingWall;
		
		if ( !bSkipPlayWaiting )
			PlayWaiting();
	}
}

function SetBackToWall( bool bBackToWall )
{
	m_bStandingBackToWall = bBackToWall;
}

function LeanAroundCornerToPeek()
{
	if ( !m_bCornerHunkered || m_bCornerPeeking || m_bCornerFiring || m_bStandingOverCorner )
		return;

	m_bCornerPeeking = true;

	StartTransitioning(3);

	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		AddAnimToQueue( PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnPeekMountAnim( self, m_MyLeanDirection ), QUEUE_LEAN_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.15, class'PawnAnimDispositionCallback' );
	}

	//StartTransitioning();
}

function Vector WhereWillIBeWhenCornerFiring( Rotator WallFacingDir, bool bSightTest )
{
	return WhereWouldIBeWhenCornerFiring( WallFacingDir, Location, m_MyLeanDirection, bSightTest );	
}

function Vector WhereWouldIBeWhenCornerFiring( Rotator WallFacingDir, Vector NodeLocation, ECornerDir CornerDir, bool bSightTest )
{
	if ( CornerDir == CDIR_Left )	// Left
	{
		if ( bIsCrouched )
		{
			return ( NodeLocation + CornerFireYOffsetLeftCrouched * CornerLocalY + CornerFireXOffsetLeftCrouched * CornerLocalX );
		}
		else
		{
			// Standing
			if (Level.bUrbanCover)
			{
				if (bSightTest)
				{
					return ( NodeLocation + CornerTestYOffsetLeftStandingUrban * CornerLocalY + CornerTestXOffsetLeftStandingUrban * CornerLocalX );
				}
				else
				{
					return ( NodeLocation + CornerFireYOffsetLeftStandingUrban * CornerLocalY + CornerFireXOffsetLeftStandingUrban * CornerLocalX );
				}
			}
			else
			{
				return ( NodeLocation + CornerFireYOffsetLeftStanding * CornerLocalY + CornerFireXOffsetLeftStanding * CornerLocalX );
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// Right
		if ( bIsCrouched )
		{
			return ( NodeLocation + CornerFireYOffsetRightCrouched * CornerLocalY + CornerFireXOffsetRightCrouched * CornerLocalX );
		}
		else
		{
			// Standing
			if (Level.bUrbanCover)
			{
				if (bSightTest)
				{
					return ( NodeLocation + CornerTestYOffsetRightStandingUrban * CornerLocalY + CornerTestXOffsetRightStandingUrban * CornerLocalX );
				}
				else
				{
					return ( NodeLocation + CornerFireYOffsetRightStandingUrban * CornerLocalY + CornerFireXOffsetRightStandingUrban * CornerLocalX );
				}
			}
			else
			{
				return ( NodeLocation + CornerFireYOffsetRightStanding * CornerLocalY + CornerFireXOffsetRightStanding * CornerLocalX );
			}
		}
	}
}

function Vector WhereWillIBeWhenDismounting( bool bStartCrouched, bool bEndCrouched )
{
	local float XOffset, YOffset;
	local Vector PawnX, PawnY, PawnZ;

	GetAxes( Rotation, PawnX, PawnY, PawnZ );

	if ( bStartCrouched )
	{
		// Start crouched
		if ( bEndCrouched )
		{
			if ( m_MyLeanDirection == CDIR_Left )	// Left
			{
				if (Level.bUrbanCover)
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetLeftCrouchedToCrouchedUrban;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetLeftCrouchedToCrouchedUrban;
				}
				else
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetLeftCrouchedToCrouched;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetLeftCrouchedToCrouched;
				}
			}
			else							// Right
			{
				if (Level.bUrbanCover)
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetRightCrouchedToCrouchedUrban;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetRightCrouchedToCrouchedUrban;
				}
				else
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetRightCrouchedToCrouched;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetRightCrouchedToCrouched;
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if ( m_MyLeanDirection == CDIR_Left )	// Left
			{
				if (Level.bUrbanCover)
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetLeftCrouchedToStandingUrban;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetLeftCrouchedToStandingUrban;
				}
				else
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetLeftCrouchedToStanding;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetLeftCrouchedToStanding;
				}
			}
			else							// Right
			{
				if (Level.bUrbanCover)
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetRightCrouchedToStandingUrban;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetRightCrouchedToStandingUrban;
				}
				else
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetRightCrouchedToStanding;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetRightCrouchedToStanding;
				}
			}
		}
	}
	else
	{
		// Start standing
		if ( bEndCrouched )
		{
			if ( m_MyLeanDirection == CDIR_Left )	// Left
			{
				if (Level.bUrbanCover)
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetLeftStandingToCrouchedUrban;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetLeftStandingToCrouchedUrban;
				}
				else
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetLeftStandingToCrouched;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetLeftStandingToCrouched;
				}
			}
			else							// Right
			{
				if (Level.bUrbanCover)
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetRightStandingToCrouchedUrban;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetRightStandingToCrouchedUrban;
				}
				else
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetRightStandingToCrouched;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetRightStandingToCrouched;
				}
			}
		}
		else
		{
			if ( m_MyLeanDirection == CDIR_Left )	// Left
			{
				if (Level.bUrbanCover)
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetLeftStandingToStandingUrban;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetLeftStandingToStandingUrban;
				}
				else
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetLeftStandingToStanding;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetLeftStandingToStanding;
				}
			}
			else							// Right
			{
				if (Level.bUrbanCover)
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetRightStandingToStandingUrban;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetRightStandingToStandingUrban;
				}
				else
				{
					XOffset = CornerDismountXOffsetRightStandingToStanding;
					YOffset = CornerDismountYOffsetRightStandingToStanding;
				}
			}
		}
	}

	// TBD: Obviously I have my x's and y's mixed up.  Fix.
	return Location - XOffset * PawnY - YOffset * PawnX;
}

function StandUpToFireOverCorner()
{
	if ( !m_bCornerHunkered || m_bCornerPeeking || m_bCornerFiring || m_bStandingOverCorner || !bIsCrouched )
		return;

	m_bStandingOverCorner = true;
	bWantsToCrouch = false;	
	StartTransitioning(5);
}

function LeanAroundCornerToFire( Rotator WallFacingDir )
{
	if ( !m_bCornerHunkered || m_bCornerPeeking || m_bCornerFiring || m_bStandingOverCorner )
		return;

	m_bCornerFiring = true;

	LastCornerPosition = Location;
	OutCornerPosition = WhereWillIBeWhenCornerFiring( WallFacingDir, false );

	SetRotation( Rotator( Vect(-1,0,0) >> WallFacingDir ) );

	bNoTurnBody = true;
	StartTransitioning(4);

	if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
	{
		TurnLeftAnim = '';	// GBX:naj - bug 1577 - Clear out the turn channels to avoid them blending with the mount anim, causing a locational pop.
		TurnRightAnim = '';
		AddAnimToQueue( PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnCornerFireMountAnim( self ), QUEUE_LEAN_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.0, class'CornerFireMountCallback' );
	}
}

function PrepareForReverseCornerMount( Vector CornerPointLoc, Vector CornerFiringLoc, Rotator WallFacingDir, ECornerDir LeanDir )
{
	LastCornerPosition = CornerPointLoc;
	SetLocation( CornerFiringLoc );
	SetRotation( WallFacingDir );
	Controller.SetRotation( WallFacingDir );
	
	CompleteCornerMount( LeanDir );
	m_bCornerFiring = true;
}

function CompleteCornerMount( ECornerDir LeanDirection, optional bool bSkipPlayWaiting )
{
	local Rotator LocalYRot;

	m_MyLeanDirection = LeanDirection;
	m_bCornerHunkered = true;

	if (MyClaimedNavPoint.bIsNavigationPoint)
		LocalYRot = NavigationPoint(MyClaimedNavPoint).Rotation;
	else if (MyClaimedNavPoint.bIsNavigationPointLite)
		LocalYRot = NavigationPointLite(MyClaimedNavPoint).Rotation;

	LocalYRot.Pitch = 0;
	LocalYRot.Roll = 0;
	CornerLocalY = Vector( LocalYRot );
	LocalYRot.Yaw = (LocalYRot.Yaw + 16384) & 65535;
	CornerLocalX = Vector( LocalYRot );

	if ( !bSkipPlayWaiting )
		PlayWaiting();
}

function CompleteCornerDismount()
{
	local EWeaponAimedStateTypes LastAimedState;
	local Rotator NewRot;

	m_bCornerHunkered = false;

	// New dismounts require a rotation pop right after the animation.
	NewRot = Rotation;
	NewRot.Yaw = ( NewRot.Yaw + 32768 ) & 65535;
	SetRotation( NewRot );
	Controller.SetRotation( NewRot );	

	// GBX:naj - Dirty hack.
	// We have to temporarily set the weapon aimed-state to "relaxed" because all of the corner-dismount anims end with the weapon in the relaxed posture.
	// Unfortunately, because the idle has to be played with a 0.0 tween time (because of the rotation change), we can't just let the blending system
	// take care of the difference.
	LastAimedState = eWeaponAimedState;
	SetWeaponAimedState( WAS_CombatRelaxed );	
	PlayWaiting( true );
	
	eWeaponAimedState = LastAimedState;
}

function bool ReturnToCorner()
{
	if ( !m_bCornerFiring && !m_bCornerPeeking && !m_bStandingOverCorner )
		return false;

	if ( m_bCornerFiring )
	{
		m_bCornerFiring = false;

		StartTransitioning(6);

		if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
		{
			AddAnimToQueue( PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnCornerFireDismountAnim( self ), QUEUE_LEAN_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.05, class'CornerFireDismountCallback' );
		}

		//StartTransitioning();
		return true;
	}
	else if ( m_bCornerPeeking )
	{
		m_bCornerPeeking = false;

		StartTransitioning(7);

		if (PawnAnimInfoClass != None)
		{
			AddAnimToQueue( PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnPeekDismountAnim( self ), QUEUE_LEAN_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.05, class'PawnAnimDispositionCallback' );
		}

		//StartTransitioning();
		return true;
	}
	else if ( m_bStandingOverCorner )
	{
		bWantsToCrouch = true;
		StartTransitioning(8);
		//StartGoingToCrouch();
		return true;
	}
	else
		return false;
}

function StartTransitioning( optional int code )
{
	//log("NAJ**** "$Self.Name$" StartTransitioning: "$code, 'naj');	
	SetFlagTrueTimed( IsTransitioningFlag, MaxTransitionTime );
}

function StopTransitioning()
{
	SetFlagValue( IsTransitioningFlag, false );
}

function LoadMountAnimations( EMountAction Action )
{
	local MeshAnimation	aMeshAnim;
	local string		szMeshAnimName;

	//log( "WargamePawn::LoadMountAnimations( Action: "$Action$ ")", 'DevAnim' );

	// GBX:PAD: For now lets try taking this out since we want the holster animation for the current weapon to play
	// out before the animation set is swapped.
//	return;
	
	switch( Action )
	{
	case Mount_MountMG42Gunner:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.mg42";
		break;
	case Mount_Mount30CalGunner:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.30cal";
		break;
	case Mount_MountFlakVGunner:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.flakv";
		break;
	case Mount_MountFlakVLoader:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.flakv";
		break;
	case Mount_MountPak36Gunner:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.pak";
		break;
	case Mount_MountPak36Loader:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.pak";
		break;
	case Mount_MountMortarGunner:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.mortar";
		break;
	case Mount_MountMortarLoader:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.mortar";
		break;
	case Mount_MountTankStuart30cal:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.stuart";
		break;
	case Mount_MountTankSherman50cal:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.sherman";
		break;
	case Mount_MountPak88Gunner:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.88";
		break;
	case Mount_MountPak88Loader:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.88";
		break;
	case Mount_MountPak88FuseSetter:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.88";
		break;
	case Mount_MountPak88Spotter:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.88";
		break;
	case Mount_MountTankM10_50cal:
		szMeshAnimName = "a_hold_misc.m10";
		break;
	}

	//log( "WargamePawn::LoadMountAnimations() About to load mesh animation: "$szMeshAnimName, 'DevAnim' );

	aMeshAnim = MeshAnimation( DynamicLoadObject( szMeshAnimName,class'MeshAnimation' ) );

	//log( "WargamePawn::LoadMountAnimations() aMeshAnim: " $aMeshAnim, 'DevAnim' );

	if ( aMeshAnim != None )
	{
// DON'T UNLINK THE CURRENT ANIMATIONS SINCE THIS WILL CAUSE THE REFERENCE POSE IF THE PAWN IS CURRENTLY JUMPING
// (WE ARE GOING TO LINK THESE ANIMATIONS BACK IN AGAIN ONCE THE PAWN IS OFF THE MOUNTED WEAPON, SO NO SENSE UNLINKING THEM
//		if ( MeshAnim != None )
//			UnlinkSkelAnim( MeshAnim, false );
		if (LinkSkelAnim( aMeshAnim ))
		{
			MeshAnim = aMeshAnim;
			CurMeshAnimName = szMeshAnimName;

			//log( "WargamePawn::LoadMountAnimations() LinkSkelAnim() returned true so saving meshAnim: "$MeshAnim$ " and CurMeshAnimName: "$CurMeshAnimName, 'DevAnim' );
		}
		bInitializeAnimation = false;
	}
}

// Overridden in gbxPlayerPawn.
function bool IsDoingHeavyTrauma() { return false; }

//--------------------------------------------------------
// Player-pawn only turret functions.
//
function MountTurretPlayer( TurretWeapon aTurret, bool bUseRootMotion )
{
	local int index;

	//log( "WargamePawn::MountTurretPlayer( aTurret: "$aTurret$ ", bUseRootMotion: "$bUseRootMotion$ ")", 'DevAnim' );

	// This function is intended for playerpawns only.
	// Can't mount when in oracle cam mode.
	// Can't mount if the player is interpolating.
	// Can't mount if doing heavy trauma (e.g. grenade wooziness, melee disorientation).
	if (	!Controller.IsA( 'gbxPlayerController' ) || 
			gbxPlayerController( Controller ).IsInOracleCamMode() ||
			bInterpolating ||
			IsDoingHeavyTrauma() )
		return;

	// Disable player-warning speeches from the player's teammates when he is using a turret.
		Level.TheAISpeechManager.EnablePlayerWarningSpeeches( false );
		
	if ( aTurret != None )
		Turret = aTurret;

	// Make sure current weapon is not zoomed-in.
		if ( Weapon != None && Weapon.IsA( 'gbxWeapon' ) )
		{
			gbxWeapon( Weapon ).ForceUnzoom();
		}

		Acceleration = vect(0,0,0);
		Velocity = vect(0,0,0);

	FlushAnimQueueChannel( 0 );

	for (index=1; index <= 16; index++)
		FlushAnimQueueChannel( index, false, true );

	LoadMountAnimations( aTurret.GetMountAction() );

	bHasStartedMountAnim = true;
	StartGoingToCrouch( true );

	//log( "WargamePawn::MountTurretPlayer() Calling AddAnimToQueue() TurretMountAnim: "$TurretMountAnim, 'DevAnim' );

	AddAnimToQueue( TurretMountAnim, QUEUE_TURRET_MOUNT_PRIORITY, true, false, bUseRootMotion, 1.0, 0.05, class'TurretMountCallback' );	

	//log( "WargamePawn::MountTurretPlayer() bHasStartedMountAnim: "$bHasStartedMountAnim, 'DevAnim' );

	// The AddAnimToQueue() call above may have failed and called our callback right away.
	if ( bHasStartedMountAnim )
	{
		// It didn't fail.
		LastWeapon = Weapon;
		SetWeapon( None );

		Job = Turret.GetPlayerJobName();

		StartTransitioning(9);

		Velocity=Vect(0,0,0);

		gbxPlayerController( Controller ).bBehindView = true;
		bSpecialCalcView = true;
		bInterpolating = true;
	}
}

function DismountTurretPlayer(bool bUseRootMotion)
{
	//log( self$ " WargamePawn::DismountTurretPlayer( bUseRootMotion: "$bUseRootMotion$ ")", 'DevAnim' );

	PrepareTurretDismount();

	bHasStartedMountAnim = true;
	StartGoingToStand( true );
	AddAnimToQueue( TurretDismountAnim, QUEUE_TURRET_MOUNT_PRIORITY, true, false, bUseRootMotion, 1.0, 0.05, class'TurretMountCallback' );	

	StartTransitioning(10);	

	Velocity=Vect(0,0,0);
	
	bInterpolating = true;

	// Re-enable player-warning speeches, which were disabled when the player mounted this turret.
	Level.TheAISpeechManager.EnablePlayerWarningSpeeches( true );
}

// GBX:naj - overridden from Pawn.  Prevent player from crouching/standing while on a turret.
function ShouldCrouch(bool Crouch)
{
	// This prevents the crouch button from doing anything while the player is mounting or manning a turret weapon.
	if ( !bIsManningTurret && !bHasStartedMountAnim )
	{
		Super.ShouldCrouch( Crouch );
	}
}

// GBX:naj - overridden from Pawn.  Prevent player from jumping while on a turret.
function bool CannotJumpNow()
{
	if ( bIsManningTurret || bHasStartedMountAnim )
		return true;
	else if (m_flSprintTimer < STAMINA_COST_JUMP)
	{
		return true;
	}
	if (accelRate == 0.0f)	// Player movement is locked.
	{
		return true;
	}
	else
	{
		return false;
	}
}

function SetIgnoreFriendlyFire( bool bIgnore )
{
	bIgnoreFriendlyFire = bIgnore;
}

//--------------------------------------------------------
// Turret functions (for both pawn types).
//
function PrepareTurretDismount()
{
	Turret.PreparePawnToDismount( Self );

	ResetLookAtImmediate(true, true, true);
	Velocity = vect(0,0,0);

	FlushAnimQueueChannel( 0 );
}

function GoBackToOldWeapon()
{
	Weapon = None;
	SetWeapon( LastWeapon );
	Controller.SwitchToBestWeapon();
}

function CompleteTurretMount( bool bAnimQueueFailed )
{
	//log( self$ " WargamePawn::CompleteTurretMount() bAnimQueueFailed: " $bAnimQueueFailed, 'DevAnim' );
	
	bHasStartedMountAnim = false;

	if ( !bAnimQueueFailed )
	{
		//log( self$ " WargamePawn::CompleteTurretMount() bAnimQueueFailed == false so complete the mounting process!", 'DevAnim' );

		bIsManningTurret = true;	

		Turret.CompleteMount( Self );
		StopLookAt(true, false, true);
		ResetLookAtImmediate(true, false, true);

		StopTransitioning();

			Velocity = Vect(0,0,0);
			Acceleration = Vect(0,0,0);
		
		bInterpolating = false;	
	}
	else
	{		
		//log( self$ " WargamePawn::CompleteTurretMount() bAnimQueueFailed == TRUE! NOT GOOD!", 'DevAnim' );
		
		Turret.MountFailed( Self );
		Turret = None;
	}
}

function CompleteTurretDismount()
{
	log( self$ " WargamePawn::CompleteTurretDismount()", 'DevAnim' );
	
	if ( Controller.IsA( 'gbxPlayerController' ) )
	{
		gbxPlayerController( Controller ).bBehindView = false;
		bSpecialCalcView = false;
	}

	bDoTorsoTwist = true;
	bHasStartedMountAnim = false;
	bIsManningTurret = false;	

	Turret.CompleteDismount( Self );
	Turret = None;
	Job = Job_None;	

	PlayWaiting( true );

	StopLookAt(true, false, true);
	ResetLookAtImmediate(true, false, true);

	StopTransitioning();
	bInterpolating = false;
}

// GBX:naj - added 11/21/03 - This event needs to return true so that AI Pawns will refrain from corner-firing
// when another pawn is in the way.
event bool EncroachingOn( actor Other )
{
	if ( Other.IsA( 'gbxPawn' ) )
	{
		return true;
	}
	else
		return Super.EncroachingOn( Other );
}


function ServerChangedSecondaryWeapon(Inventory OldWeapon, Inventory NewWeapon)
{
    SecondaryWeapon = NewWeapon;

    PendingSecondaryWeapon = None;

    Inventory.OwnerEvent('ChangedSecondaryWeapon'); // tell inventory that weapon changed (in case any effect was being applied)
}


simulated function PlayMelee(int MeleeMode)
{
	m_fWeaponRightHand = true;
	
	m_fDispositionAnimPlaying = true;

	PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.SetPawnRunningAnim( self );
	
	if ( MeleeMode == 1 )
		AddAnimToQueue( PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.MeleeAttackAnim( self ), QUEUE_MELEE_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.05, class'MeleeAttackCallback' );
	else
		AddAnimToQueue( PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.MeleeAttackAnim( self ), QUEUE_MELEE_PRIORITY, true, false, true, 1.0, 0.05, class'MeleeAttackCallback' );
	StartTransitioning(11);
}

simulated function DoMeleeLunge()
{
	if ( Controller != None && Controller.IsA( 'gbxAIController' ) )
	{
		gbxAIController( Controller ).DoMeleeLunge();
	}
}

simulated function CheckMeleeSuccess()
{
	local gbxPawn aPawn;
	local vector HitLocation, StartTrace, ToEnemy, SmackVelocity, X,Y,Z;

	if(IsHumanControlled() && level.netmode==NM_Standalone)
		return;

	GetAxes(GetViewRotation(), X, Y, Z);
	StartTrace = Location + (EyeHeight * vect(0,0,1));

	foreach VisibleCollidingActors(class'gbxPawn', aPawn, MeleeRange )
	{
		if ( aPawn == Self || aPawn.SameTeamAs( Self ) )
			continue;

		ToEnemy = aPawn.Location - Location;
		if ( ( Vector( Rotation ) dot Normal( ToEnemy ) ) < 0.7071 )
			continue;
		
		if ( !aPawn.bIsManningTurret )
		{
			SmackVelocity = ToEnemy;
			//SmackVelocity.Z += 25.0;		
			aPawn.AddVelocity( 300.0 * Normal( SmackVelocity ) );
		}
		// GBX:PAD: If we are in a Skirmish game, go ahead and rig this so that the enemies just do the weenie damage
		// that the Germans do in single player.
		if (Level.Game.IsA('WargameSkirmish') && !Level.Game.IsPawnOnSameTeamAsPlayer( self ))
		{
			aPawn.TakeDamage(SkirmishEnemyMeleeDamage, Self, HitLocation, Vect(0,0,0), gbxWeapon(Weapon).MyMeleeDamageType);
		}
		else
		{
			aPawn.TakeDamage(MeleeDamage, Self, HitLocation, Vect(0,0,0), gbxWeapon(Weapon).MyMeleeDamageType);
		}
		Weapon.PlayMeleeStrikeSound( Self );

		aPawn.ClientKickView( Vect(0,0,0), 50.0, 10.0 );
		// GBX:PAD: Even in solo mode, melee trauma causes trouble in Skirmish, so turn off melee trauma for anything
		// but a pure single player game.
		if ( Level.NetMode == NM_StandAlone )
		{
			aPawn.DoMeleeTrauma();
		}
		break;
	}	
}

function SetCowering( bool bIsCowering )
{
	if (bIsCowering && (bIsCowering == m_bIsCowering))
		return;
		
//	m_bIsCowering = bIsCowering;
	
	if (bIsCowering)
	{
		m_bIsCowering = bIsCowering;
		if (bIsCrouched)
		{
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnGrenadeToCowerAnim( self ), QUEUE_COWER_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.1 );
			AddAnimToQueue(PawnAnimInfoClass.Static.PawnIdleAnim( self ), QUEUE_COWER_IDLE_PRIORITY, true, true, false, 1.0, 0.1 );
		}
		else
		{
//			AddAnimToQueue('standing_down_to_cower', QUEUE_COWER_PRIORITY, true, false, false, 1.0, 0.1 );
			StartGoingToCrouch();
		}
	}
	else
	{
		FlushAnimQueueChannel( 0 );
		StartGoingToStand();
	}
}

function float GetIdealGroundSpeed()
{
	if ((Health < WGPAWN_LIMP_THRESHOLD) && (Controller != None) && (Controller.Enemy == None))
		return Default.GroundSpeed * LimpingPct;
	else
		return Default.GroundSpeed;
}

function float GetIdealBaseMovementRate()
{
	if ((Health < WGPAWN_LIMP_THRESHOLD) && (Controller != None) && (Controller.Enemy == None))
		return Default.BaseMovementRate * LimpingPct;
	else
		return Default.BaseMovementRate;
}

function UpdateGroundSpeed()
{
	GroundSpeed = GetIdealGroundSpeed();
	BaseMovementRate = GetIdealBaseMovementRate();
}

function PlayHeavyTraumaSound()
{
	if( HeavyTraumaCue == None && HeavyTraumaCueName != "" )
	{
		HeavyTraumaCue = LoadSound( HeavyTraumaCueName );
	}

	if( HeavyTraumaCue != None )
	{
		PlayLocalSoundCue(HeavyTraumaCue, SLOT_None, false);	
	}

	SetScriptedAudioEffect( "Gameplay.EFFECT_Trauma", 11.0, 0.15, 0.75 );
}

// Helper function to load and play both local and remote sound cues
simulated function HandleCueLoadAndPlay( string MonoSoundName, out Cue MonoSoundCue, optional string StereoSoundName, optional out Cue StereoSoundCue )
{
	if( MonoSoundCue == None && MonoSoundName != "" )
	{
		MonoSoundCue = LoadSound( MonoSoundName );
	}

	if( StereoSoundCue == None && StereoSoundName != "" )
	{
		StereoSoundCue = LoadSound( StereoSoundName );
	}

	if ( IsLocallyControlled() )
	{
		if ( StereoSoundCue != None && (Controller == Level.GetLocalPlayerController()) )
		{
			PlayLocalSoundCue(StereoSoundCue, SLOT_None, false);	

			if( Level.NetMode != NM_Standalone )
			{
				PlayRemoteSoundCue(MonoSoundCue, SLOT_None, true, false);
			}
		}
		else
		{
			PlayOwnedSoundCue(MonoSoundCue, SLOT_None, TransientSoundVolume,,,,true);	
		}
	}
	else
	{
		PlayOwnedSoundCue(MonoSoundCue, SLOT_None, TransientSoundVolume,,,,true);	
	}
}
		
simulated function ChangeCharacterHeight()
{
	local vector	aLoc;
	
	aLoc.X = 1.0f;
	aLoc.Y = 1.0f;
	aLoc.Z = m_flLegScale;
//	SetBoneScale( 0, aLoc, 'Bip01 L Calf' );
//	SetBoneScale( 1, aLoc, 'Bip01 R Calf' );
//	SetBoneScale( 2, aLoc, 'Bip01 L Thigh' );
//	SetBoneScale( 3, aLoc, 'Bip01 R Thigh' );

	SetBoneScale( 0, aLoc, 'Bip01' );
//	SetDrawScale3D( aLoc );

//	SetCollisionSize( Default.CollisionRadius, Default.CollisionHeight * m_flLegScale );	
	if (m_flLegScale > 1.0f)
		SetCollisionSize( Default.CollisionRadius, Default.CollisionHeight * (1.0f + ((m_flLegScale - 1.0f) * 2)) );
	else
		SetCollisionSize( Default.CollisionRadius, Default.CollisionHeight * (m_flLegScale - ((1.0f - m_flLegScale) / 2)) );
}

simulated function FireAtTarget( Actor MyTarget )
{
	if (Weapon == None)
	{
		return;
	}
	
	fFireShotWhenFacing=true;
	if (Weapon.IsA('gbxWeapon'))
	{
		gbxWeapon(Weapon).m_aGuideTarget = MyTarget;
	}
	SetAimAtPoint( MyTarget.Location, true );
}

simulated function ClearFireAtTarget()
{
	if (Weapon == None)
	{
		return;
	}
	
	if (Weapon.IsA('gbxWeapon'))
	{
		gbxWeapon(Weapon).m_aGuideTarget = None;
	}
	ResetLookAt( true, true, true );
}

// GBX:PAD: This is a function to wrap code that was in AnimNotify_MortarFire
simulated function MortarFire()
{
	if ( Turret != None && Turret.IsA( 'WeapDEMortar' ))
	{
		WeapDEMortar( Turret ).NotifyReadyToLaunch();
	}
}

simulated event PostRespawnPlay()
{
	Super.PostRespawnPlay();
	
	GroundSpeed=Default.GroundSpeed;
	BaseMovementRate=Default.BaseMovementRate;

	bTriggerOnDeathFired=false;
	bIsCreeping=false;

	m_aHeadHandEnable.R = 1;
	m_aHeadHandEnable.G = 1;
	m_aHeadHandEnable.B = 1;

	m_flLastDisplayPawnInfo = -1.0f;
	m_flLastDisplayPawnNoShoot = -1.0f;
}
